description.hltext_display: Democrats fail to get the message: Citizens' income isn't their money
description.content:
Printer-friendly version
Martinez
Editor:
During the 2008 presidential campaign, Barack Obama ... said, "Under my plan, no family making less than $250,000 a year will see any form of tax increase. Not your income tax, not your payroll tax, not your capital gains taxes, not any of your taxes."
Well, even though the ship has long since sailed on keeping that promise, he is facing unwarranted scrutiny for negotiating the extension of the Bush tax cuts.
Rather than help him kind of keep a campaign promise, his fellow Democrats are running the halls of Congress saying things such as the tax cut deal being the "Republican Wet Dream Act." That was said by Rep. Gary Ackerman of New York. Real class act, huh?
Sen. Frank Lautenberg, D-N.J., said, "To me, it has a bad aroma, and I don't like what I see. ... The people who don't need it are going to get tax relief."
The Democrats' cutting-off-the-nose-to-spite-the-face attitude notwithstanding: It. Is. Not. Your. Money. Maybe Democrats need to lose another 70 seats in Congress and another 630-plus state legislative seats and seven governorships nationwide?
People work and in turn are given an hourly wage or a salary. They are to keep as much of it as humanly possible. Democrats pontificate how many of our earned dollars we may keep. Furthermore, they seem to think that they can help an economy by taking money out of it. No poor person or company being heavily taxed has ever hired me or any person I know.
Democrats are more than delighted to slap an 18.4 cents per gallon federal tax on gasoline while hauling oil company executives before a Congressional committee to explain their dime-a-gallon (at most) before-tax profit that pays millions of salaries and benefit packages.
Let working people keep their money and try creating wealth as opposed to condemning and dividing it.
Lee Benedict
Martinez
Printer-friendly version

description.hltext_display: India successfully test fires 2 Prithvi-II nuclear capable ballistic missiles
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
NEW DELHI, Dec 22: India Wednesday successfully testfired two nuclear-capable, surface-to-surface Prithvi-II ballistic missiles off the coast of the eastern state of Orissa.
According to a Chinese news agency, "both the missiles were tested successfully from the Integrated Test Range at Chandipur in Balasore district off the Orissa coast at 08:15 a.m. and 09:15 a.m. respectively. The missiles, which have already been inducted into Indian armed forces, were a users trial by the Indian Army,".
Prithvi, the first ballistic missile developed under the country's prestigious , is propelled by liquid propulsion twin engine and capable of carrying a payload of 500-1,000 kg warhead.
With a length of nine-meter and one-meter diameter, Prithvi-II uses an advanced inertial guidance system with maneuvering trajectory.

description.hltext_display: 10 new skills training institutions in offing by 2014
description.content:
THE Government is to construct 10 new skills training institutions by 2014 to increase life sustaining skills among citizens in various districts in the country, Ministry of Science, Technology and Vocational Training (MSTVT) Permanent Secretary Chriticles Mwansa has said.
Milenge, Kalabo and Isoka are the first three districts identified by MSTVT to have new institutions next year.
Mr Mwansa said construction of 10 new institutions was in line with the ministry’s 2010-2014 strategic plan of enhancing tertiary education in addition to universities.
Mr Mwansa said in the 2011 national Budget allocation to MSTVT, three new trades institutions would be constructed in Milenge, Kalabo and Isoka districts.
He said the Government’s desire was to increase access to Technical Education, Vocational and Entrepreneurship Training (TEVET) to boost skilled persons for the labour market.
He said construction of additional skills training institutions would help citizens become self reliant and contribute to improving the country’s economy and reduce poverty levels.
Mr Mwansa who was accompanied by directors from his ministry said this in Milenge District at the weekend when he inspected a 40 hectare land intended for construction of first trades training institution.
“It’s time we started giving life sustaining skills to people at different levels. I am happy to say the Government will take skills training institutions to all parts of the country and Milenge is one of the districts to receive a new institution next year,” he said
He said the budget funding for the 2009/2010 to MSTVT was partly used for acquisition of land, preparation of site plan and tendering of that massive project in Milenge District
He said the opening of the tenders had been done and evaluation of bids was in progress and a suitable contractor would be engaged to carry out construction works.
Milenge District Commissioner Rosemary Malutu said Milenge residents were happy with the Government’s efforts to uplift their livelihood through enhancing life sustaining skills.
She said Milenge was a challenging district due to underdevelopment in areas like road networks, communication, education and health services making people shun working in the district.
“We need more investors here to accelerate development because our district is faced with a number of challenges in areas of infrastructure development,” Ms Malutu said
Mr Mwansa also inspected construction of a K25 billion Milenge Boarding High School by Hua Jiang investment limited and was happy with progress made and the project was expected to be completed next year.
And Paramount Chief Mwata Kazembe has appealed to the Government to reopen Kanyembo Ntemena skills training centre in his chiefdom to provide youths with life skills projects.
The centre was opened as an initiative of paramount Chief Mwata Kazembe 14th but closed due to challenges that weakened it such as daily financial constraints to run it and paying instructors.
Speaking when Mr Mwansa paid a courtesy call on him at his palace, Chief Mwata Kazembe said the centre was significant in shaping youths livelihood and alleviating challenges of unemployment by enabling them acquire skills for self entrepreneurships.
The Chief hailed the Government for supporting Mansa Trades Training Institute and said reopening of Kanyembo Ntemena centre and Milenge institute would increase education standard in Luapula Province.
Mr Mwansa assured the chief of the Government’s intervention to look into modalities of reopening the trades centre and equip it with needed requisites for its operation.

description.hltext_display: Casillas cáfol, nem ugrott öss...
description.content: Casillas és Ronaldo között minden rendben, a kapus szerint csupán a média próbál történetet kreálni és szó sincs arról, hogy összevesztek volna. "Néhányan örülnek ha rossz hangulatot kelthetnek és megpróbálnak negatív híreket gyártani - mondta Casillas. - Remek viszonyban vagyok Ronaldóval, minden rendben van a csapatnál. Nem veszekedtünk és nem ugrottunk egymásnak, Ronaldo klassz srác, vidám fickó, egyikünk sem szeretné, ha problémák adódnának az öltözőben. Remélem, ezzel lezártuk ezt a sztorit."

description.hltext_display: Bale-ért harcba száll a Real M...
description.content:
Nem csoda hát, hogy Bale-ért fél Európa sorban áll, valós esélye azonban csak néhány topklubnak lehet. A Tottenham természetesen ragaszkodik a kiváló balszélsőhöz, de bizonyára létezik az az összeg, amelyért a londoniak hajlandóak lennének lemondani a játékosról. Harry Redknapp, a Tottenham menedzsere egyelőre hallani sem akar Bale eladásáról, pedig a hírek szerint a Real Madrid részéről nagyon komoly ajánlat érkezhet.
A királyi gárda állítólag mintegy negyvenegy millió eurót kínál Gareth Bale játékjogáért, s e csinos kis összeg mellé adna még egy játékost is. Mourinho szívesen hozzácsapná az ajánlathoz Karim Benzemát, aki egyelőre megfelelően helyettesíti a sérült Higuaínt, de a portugál mester hosszú távon nem számol a francia csatárral. Benzema mellett még Lassana Diarra vagy Esteban Granero is felmerülhet cserealapként.

description.hltext_display: Groupon expands deals to Napa and Modesto
description.content:
Chicago-based Groupon.com, which offers daily online coupon deals at restaurants and other businesses, has expanded its Northern California presence by launching in the Napa-Sonoma and Modesto markets.
Groupon, which opened in Sacramento in April, offers a deep-discount deal of the day. A specified number of prospective users must click "buy" before the daily offer expires.
If the minimum number sign up, credit cards are charged and interested parties are sent a link to print out their coupons. If the threshold is not reached, the deal is canceled, and cards are not charged.
For details, go to www.groupon.com. � Mark Glover

description.hltext_display: 361 Degrees Reports Sales Order Growth of 23% for the Autumn 2011 Season
description.content: New senior appointments to strengthen the management teamHONG KONG, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire-Asia/ -- 361 Degrees International Limited ("361 Degrees" or the "Company", together with its subsidiaries, the "Group"; HKEx stock code: 1361), one of the leading sports brand enterprises in China, is pleased to announce that its 2011 Autumn Trade Fair has concluded successfully in the Company's premises at Wuli Industrial Park, Jinjing City, Fujian Province, yesterday. The fair, which kicked off on Wednesday, 15 December, drew a total of about 4,000 visitors, including retail outlet owners and their staff, distributors and trade associates. Order Value +23% (as compared with 2010 Autumn Trade Fair) Volume -- Apparel +10% -- Footwear +8% ASP -- Apparel +13% -- Footwear +12% At the fair, products launched by the Company's new Design and R&D Centre in Guangzhou were displayed for the first time and excited the imagination of many. A brand new range of running shoes, the 3 series, featuring entirely fresh designs and the in-house developed NFO Technology, proved extremely popular with the retailers. Also displayed were also the higher-end, performance-enhancing shoes which were developed as a result of the work done for the Chinese National Teams in the handball, softball and field hockey competitions in the recently concluded 16th Asian Games in Guangzhou.The 2011 Autumn Collection is expected to be available in the retail outlets for sale from June 2011 onwards.In line with the established nature of its distributorship model, the discounts on an ex-factory basis will be reduced by 200 basis points from this Autumn Trade Fair.The Company is also pleased to announce two recent senior hires. Mr. Wang Hongzheng has joined the Company as Vice-President, Operations and Ms. Lydia Zhu as Vice-President, Brand Management. Mr. Wang was most latterly a senior management member at Metersbonwe whilst Ms. Zhu has spent over 10 years with Adidas China in a similar position. Mr. Ding Wuhao, President of the Company, in announcing these appointments, said, "We believe the addition of these two senior positions demonstrate the Company's determination to enhance the depth of its management team. We are confident the Company will build on its strong foundation to sustain growth in the industry."The Group is also pleased to report it has a retail network of over 7,100 stores as at the end of November, with a good geographical spread, and of which 70% are in Tier 3 or smaller cities.About 361 Degrees International Limited361 Degrees International Limited is one of the leading sports brand enterprises in China, possessing brand marketing, research and development, design, manufacturing, distribution and retail capabilities. The Group's products include footwear, apparel, accessories and equipment for sport and leisure uses. The Group has established an extensive supply chain management system through proprietary and sub-contracted manufacturing operations; and an exclusive distribution and retail network in China through distribution via authorized distributors.For further information, please contact: iPR Ogilvy LTD. Natalie Tam / Charis Yau / Summer Si / Janis Lai Tel: +852-2136-6182 / +852-2136-6183 / +852-2136-6953 / +852-3920-7646 Fax: +852-3170-6606 Email: natalie.tam@iprogilvy.com / charis.yau@iprogilvy.com / summer.si@iprogilvy.com / janis.lai@iprogilvy.com361 Degrees International Limited Chen Yuanfeng Email: yuanfeng@361sportshk.com / yuanfengchen@yahoo.com

description.hltext_display: FRA secures more storage space
description.content:
THE Food Reserve Agency (FRA) has secured additional storage space to ensure all crops purchased are safely stored.
According to a statement released by FRA public relations officer Mwamba Siame yesterday, the FRA has secured additional storage facilities to ensure all crops purchased by the agency were safely stored.
Ms Siame said the additional storage facilities were away from the depots from which the crops were purchased.
She said the purchased crops were being transported to the additional facilities across the country.
“FRA is managing spillages when transporting maize from satellite to main holding depots. The challenge of spillages is as a result of farmers having used ordinary bags instead of the ultra violet treated bags which do not break easily,” the statement read in part.
Ms Siame said the crop was held in the farmers’ bags as the FRA had run out of empty grain bags during the purchasing exercise.
The agency has also experienced difficulties in transporting stock from certain locations due to the bad terrain and roads which have become impassable because of the rains.
This has led to delays in moving the stock to holding depots.
Ms Siame said however, the agency has ensured that tarpaulins have been sent to satellite depots to cover the maize in difficult-to-reach areas.
She said FRA was keen to receive reports directly from stakeholders concerning storage of maize so that losses are minimised.

description.hltext_display: Emery: Jose Mourinho egy nyafogó gyerek
description.content: A Real Madrid edzője, José Mourinho a meccs után egy 13 játékvezetői tévedésből álló listát mutatott a sajtó munkatársainak, amelyekkel szerinte Clos Gómez súlyosan károsította csapatát. A portugál szakember szerint ha mindezt elmondaná, akkor azonnal eltiltanák, ezért inkább papírra vetette gondolatait. A Sevilla trénere, Unai Emery úgy véli, Mourinho úgy viselkedik, mint egy nyafogó gyerek. "Mourinho panasza egy nyafogó gyerekre emlékeztet - monta Emery. - Valamennyi edző képes lenne összeállítani egy listát a bírók tévedéseiről, de Mourinhón kívül senki sem tenne ilyet."

description.hltext_display: Protocol Employees Volunteer Nearly 1,000 Hours to Help Homeless Nationwide
description.content:
today revealed the successful outcome of its third quarter 2010 philanthropic initiative that resulted in U.S. employees clocking nearly 1,000 volunteer hours to help their local homeless shelters and soup kitchens. "In today's economy, homeless shelters and other services available to the underprivileged are overwhelmed," said Chris Haerich, Vice President of Compliance and head of Protocol's philanthropic efforts. "Our employees wanted to give back to those right in their own communities, those who have experienced firsthand the loss of a job or a home. Our Q3 project gave them the opportunity to do just that." In Protocol's six North American locations, employee volunteers--including executive management--worked nearly 1,000 hours for numerous organizations ranging from local homeless shelters to the Salvation Army. One location, Protocol's Merritt Island office, also collected four boxes of clothing for their organization, in addition to their volunteer time.
To close out the year of in Our Communities, the company's philanthropic efforts will include a Q4 canned food drive to help feed those in need at Thanksgiving, as well as a holiday toy drive to benefit local organizations. Visit our website to learn more about our charitable endeavors and partnership opportunities: http://www.protocolglobalsolutions.com/philanthropic. "We take great pride in our philanthropic programs," said Don Norsworthy, President and CEO. "But these programs would not be successful without the active input and dedication of our employees. We are a thriving and committed community because of them." Protocol is a single source provider of contact center services, case management and monitoring services, and cutting-edge marketing solutions. From contact center services for customer service, lead generation, customer acquisition and retention to up-sell, cross-sell, and winback campaigns, Protocol helps organizations grow, find, interact with, and retain customers through virtually every channel and touch point. In addition, Protocol proactively adds value to the relationships between its clients and their customers with depth and experience across a diverse range of verticals and services, including strategic and creative program development, leading technology, data analytics, and customized dashboard reporting. has over 2,200 employees in 8 locations across the U.S. and internationally. Learn more at http://www.protocolglobalsolutions.com.

description.hltext_display: Cá nhân, tổ chức chỉ được góp vốn th� nh lập 1 ngân h� ng thương mại
description.content:
60s >Kinh doanh > Chứng khoán - Tài chính > Ngân hàng
Cá nhân, tổ chức chỉ được góp vốn thành lập 1 ngân hàng thương mại
Nhiều cải tiến trong thủ tục cấp giấy phép thành lập và hoạt động ngân hàng thương mại cổ phần đã được Chính phủ thông qua tại Nghị quyết 60/NQ-CP phê duyệt phương án đơn giản hóa thủ tục hành chính của Ngân hàng Nhà nước Việt Nam.
Cụ thể, thủ tục được quy định rõ ràng, chặt chẽ hơn để người dân và doanh nghiệp dễ thực hiện, bởi quy chế cấp phép cũ chưa quy định rõ cách thức nộp hồ sơ, chưa xác định rõ thời hạn giải quyết. Cải tiến thứ nhất của thủ tục này là quy định nộp hồ sơ trực tiếp hoặc gửi quy bưu điện đến Cơ quan Thanh tra giám sát Ngân hàng Nhà nước.
Thứ hai là quy định thời hạn trả lời kết quả xác nhận về tình trạng hồ sơ theo hướng: trong thời hạn tối đa 2 ngày làm việc kể từ ngày nhận được hồ sơ đề nghị cấp giấy phép, Ngân hàng Nhà nước Việt Nam (cụ thể là Cơ quan Thanh tra giám sát ngân hàng) phải có giấy biên nhận (nếu kiểm tra đủ hồ sơ theo quy định) hoặc thông báo về tình trạng hồ sơ để yêu cầu bổ sung (nếu hồ sơ chưa đầy đủ hoặc thành phần hồ sơ chưa đúng theo quy định).
Bởi theo phân tích của Cục Kiểm soát thủ tục hành chính, nếu không thực hiện việc xác nhận tình trạng hồ sơ như trên thì việc xác định đã nộp đầy đủ hồ sơ của tổ chức cũng không có ý nghĩa và càng không có cơ sở pháp lý để kiểm tra, đánh giá tinh thần trách nhiệm của cơ quan, cá nhân giải quyết thủ tục hành chính.
Về yêu cầu số lượng ngân hàng được phép thành lập, thủ tục hành chính này sẽ được hoàn thiện bằng quy định mỗi cá nhân hoặc tổ chức và người có liên quan của cá nhân hoặc tổ chức đứng đơn chỉ được tham gia góp vốn thành lập 1 ngân hàng (bao gồm cả ngân hàng đang hoạt động); không được tham gia góp vốn thành lập ngân hàng nếu cá nhân hoặc cá nhân đó cùng với người có liên quan đang sở hữu mức cổ phần trọng yếu của một ngân hàng; tổ chức hoặc tổ chức đó cùng với người có liên quan đang sở hữu từ 10% vốn điều lệ trở lên của một ngân hàng.
Như vậy điểm cải cách của thủ tục này so với quy định hiện hành là ở chỗ, quy định hiện nay đang cho phép cá nhân hoặc tổ chức và người có liên quan của cá nhân hoặc tổ chức đó được tham gia thành lập 2 ngân hàng. Điều này gây khó khăn cho hoạt động quản lý Nhà nước trong khi đóng góp của cá nhân, tổ chức này đối với ngân hàng bị dàn trải, xét trên phương diện từng ngân hàng.
Đối với cổ đông sáng lập là cá nhân, thủ tục bổ sung thêm điều kiện liên quan đến năng lực (là người quản lý doanh nghiệp kinh doanh có lãi trong ít nhất 3 năm liền kề năm xin thành lập ngân hàng), trình độ (có bằng đại học hoặc trên đại học về ngành thuộc lĩnh vực tài chính, ngân hàng, quản trị kinh doanh kinh tế hoặc luật)...
Đối với cổ đông sáng lập là tổ chức không phải là ngân hàng thương mại, thủ tục yêu cầu bảo đảm có vốn chủ sở hữu tối thiểu 500 tỷ đồng trong 5 năm liền kề với năm đề nghị thành lập ngân hàng; kinh doanh có lãi trong 5 năm liền kề với năm đề nghị thành lập ngân hàng.
Báo cáo tài chính phải được kiểm toán bằng tổ chức đủ tiêu chuẩn
Cũng theo phương án đơn giản hóa thủ tục hành chính cấp giấy phép thành lập và hoạt động ngân hàng thương mại cổ phần, báo cáo tài chính sẽ phải được kiểm toán độc lập bởi công ty kiểm toán thuộc danh sách các tổ chức kiểm toán đã được Bộ Tài chính công bố đủ tiêu chuẩn kiểm toán doanh nghiệp; đồng thời tăng chất lượng của báo cáo tài chính.
Đặc biệt, quy định mới còn bổ sung điều kiện liên quan đến khâu hậu kiểm (giám sát sau cấp phép) để tăng tính trách nhiệm của tổ chức, cá nhân khi thành lập ngân hàng vì hiện nay chưa có quy định về vấn đề này.

description.hltext_display: 'Santa Claus' robs US yacht club bar
description.content:
CALL it a ho-ho-holdup.
Police say a man dressed as Santa Claus has robbed a Rhode Island yacht club.
Authorities say a bartender was alone in the East Providence Yacht Club Sunday night when a large man wearing a red suit, red hat, white beard and carrying a sack walked into the bar and brandished a gun.
The bartender fled and ran to a nearby business where she called police.
By the time police arrived, the Santa bandit and an undetermined amount of cash from the register were gone.
Co-owner Tony Perry tells WLNE-TV he's just glad no one was hurt.
There were no immediate arrests.

event_or_fact.property: he's just glad no one was hurt

description.hltext_display: Suns beat Thunder
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: Oklahoma City Thunder rumbled in the last five games bysweeping all of them with victory. The roar was eventually stopped by the Phoenix Suns today. Minnesota Timberwolves, New Orleans Hornets, ClevelandCavaliers, Houston Rockets and Sacramento Kings are the fifthteam that defeated the Thunder. But Grant Hill might bring goodrecords is to stop the Suns. Suns win 113-110. Hill scored 30 points in a match that was held in Oklahoma CityArena on Monday (12/20/2010) noon CST. Meanwhile, SteveNash scored 20 points and 10assist after returning from a neck injury that had support it. Nash had an important role in this victory. Duafree-throw that hebrought the Suns leading 112-109 executions when the game just six seconds remaining. "With all our circumstances today, we played well today," said Suns coach Alvin Gentry as reported by Reuters. "Our defense was great, we shot the ball well, I think this is a greatvictory." For the Suns, this is the second victory in the last five games, inwhich the rest of the other three games ended in defeat. Naturally,if Gentry was pleased with this victory. Star Thunder, Kevin Durant, scored 28 points in this match. But hecould not do much to help his team from defeat.

event_or_fact.property: With all our circumstances today, we played well today; Our defense was great, we shot the ball well, I thinkthis is a greatvictory.

description.hltext_display: La Cañada de los Pájaros se ahoga con el temporal
description.content:
La lluvia llena el humedal de arena y escombros de otras fincas.
Las últimas lluvias ahogan la reserva natural de la Cañada de los Pájaros hasta el punto de que temen su desaparición inminente. Si hace un mes la situación era ya de por sí "crítica" por la colmatación de sedimentos de las fincas colindantes, éstos han tomado este paraje arrastrados por las tormentas de noviembre y diciembre. "La situación está peor que el año pasado", apuntó Maribel Adrián, la propietaria de esta reserva natural situada en plena área metropolitana y en la que convive una población cercana a las 2.000 aves.
Precisó que la Cañada de los Pájaros está "supercolmatada" y las últimas lluvias han hecho que "se esté llenando de vertidos y escombros" procedentes de las fincas colindantes, que en otro tiempo estaban bien conservadas, pero que en la actualidad, según explicó, sufren deforestación, cambios en el cauce de agua, gradeo del terreno y relleno de áreas húmedas con basura. La Cañada de los Pájaros está al final de una pequeña cuenca y lo que hagan sus vecinos tiene un efecto devastador en su hábitat.
El último caso, según denunció su propietaria, procede de una finca colindante aguas arriba que "con su actuación ha modificado el cauce" y ha arrastrado escombros y vertidos al humedal. "Es como si un recipiente se llenara de tierra y, por lo tanto, recogiera menos agua", ejemplificó, no sin antes recordar que eso acarrea perjuicios que van desde la pérdida de especies a la falta de visitantes, que no acuden al lugar por estar anegado y dañado. La nueva situación pone en peligro incluso a la carretera que une La Puebla del Río e Isla Mayor, que "se llena de agua" por la coincidencia de las precipitaciones y la actuación de estas fincas, que ha elevado la cota del humedal dos metros más de lo debido.
El malestar es evidente, aunque no sólo con sus vecinos. Tanto la Consejería de Medio Ambiente como la Comisión Europea han abierto investigaciones, pero sin tomar decisiones más allá. "Pese a que hay ocho expedientes de denuncia, la Junta de Andalucía no los agiliza ni hace un seguimiento, mientras las fincas siguen actuando de la misma manera", insistió la propietaria. También señaló que en el caso de la UE las investigaciones "se dilatan más en el tiempo" y, como prueba, aportó que en septiembre se anunció que iba a evaluar los daños a la Cañada de los Pájaros y todavía no se ha personado nadie en este paraje que está incluido dentro de la Red de Espacios Naturales Protegidos de Andalucía.
Pese a tantos revés, los responsables de este humedal sí han encontrado algo de apoyo en las asociaciones de ecologistas. De este modo, la asociación para la defensa de la naturaleza WWF criticó a la Consejería de Medio Ambiente, a la que pidió que realice "un mayor esfuerzo para impedir que las lluvias de este año acaben por enterrar la Cañada de los Pájaros". En ese sentido, el colectivo propone acciones preventivas como deslindar las áreas de dominio público de forma urgente e impedir "más actuaciones ilegales" en este entorno.
El portavoz de WWF, Juan José Carmona, precisó que las fincas "actúan ilegalmente después de ser denunciadas y a plena luz del día" desde hace años, sin que "haya nadie que lo impida".
La Cañada de los Pájaros, que es la primera reserva natural privada de España, nació en 1987, cuando dos biólogos restauraron una antigua escombrera. Una vez recuperado este enclave, donde conviven especies tan raras como la focha cornuda o la cerceta pardilla, se convirtió en un lugar idóneo para los amantes del avistamiento de aves, que proceden en su mayoría del extranjero.

description.hltext_display: Biggest storm yet heads for Calif; homes evacuated
description.author: GILLIAN FLACCUS
description.content:
LOS ANGELES -- After days of relentless rain, Southern California is awaiting the most intense storm system yet, with evacuations ordered, rescue crews on standby and residents anxiously eyeing already saturated mountainsides denuded by wildfires.
Forecasters expected more rain across the state Wednesday, but the focus clearly was on Southern California where a monster storm was expected to bring torrential rain, thunderstorms, flooding, hail and possible tornadoes and water spouts. Forecasters warned of possible rainfall rates of .75 inch to 1 inch an hour and thunderstorm rates of 2 inches an hour in the region.
Steady rain began falling late Tuesday and was expected to intensify into early Wednesday. "It's going to be a three-ring circus," said National Weather Service spokesman Bill Hoffer. "There's going to be a six-hour time frame in the early morning when it's really going to be dumping on us." Officials on Tuesday ordered evacuation of 232 homes in La Canada Flintridge and La Crescenta, foothill suburbs of Los Angeles below steep hillsides that burned in 2009 and where mudslides inundated homes and backyards in February.
Walt Kalepsch said his backyard filled up with mud and debris last winter, but he planned to stay the night with his wife and daughter. "If it gets really terrible, we'll leave. But we've been evacuated so many times, it's like the city's crying wolf," he said. "During the rest of the year, it's absolutely gorgeous. It was just one big wildfire that changed everything." As the "Pineapple Express" system swept Pacific Ocean moisture across Nevada, Arizona and Utah, Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger declared a state of emergency in six counties.
The huge and powerful low pressure system off the West Coast pushed precipitation right into the Great Basin. "It takes a lot of energy to push that moisture over the mountains," said NWS meteorologist Dave Bruno. "This kind of storm could march right across the country and create a lot of bad weather along the way. It could affect the Southern Plains on Thursday and Friday. If it sticks together it'll hit Florida by Saturday." With rain falling up and down the state, Sierra Nevada ski resorts boasted of record-breaking December snowfall, with the storms bringing a total of 10 1/2 to 15 1/2 feet to Mammoth Mountain.
Rescuers had to pluck some stranded motorists from rain-swollen creeks. Shoppers dodged puddles while buying last-minute Christmas gifts. Disney resorts canceled a plan to shower visitors with artificial snow.
In Orange County, four hikers missing overnight in a flooded canyon in the Cleveland National Forest were rescued Tuesday morning by helicopter after their car was trapped along swollen Trabuco Creek. Rescuers used a bulldozer to retrieve five other people who became stranded by the creek.
Downtown Los Angeles received more than a third of its annual average rainfall in less than a week.
Parts of the San Gabriel Mountains got more than 18 inches of rain since Friday, with coastal cities like Santa Monica and Long Beach getting more than six inches, the National Weather Service said.
Mudslides are a significant risk for three years after a fire and are especially likely anytime the rainfall rate reaches or exceeds one inch per hour, said Susan Cannon, a research geologist with the U.S. Geological Survey.
That's a likely scenario Wednesday in the area burned by last year's Station Fire, which charred 250 square miles above the suburbs tucked below the San Gabriel Mountains. "It means that once the heaviest rains start, it should be a very active time up there," Cannon said. For all the perils of the torrential rains, there was a silver lining: The water is expected to help ease the effects of years of drought. Thursday is expected to be dry, with sunshine. There will be light rain on Christmas Day in parts of California.
Water content in the snow pack in California's mountains was at 197 percent of normal and 169 percent of the average measurement for April 1 - traditionally the date when the snow's water content is at its peak, said Ted Thomas, spokesman for the California Department of Water Resources.
As the snow melts, that water will run off into reservoirs that feed the state's extensive agriculture and city water systems. ---

description.hltext_display: Formel BMW - Rückblick 2010: Robin Frijns, der letzte Meister: Spannung bis zum Finale
description.author: Fabian Schneider
description.content:
Motorsport-Magazin.com - Als Meister der 2010 wird Robin Frijns in die Geschichtsbücher der Nachwuchsserie eingehen. Nicht unbedingt, weil er allen anderen Piloten um die Ohren gefahren ist oder besonders viele Rennen gewonnen hat - sondern weil es die letzte Saison dieser Art war. Die wird, genau wie die Ableger in Asien und Amerika, eingestellt.
Die Kosten sind einfach zu groß geworden, im Rahmen der Formel 1 wurde eine Saison von Jahr zu Jahr teurer. 2010 musste ein Fahrer schon beinahe eine halbe Million Euro mitbringen, wenn er bei einem Top-Team andocken wollte. Ab 2011 gibt es einen Talent Cup, in dem man mit den alten Fahrzeugen abseits von großen Veranstaltungen junge Fahrer sichten wird.
Bereits im Juli kündigte BMW das Ende der eigenen Formel-Meisterschaft an. Zu diesem Zeitpunkt war die Saison natürlich noch voll im Gange, erst drei Rennwochenenden waren absolviert. Nach einer Nullrunde zum Auftakt in Barcelona lag der spätere Meister zu diesem Zeitpunkt noch 33 Punkte hinter seinem ärgsten Rivalen Jack Harvey zurück.
Harvey lag bis zum Finale in Führung
Der Brite wusste vor allem auf dem Stadtkurs in Valencia zu überzeugen, auf dem er in beiden Rennen die maximale Punktzahl holte. Danach ging es ausgerechnet nach Silverstone, ein Heimspiel für Harvey. Und auch dort war er erfolgreich: "Das ist erneut ein fantastisches Ergebnis. Ich hatte einen ziemlich guten Start. Robin blieb mir in den ersten drei Runden auf den Fersen, dann konnte ich mich jedoch entscheidend absetzen."
In der Meisterschaft konnte sich Harvey danach nicht mehr weiter absetzen. Sein Vorsprung schmolz langsam aber sicher, auch weil Frijns jeweils ein Rennen in Hockenheim, Budapest und Spa-Francorchamps für sich entschied. Eine Entscheidung sollte aber erst beim großen Finale in Monza fallen. Mit 17 Punkten Rückstand ging Frijns in die letzten beiden Rennen der Formel BMW, eine Vorentscheidung fiel dann schon am Samstag. Während Frijns das Rennen souverän für sich entschied, holte Jack Harvey nur einen Punkt - und war plötzlich nicht mehr der Gejagte, sonder der Jäger. Im 16. und letzten Lauf des Jahres gewann Harvey zwar, den Rückstand auf seinen niederländischen Gegner konnte er allerdings nicht mehr egalisieren.
Direkt nach dem erfolgreichen Finale jubelte Frijns: "Ich weiß noch gar nicht so recht, wie ich mich fühlen soll. Wenn ich zu Hause bin, werde ich noch einmal über alles nachdenken und mich wohl dann erst richtig als Champion fühlen. Nachdem, was gestern alles passiert ist, kann ich es noch gar nicht wirklich glauben. Das hätte ich nicht erwartet. Wenn man sich das gesamte Jahr ansieht, dann hatten Jack und ich jeweils einen Unfall. Es ist also ausgeglichen. Sein Unfall im vorletzten Lauf war für ihn natürlich sehr unglücklich, da ich mich dadurch an die Spitze setzen konnte." Bis zum allerletzten Lauf der war die Spannung groß. Am Ende setzte sich Robin Frijns durch.

description.hltext_display: BAM bouwt scholen in deelgemeente Londen
description.content:
� Vragen over frequenties of andere vragen? ANP
BUNNIK (AFN) - BAM heeft met London Borough of Camden Council, een deelgemeente van Londen, financiële overeenstemming bereikt over de bouw van drie scholen. Dat maakte de bouwer woensdag bekend.
Met de opdracht is een investering gemoeid van circa 90 miljoen euro. De financiering daarvan wordt verstrekt door verzekeraar Aviva. Het betreft de bouw van een academisch pand voor University College London en een school voor speciaal onderwijs voor kinderen van 3 tot 19 jaar.
Verder staan de bouw en renovatie van South Camden Community Secondary School op het programma. De bouwwerkzaamheden gaan direct van start. De oplevering van de eerste school is voorzien in juni 2012, aldus BAM. � Om reacties te kunnen plaatsen moet je ingelogd zijn. Ga naar 'Mijn BNR' om in te loggen.

description.hltext_display: Big names emerge in push for new Sacramento arena
description.author: rlillis@sacbee.com (Ryan Lillis and Tony Bizjak
description.content:
The effort to build a new sports arena in Sacramento has gone national.
In recent days competing teams have emerged that include some of the country's most prolific developers of arenas and stadiums.
One group began talking last week at the request of Mayor Kevin Johnson. It includes ICON Venue Group, developer of two dozen arenas and stadiums around the world; Turner Construction, the national firm building the new jet concourse at Sacramento International Airport; and local developer David Taylor.
And re-emerging in the game Tuesday was developer Gerry Kamilos, who spearheaded the now-dead proposal to build an arena in the downtown railyard through a land swap involving the State Fair.
In a letter to city officials, Kamilos said he has teamed with Hunt Construction, which headed the construction team for the massive new Amway Center in Orlando, and recently broke ground on the Barclays Center in New York, future home of the New Jersey Nets. Hunt officials could not be reached for comment.
Kamilos said his team also has added one of the largest architectural and engineering firms in the world, AECOM, as well as companies with experience in transportation projects. He said he would submit a preliminary proposal by the end of the month.
The mayor, who has pushed for more than a year to build a new home for the Sacramento Kings that could also host other entertainment events, said he is pleased new groups have emerged.
"It's like waking up on Christmas morning with a whole bunch of gifts wrapped up under the tree � you don't know exactly what will be in the individual boxes, but you do know it will be something good," Johnson said in an e-mail.
The mayor set up a conference call Dec. 13 with developer Taylor, the ICON group and others, then left the room once introductions had been made.
The mayor's aides said his involvement doesn't mean he would favor a proposal submitted by the group over others being vetted by a task force he convened to analyze project bids.
ICON is a well-known developer of sports arenas, having worked on the Pepsi Center in Denver, Sprint Center in Kansas City and the O2 arena in London. The firm was chosen recently as the project manager for a new football stadium proposed for downtown Los Angeles.
Melissa Heiter, an ICON spokeswoman, would not comment on the company's interest in getting involved in a project here.
In addition to the Sacramento airport project, Turner Construction was involved in construction of the new Yankee Stadium in New York. A Turner spokeswoman did not return a phone call seeking comment.
Taylor, downtown Sacramento's most successful developer, was involved in Kamilos' previous arena proposal that called for the State Fair to move from Cal Expo to the Natomas site where the Kings now play. Proceeds from the development of the Cal Expo site would have helped pay for a new arena in the downtown railyard.
The railyard remains a likely candidate for an arena in both new proposals.
Taylor said getting an arena built in Sacramento will require a multifaceted development team.
"It is going to take a combination of lots of things � the correct designer, the correct builder, construction manager, the correct group to negotiate terms with the city, the Maloofs, the NBA and any private investors," he said. "I feel like I bring some local, downtown experience perhaps no one else can bring."
Architect Dan Meis, designer of the Staples Center in Los Angeles, and Adam Mendelsohn, a Sacramento political consultant who is one of the mayor's advisers, have been involved in the group's talks. Both previously sat on the mayor's arena task force.
No proposal has developed yet, but the group is expected to submit a letter expressing interest in the project to the mayoral arena task force by next week.
Kamilos, meanwhile, said he is trying to bring more expertise to the table.
"Going through the process with the city made us aware we needed to bring additional experience on intermodal facilities and also bring near-term experience on arenas, companies that understand the current costs and implementation," he said.
Kamilos declined to offer details of his revised plan but described it as an improved product.
His proposal, along with at least two others, will be analyzed by the mayoral task force next month. That analysis will be delivered to the City Council before a council discussion Jan. 25.
Other proposals are in the works as well.
A group proposing an arena for the current Arco Arena site in Natomas has said it would re-submit a plan to the arena task force.
And Larry Kelley, developer of the McClellan Business Park, is continuing to work on a proposal for a downtown arena along with attorney Mike Kvarme and downtown businessman Ali Mackani.
Kamilos said he welcomed the competition. "Being able to approach a solution at many different angles is great; it's great for the community to have different ideas."

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
� Vragen over frequenties of andere vragen? AMSTERDAM (AFN) - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak, bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent. � Om reacties te kunnen plaatsen moet je ingelogd zijn. Ga naar 'Mijn BNR' om in te loggen.

description.content: 0 X Factor winners don't last because they are X Factor winners. They have been plumped, processed, stuffed and auto-tuned in Simon Cowell's sausage factory until they are no longer the person you first saw on the magic box. They are interchangeable. You don't support them. You support Team X Factor. The players can come and go.

description.hltext_display: British Accessories Brand Kennett set for International Retail Expansion
description.content:
British Fashion brand; Kennett is set for International retail expansion in 2011 thanks to a number of new distribution deals with European partners. The Kennett brand has attracted global praise and interest in their range of rare Cufflinks and have since developed a range of Kennett Watches. The Kennett watches are manufactured in Hong Kong and incorporate quality Japanese Movements and are waterproof to a minimum of 100 M - and gauranteed for 2 years against mechanical fault.
On plans for 2011 Tom Kennett comments, "2010 has been a fantastic year for us - we have launched our second collection of cufflinks and debuted our range of watches to the online christmas markets in over 5 countries. 2011 will allow us to move forward with confidence into the retail markets and the Cufflink and Watch products go very well together. In our home market we have had a number of large high street retailers express an interest in retailing our products early in the New Year - add this to agreements with a number of foreign distributors, we are expecting significant sales growth early next year" In addition to retail expansion, the Kennett brand will also be expanding online with the launch of an American E Commerce platform for the Kennett brand - the micro shop will offer US customers shopping in US Dollars with product held and shipped out of California. Tom Kennett comments " We have many US customers already; from wedding planners to bespoke tailors to successful businessmen - however this business tends to come through our online partners. At a time when alot of Americans are still focused on the Economy and are not always comfortable ordering from foreign lands we wanted to make it that bit easier for US consumers to get hold of our products in an economical and secure fashion - our new US shopping zone will offer just that!" The Kennett brand is currently seeking Distribution partners, Online Retailers in a number of countries - please contact Kennett or visit http://www.kennettonline.com

description.hltext_display: Gwyneth Paltrow: From Screen Siren To Domestic Goddess
description.content:
0 The culinary and celebrity worlds have been drooling in anticipation of the release of Gwyneth Paltrow's first cookbook since the Hollywood actress appeared on the cover of US Vogue back in August prepping some grub in her New York kitchen.
It's been a long wait: My Father's Daughter: Delicious, Easy Recipes Celebrating Family and Togetherness was announced way back in February 2009, and will finally hit shelves in April. This week we discovered what the book will contain after the influential US food blog eater.com ran extracts from its cover sleeve.
Independent item

description.hltext_display: DRS - Wartburg Rallye ohne DRM Prädikat: Hoffnungen nicht erfüllt
description.author: Uwe Köllner
description.content:
Motorsport-Magazin.com - Der MC Eisenach hatte sich in den vergangenen fünf Jahren jeweils um das höchste Prädikat im Deutschen Rallyesport beworben. "Das Ergebnis war stets konstant. Jedes Jahr erhielten wir eine Ablehnung, nur die Gründe variierten", erklärt Thomas Gimm, Pressesprecher des MC Eisenach.
Weiter erläutert Thomas Grimm: "Die fehlende Berücksichtigung der Rallye Wartburg im Kalender der DRM enttäuscht mich weniger als die Tatsache, dass ein wirksames aufeinander Zugehen der beiden Automobilclubs AvD und ADAC nicht gelungen ist. Weder die deutschlandweit einmalige Schotterrallye in der Lausitz, noch die Sachsen Rallye oder die Thüringer Rallye wurden bei der Prädikatsvergabe berücksichtigt.
Der regionale Schwerpunkt der bundesweiten Meisterschaft sollten alle Beteiligten nachdenklich stimmen. Wie ist es denn zu erklären, dass sich 20 Jahre nach der Wiedervereinigung eine bundesweite Meisterschaft ohne einen Wertungslauf im rallyeverrückten Osten etabliert. Die 52. Auflage der Rallye Wartburg wollten wir nutzen, um langfristig entscheiden zu können, ob eine gemeinsame Organisation von DRM und DRS mit unseren personellen und finanziellen Ressourcen überhaupt möglich ist.
Nicht nur, dass der Rallye Wartburg des DRM-Prädikat verwehrt bleibt, die Loyalität gegenüber der Deutschen Rallye Serie hat für den MC Eisenach auch finanzielle Konsequenzen. Wir müssen im Moment davon ausgehen, dass wir zukünftig keine Unterstützung seitens des ADAC für die Rallye Wartburg erhalten werden. Dementsprechend machen wir uns derzeit intensiv Gedanken, wie wir langfristig eine finanzielle Unabhängigkeit erreichen können, um unser Engagement auch in Zukunft fortsetzen zu können.
Mit der vergangenen Ausgabe der Rallye Wartburg sind wir mit zahlreichen Neuerungen ein großes Risiko eingegangen. Die Rückmeldungen waren durchweg positiv, so dass wir auch bei der 52. Auflage vom 5. bis zum 7. August 2011 ein Mix aus Bewährtem und Neuem bieten werden". Alle Rallyeveranstalter aus dem Osten erfüllen nicht die Kriterien des DMSB für ein DRM Prädikat.

description.hltext_display: Michael Neil To Leave Bertrams And Join Waterstone's As Commercial Director
description.content:
0 Bertrams today announces Michael Neil, Managing Director, is to leave the business and will be joining Waterstone's as their new Commercial Director.
Commenting on leaving Bertrams, Michael Neil said:
'Bertrams is a fantastic company with wonderful staff and a loyal group of customers.
Over the past three and a half years we've achieved a tremendous amount: successfully negotiating a Competition Commission enquiry and integrating the THE business; extricating the Company from the demise of Woolworths; and successfully moving the Library Services business from Leeds to Norwich.
I'd like to thank Mark Cashmore and the Smiths News team for the support they have given Bertrams. The business is in good hands and I look forward working with Bertrams and building on the relationship, following my move to Waterstone's'
Smith's News Chief Executive Mark Cashmore said:
'Michael has done a fantastic job as MD of Bertrams. We will be sorry to see him go, but understand his reasons and wish him well.'
Michael's last day at Bertrams will be on Christmas Eve and he joins Waterstone's on 31st January 2011.
Whilst a successor is appointed Ian Hendrie, currently Bertrams Finance and Commercial Director, will become Interim Managing Director of Bertram Books, reporting directly to Smiths News Chief Executive Mark Cashmore. Steve Carter, currently Managing Director Bertram Library Services will also report directly to Mark Cashmore.
For further information please contact:
Michael Neil:
email Michael.Neil@bertrams.com;
phone 07918 032641
Smiths News PR
Kerrie Colford
email kerrie.colford@smithsnews.co.uk
phone 01793 563516

description.hltext_display: Foursquare location service adds comment, photos
description.content:
SAN FRANSISCO: Foursquare, a popular location-sharing service for smart phones, is now letting you upload a photo of that tasty burger you're about to bite into. You can also let your friend know, through a comment on his recent check-in at a bar around the corner, that you'll meet him when you're done chowing down.
Photos that you upload with check-ins will only be viewable by your friends on Foursquare and other social networks with which you share your Foursquare data. Those could include Facebook and Twitter.
You can also upload photos to go with tips or the location itself _ such as to show a cool vintage sign on a building's facade. Those will be available for anyone using Foursquare to see.
Only your friends on Foursquare and friends of your friends will be able to view comments.
Foursquare is one of a growing number of startups that let users broadcast their location to friends and strangers using a phone application. By far the biggest among them is Facebook, which recently introduced Places.
Foursquare has more than 5 million users, and they check in with the site more than 1.5 million times each day. Users earn virtual badges once they've earned a certain number of check-in points or complete a task, such as riding a ferry. Users can become ``mayors'' by checking in at a location more than any other visitor.
The new features was rolled out in an updated app for Apple iPhone on Monday, and for smart phones running Google Android operating software next week. Users of Research In Motion Ltd BlackBerry smart phones will get the features in January.
Alex Rainert, Foursquare's head of product, said Friday that new features should enhance how users interact with each other and perhaps inspire them to add more information about the places they're going and things they're doing.
"Everything always ratchets back to building tools that change the way people experience the world around them," he said.
Foursquare plans to add more features, too, such as the ability to send your posted photos on to

description.hltext_display: Children's Book Charity Has Funding Cut By 100pc
description.content:
pc Posted at 8:12AM Wednesday 22 Dec 2010
A charity that helps children learn to read by providing them with free books has had its Government funding cut in its entirety.
Booktrust, an independent national charity, announced it will lose all its funding for its three programmes Bookstart, Booktime and Booked Up from April.

description.hltext_display: Kindle Sales Are Said To Exceed Estimates
description.content:
0 Amazon.com Inc. is likely to sell more than 8 million Kindle electronic-book readers this year, at least 60 percent more than analysts have predicted, according to two people who are aware of the company's sales projections.
Analysts surveyed by Bloomberg estimated, on average, that the company would sell 5 million Kindles in 2010. Last year, Amazon sold about 2.4 million Kindles, said one of the people, who asked to remain anonymous because the company doesn't disclose Kindle sales figures.
Business Week

description.hltext_display: Pub among offerings new to city
description.content:
Just in time for the holiday feasting season, more eateries are serving up culinary gifts. They include:
Tilted Kilt Pub & Eatery opens today at Jefferson Pointe in the former El Patrn Mexican restaurant. The menu features steak, meatloaf, shepherds pie, fish and chips, pizza, pasta, wings, burgers and sandwiches. Regular hours will be 11 a.m. to midnight Sundays to Thursdays and 11 a.m. to 1 a.m. Fridays and Saturdays. For information, call 459-3985. Chuck & Birds Market, at 4301 Fairfield Ave. in the former Hartleys, sells a variety of regionally produced meats, dairy products, breads and other specialty items. Local vendors include Gunthorp Farms, Seven Sons, Yoders Popcorn and Sechlers Pickles. Hours are 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. Tuesdays to Thursdays and 10 a.m. to 9 p.m. Fridays and Saturdays. For information, call 387-5000.
A dine-in bistro is coming soon. In the meantime, you can visit the online grocery store (with delivery available to certain areas) at ChuckAndBirds.com.
Taste of Thai & Chinese Buffet will open soon at 6011 Bluffton Road near the post office, in the former Zhengs Buffet. Let the Fort Wayne Marriott do the cooking for you, in the form of a buffet that will be open from 10:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. Christmas Day.
It will include prime rib, ham, chicken Chardonnay, crab-stuffed salmon, shrimp cocktail, vegetables, salads, breads and desserts. Its $30 for adults, $15 for children ages 5 to 12 and free for children 4 and younger. Reservations are required; call 484-0411.
The Red River Steakhouse breakfast buffet will be available from 7 to 9:30 a.m. that day. Reservations are accepted.
The steakhouse also has this feature: Get a $10 lobster tail with the purchase of a steak, after 5 p.m. daily. Joseph Decuis in Roanoke has been named one of the best 50 restaurants in the country, according to Open Table, the free online restaurant reservation system. Its the only Indiana restaurant to make the Best Overall list, which is based on more than 7 million customer reviews during the past year. Restaurants from 22 states and Washington, D.C., made the list.
Other local restaurants that accept reservations through Open Table are Baker Street, Club Soda and Eddie Merlots. Joseph Decuis is celebrating its 10th anniversary this year. In August, staff members were invited to prepare dinner at the famed James Beard House in New York City. Ring in the New Year at the Philmore on Broadway, with catering by Pamela Downs, whose family owned Hartleys. Pop n Fresh will perform.
Tickets are $30, which includes appetizers, party favors and a midnight champagne toast. To reserve them, call 745-1000.
If you want to celebrate twice the same night, head to J K ODonnells, 121 W. Wayne St. Theyll cheer the Irish New Year at 7 p.m. and the American version at midnight, with a champagne toast for both. Rhapsody in Wax will perform. No cover charge. Halls Triangle Park, 3010 Trier Road, has this December special: Get a 10-ounce prime rib with two sides for $14.99. Add a 5-ounce lobster tail for $10. Plus, all margaritas and daiquiris are $3 and 16-ounce domestic draft beers are $2.50.
A Taste of India, 5515 Coldwater Road, has added a dinner buffet on Friday and Saturday nights for $11.99. The lunch buffet still is available from 11 a.m. to 2 p.m. daily, for $7.99 on weekdays and $8.99 on weekends.

description.hltext_display: Groei Japanse economie zwakt volgend jaar af
description.content:
� Vragen over frequenties of andere vragen? Drukke straat inTokio. EPA
TOKIO (AFN) - De groei van de Japanse economie zal in het komende gebroken boekjaar 2011/2012 afzwakken tot 1,5 procent. Voor het lopende boekjaar wordt nog gerekend op een economische groei van 3,1 procent. Dat liet de Japanse overheid woensdag weten.
Daarmee groeit de Japanse economie dit lopende boekjaar, dat eind maart afloopt, wel sterker dan eerder werd gedacht. De regering rekende oorspronkelijk voor het boekjaar 2010/2011 op een groei van 2,6 procent.
De afzwakkende economische groei in 2011 houdt vooral verband met de zwakke binnenlandse bestedingen in Japan en het wegebbende effect van de steunmaatregelen. Ook zet de sterke yen de export onder druk. De regering verwacht dat de werkloosheid in Japan volgend jaar zal dalen tot 4,7 procent van de huidige 5 procent. De Japanse export Woensdag werd verder bekendgemaakt dat de Japanse export in november voor het eerst in negen maanden weer sterker is toegenomen. De uitvoer klom met 9,1 procent vergeleken met een jaar eerder. In oktober steeg de export nog met 7,8 procent.
Vooral de Japanse export naar andere delen van Azië zat in de lift. De export naar Aziatische landen klom met 13 procent, geleid door China met een exportgroei van 18,3 procent. De uitvoer De uitvoer van Japanse producten naar de Europese Unie steeg vorige maand met 10,1 procent. De export richting de Verenigde Staten zwakte in november af tot 1,2 procent. In oktober steeg de Japanse export naar de VS nog met 4,7 procent.
De Japanse import klom in november met 14,2 procent. Het handelsoverschot van Japan bedroeg vorige maand 162,8 miljard yen (1,48 miljard euro). � Om reacties te kunnen plaatsen moet je ingelogd zijn. Ga naar 'Mijn BNR' om in te loggen.

description.hltext_display: DTM - Rückblick 2010: Bruno Spengler: Schwaches Ende und Qualifying kosten Fabelsaison
description.author: Frederik Hackbarth
description.content:
Motorsport-Magazin.com - Auf dem Papier ist das Jahr 2010 nur Bruno Spenglers drittbeste DTM-Saison. 2006 und 2007 schloss der Mercedes-Pilot jeweils auf Rang zwei und mit dem Vizetitel ab. Am Ende der vergangenen Saison stand nur Platz drei zu Buche. Doch nicht nur beim Blick auf die Punkteanzahl wird klar: Spengler war nie besser unterwegs. Den Titel ließ er sich zum Schluss aber dennoch vor der Nase wegschnappen.
Am Ende kann Bruno Spengler 2010 acht Podestplätze bei elf Saisonrennen vorweisen. Zwei mal schaffte es der 27-Jährige im vergangenen Jahr auf die höchste Stufe. Somit stehen am Ende einer ganz starken Performance des Mercedes-Piloten 66 Zähler seinem Punktekonto. Das sind drei mehr, als in seinem ersten Vize-Jahr 2006 und ganze 15 mehr eingefahrene Zähler, als noch im Vorjahr.
Auf dem Lausitzring war die Freude über den Sieg riesengroß © DTM
Gerade zu Beginn des Jahres 2010 fuhr der sympathische Franko-Kanadier in einer anderen Liga. Zu Saisonmitte schien er den Titel fast schon sicher in der Tasche zu haben. Ähnlich wie im Vorjahr beispielsweise Jenson Button in der Formel 1. Doch auch wenn beide mit Mercedes-Power unterwegs waren - Button schaffte es und rettete seinen Vorsprung ins Ziel, Spengler nicht. Die Gründe hierfür waren vor allem die letzten drei Rennen, sowie die nicht immer optimale Qualifikationsleistung - und nicht zuletzt auch ein ganz starker Gegner . Nach dem fünften Rennen am Nürburgring, ergo kurz vor Saisonmitte, lag Spengler bereits 16 Punkte vor seinem schärfsten Verfolger - und das war der Brite Jamie Green im harmlosen Jahreswagen. Gar 19 Zähler betrug der Vorsprung auf den ersten Verfolger aus der Phalanx der Audi. Uneinholbar schien der Mercedes-Mann an der Spitze und zustande gekommen war das wie folgt:
Überragender Saisonstart
Vier mal Platz zwei und einmal Startrang drei in der Qualifikation der ersten fünf Saisonrennen - Spengler fuhr der Konkurrenz mit einer Konstanz um die Ohren, die so manchem schon unheimlich schien. Zwar schaffte er es über das ganze Jahr verteilt nie auf die Pole-Position, doch am Ende stand dennoch allein siebenmal die erste Startreihe zu Buche. Im Rennen ließ sich der Kanadier zudem nicht aus der Ruhe bringen. Wurde er zum Auftakt am Hockenheimring und in Valencia noch Zweiter, folgte schon am Lausitzring der erste Triumph des Jahres vor und Jamie Green. Am Nürburgring fuhr Spengler eigentlich schon meisterlich © Mercedes-Benz
Lief es einmal nicht ganz optimal, wie beispielsweise am Norisring, hielt sich Spengler einfach aus allem heraus und brachte sicher die Punkte nach Hause. Rang drei in Nürnberg, hinter den beiden Streithähnen Green und Ekström, war das beste Beispiel dafür. Ein Rennen später unterhalb der Nürburg zeigte der HWA-Pilot dann abermals eine blitzsaubere Leistung und holte seinen zweiten Saisonsieg. Die Zieldurchfahrt vor den Markenkollegen und Gary Paffett und vor den Augen der Daimler-Belegschaft auf der Mercedes-Tribüne, geriet zum Triumphzug und fast glaubte man, bereits den neuen Meister gesehen zu haben.
Schwächere zweite Saisonhälfte
Doch mit dem Rennen in Zandvoort knickte auf einmal alles ein - der gute Lauf stagnierte. Zum ersten Mal im Jahr 2010 schaffte es Spengler nicht in den vierten Abschnitt des Qualifyings. Rang sieben - mehr war auf dem holländischen Dünenkurs nicht drin. Der Sonntag änderte da nichts. Spengler konnte seine Position nicht mehr verbessern und büßte erstmals wertvolle Punkte ein.
Zwei mal Rang zwei - sowohl in der Qualifikation, als auch im Rennen - in Brands Hatch und Oschersleben, verschafften Spengler zwar wieder etwas Luft, doch war auf einmal dran. Der Brite gewann die beiden Läufe und fuhr nun in der Form, die zu Jahresbeginn noch sein Markenkollege aus Kanada inne gehabt hatte.
Ob ich Zweiter oder Dritter werde ist mir egal - es zählt nur der TitelBruno Spengler
Spenglers Nerven schienen zu flattern anzufangen. Es kam, wie es kommen musste: Am Hockenheimring folgte ein rabenschwarzes Wochenende für den HWA-Piloten. Lediglich Rang elf in der Qualifikation und nach der Verwicklung in eine Kollision und anschließenden Aufhängungsproblemen der erste Ausfall des Jahres im Rennen am Sonntag. Spengler war seine Führung los, versprach den Fans aber in der neu und unliebsam gewonnenen Rolle des Jägers nicht aufzugeben.
Scheinbar nahm der Führungsverlust dem 27-Jährigen Wahl-Staßburger somit auch etwas den Druck. Beim folgenden Chaos-Lauf in Italien auf dem Adria International Raceway bewahrte Spenger wieder kühlen Kopf. Nach abermaligem Start von Platz zwei, konnte er das Rennen immerhin als Dritter beenden. Damit eroberte er seine verlorene Führung zurück und schien wieder alles in den vorherigen Rennen aus den Fugen geratene, ins Gleichgewicht gerückt zu haben. Spengler reiste als großer Favorit und mit drei Punkten Vorsprung im Gepäck zum Saisonfinale nach China. Ein zweiter Platz hätte somit bereits gereicht, um aus eigener Kraft DTM-Meister zu werden.
Finale in China kostet den Titel
Doch vor Ort kam alles ganz anders. Bereits im freien Training setzte der sonst so ruhige Kanadier seinen Boliden in die Wand. Der Warnung war dieses Malheur scheinbar nicht genug: Auch im wichtigsten Qualifying des Jahres unterlief dem 27-Jährigen ein Fehler - es folgte Startplatz 17 auf einem Stadtkurs. Früh war klar, dass das Rennen für den Mercedes-Piloten zum aussichtslosen Unterfangen werden würde. Die Konkurrenz gab sich indes an der Spitze keine Blöße und für Spengler waren die Punkteränge in weiter Ferne - mehr als Rang 13 war am Ende im Reich der Mitte nicht drin.
Im Normalfall heißt es im Motorsport immer, man würde den Titel nicht in einem einzigen Rennen gewinnen - man könne ihn höchstens in einem Rennen verlieren. Auf Spengler trifft diese Aussage 2010 exakt zu. Die Asientournee zu Abschluss der Saison vermasselte eine ganz starken Auftritt über das Jahr hinweg. Das Einzige, was sich Spengler 2010 ankreiden lassen muss, ist eventuell zu früh das Risiko heraus genommen und versucht zu haben, den Vorsprung einfach zu verwalten. Auch die vielen zweiten Plätze in der Qualikifikation zeugen zwar von Konstanz - aber für ganz vorne reichte es eben nie. Somit blieb auch hier der ein oder andere Punk liegen.
Das Gastspiel in Shanghai lohnte sich für Bruno Spengler wahrlich nicht © Sutton
Dass Spengler dann in China zu allem Überfluss auch noch von Rennsieger Gary Paffett in der Gesamtwertung abgefangen wurde und somit in seiner sechsten DTM-Saison nur Dritter und gleichermaßen drittbester Mercedes-Fahrer wurde, tat dann auch schon nichts mehr zur Sache. Der Kanadier war maßlos enttäuscht und frustriert: "Ob ich Zweiter oder Dritter werde, ist mir egal. Hier zählt nur der Titel", erklärte er nach der schmerzlichen Finalniederlage. "Das hier ist nicht die richtige Strecke für eine Meisterschaftsentscheidung. Wir waren noch nie hier, niemand hat eine Ahnung gehabt, was uns erwartet. Ich habe noch nie so viele Unfälle in Training und Qualifying gesehen", kritisierte Spengler auch die Verantwortlichen scharf.
Der 27-Jährige fühlte sich wohl ein bisschen um den Titel betrogen - angesichts seiner sonst hervorragenden Saisonleistung war der tiefe Frust verständlich. "Das war hier mehr eine Lotterie", meinte der Kanadier nach dem letzten Lauf geknickt. Spengler hatte Recht: Er zog 2010 nicht das große Los - ein verdienter Meister wäre er ob seiner Leistung gerade zu Saisonbeginn aber in jedem Fall gewesen. Was bleibt ist die Hoffnung auf einen besseren Ausgang im kommenden Jahr. Fährt Spengler so, wie über weite Strecken des abgelaufenen Jahres, führt an ihm kein Weg vorbei - dann bleibt der Kanadier Top-Favorit auf den Titel 2011. Nach der Hälfte der Saison sah Bruno Spengler schon wie der sichere Meister des Jahres 2010 aus - doch am Ende verspielte der Kanadier den Titel noch.

description.hltext_display: Portugal convoca a todos los jugadores disponibles...
description.content:
Tziolis, Arana, Bolado y Coltorti han quedado fuera dela lista por lesión
El Racing afrontará ante el Hércules CF en Los Campos de Sport su último partido de liga del año 2010 en el choque que cerrará la jornada decimosexta en Primera División. Para la cita, que tendrá lugar mañana lunes, 20 de diciembre, a las 21,00 horas, Miguel Ángel Portugal ha convocado a los veinte jugadores profesionales que tiene disponibles pues Tziolis, Arana, Bolado y Coltorti se encuentran lesionados. Tras el triunfo conseguido a domicilio el pasado fin de semana ante el Real Club Deportivo Mallorca gracias a un gol de Óscar Serrano, los verdiblancos buscan sumar su segunda victoria consecutiva del campeonato que sirva para corroborar los positivos resultados obtenidos por los cántabros en su feudo. Y es que en El Sardinero los racinguistas han sumado cuatro triunfos y un empate en los siete disputados hasta la fecha.
En la jornada de hoy, los verdiblancos se han ejercitado en La Albericia después de que ayer sábado los jugadores tuvieran un día de descanso. Mañana lunes día 20 los futbolistas del cuadro cántabro convocados para el choque ante los alicantinos están citados a las 10,30 horas en el estadio para ultimar la preparación del mismo y acudir, posteriormente, al Hotel Santemar, el cuartel general del Racing la temporada 2010/11, donde quedarán concentrados.
En la fotografía superior, un grupo de jugadores ejercitándose hoy en La Albericia.

description.hltext_display: Chen Deming: domestic consumption vital to stable growth
description.content: (Infocast News) Chen Deming, the Commerce Minister of China, said that the country will seek to expand imports and improve the balance of its foreign trade and international payments next year.He said that expanding domestic consumption will be an important way to maintain stable and fast growth.The country will expand import channels next year for commodities such as cotton and grains to ease domestic supply pressures, he said. To promote overseas investment by Chinese companies, the country will also study expanding the use of its foreign exchange reserves, as well as tax and fiscal policies, he said.

To promote overseas investment by Chinese companies, the country will also study expanding the use of its foreign exchange reserves, as well as tax and fiscal policies
the country will seek to expand imports and improve the balance of its foreign trade and international payments next year.

description.hltext_display: Beware the trailer snatchers
description.content:
Festive travellers praised the Mthatha police for their good work when they managed to recover two Venter trailers that had been unhooked and wheeled away while their owners stopped for a bite to eat.
No way to treat a visitor!
A holidaymaker from Belville in the Western Cape has offered a reward after an ugly incident in Gonubie on Monday where all four his car's tyres were slashed.
EL harbour landmark makeover
A R5.4 million engine overhaul, electronic upgrade and paint job has given East London Harbour’s 30-year-old hammerhead breakwater crane a new lease on life.
Teen girl strangled in Quigney
A teenage girl was strangled to death and possibly raped in the early hours of Monday in the Quigney area while walking with her boyfriend.
Thugs kill on-duty EL cop
Five men have been arrested for the brutal murder of a police officer in Reeston outside East London on Monday night, a spokesman said.
Kallis in car smash
South Africa star batsman Jacques Kallis crashed his car into a gate in the early hours of Tuesday but escaped unharmed, a team spokesman told AFP, denying that alcohol was involved.
Seven drunks a day on EC roads
Eastern Cape traffic officials have arrested an average of seven drunk drivers a day on the province's roads this month, the provincial transport department said on Tuesday.
EL Waterworld still closed
Kids hoping to cool off the scorching heat yesterday were once again disappointed by Buffalo City Municipality (BCM) after it failed to open Waterworld in Fullers Bay Monday as promised.
The big mince pie taste-off
Christmas is around the corner and festive treats wound't be the same without good, old fashioned mince pies. Dispatch staffers took on a taste test of mince pies from local stores.
The festive sound of cash registers
Shoppers keen to part with their cash have made this festive season a jolly one for Eastern Cape’s retail centres.
Major damage in EL store blaze
Damage believed to run into tens-of-thousands of rands - or more - has been caused after a fire broke out at a Mica hardware shop in the city's shopping district on Monday.
Dispatch school renovation campaign takes off
The Daily Dispatch’s campaign to rebuild a Mdantsane school for disabled pupils got off to a good start this week with one classroom getting a complete makeover.
View more NEWStalk: Join the conversation
From Friday onwards, we invite you to join NEWStalk - where we discuss a relevant news topic for the day. We will regularly post a story that appeared in the paper for comment on the Blah-blah blog, which you can access by clicking on this icon in the "Hot Spots" menu. Join the conversation! - Online News Ed. Sino Majangaza AND Siya Boya
Festive travellers praised the Mthatha police for their good work when they managed to recover two Venter trailers that had been unhooked and wheeled away while their owners stopped for a bite to eat.
The trailers of holidaymakers Pat and Jenny Lowry and Michael Venter were stolen in two separate incidents in Mthatha recently.
The trailer belonging to the Lowrys was stolen from the Shell Ultra City on the morning of December 16 , while the second one was stolen a few hours later from the Savoy Complex.
The Mthatha police brought relief to the holidaymakers a day later when they recovered the two trailers.
Police spokesperson Warrant Officer Dineo Koena said the two trailers were found dumped in the Southernwood and Fortgale suburbs the following day.
“Both trailers had missing items. It appeared that they were locked but the suspects had managed to unlock them,” she said.
The Kokstad couple had just finished paying for their food when they noticed their trailer was missing.
The Lowrys were en route to Kob Inn.
So far, no arrests have been made.
So what was the visitors' reaction to the whole incident?
Read the full story in Wednesday's print edition of the Daily Dispatch or subscribe online to the paper's e-Edition.
