description.hltext_display: KDI국� �� �책대학원장에 남상우 박사 임명
description.content:
[뉴스핌=임애신기자] KDI국제정책대학원장에 22일자로 남상우 박사가 임명됐다.
현오석 KDI원장 겸 KDI국제정책대학원총장은 김세원 경제ㆍ인문사회연구회 이사장의 동의를 거쳐 22일 남상우 KDI국제정책대학원 겸임교수를 KDI국제정책대학원장에 임명했다고 밝혔다.
남상우 신임원장은 서강대학교 국제통상학과를 졸업하고, 미국 MIT 경영대학원에서 경영학 박사학위를 취득했다.
이후 KDI선임연구위원, 부원장, 경제기획원장관(부총리) 자문관 등을 역임했으며 세계은행 이코노미스트로 활동했다.
이밖에 KDI 국제교류협력센터 소장, 아시아개발은행 연구소 선임연구원, 베트남 기획투자부 자문관 등을 역임했으며 현재 KDI국제정책대학원 겸임교수로 재직 중이다.
◆ 남상우 KDI국제정책대학원장 주요 경력
- 1970~1971 한국외환은행 조사부
- 1971~1973 KDI 연구원
- 1977~1997 KDI 연구위원 및 선임연구위원
- 1982~1983 부총리(경제기획원 장관) 자문관
- 1986~1988 세계은행 이코노미스트
- 1990~1993 KDI 부원장
- 1994~1996 KDI 국제교류협력센터 소장
- 1998~2002 KDI 국제정책대학원 교수
- 2000~2006 아시아개발은행 연구소(ADB Institute) 선임연구원
- 2007~2008 베트남 기획투자부(경제사회정보예측센터) 자문관
[뉴스핌 Newspim]임애신 기자 (vancouver@newspim.com)

description.hltext_display: Alcool au bar : le 106 cède sous la pression
description.author: lecrabe
description.content:
Les spectateurs qui viennent assister aux concerts du 106 pourront consommer de l'alcool au bar dès janvier 2011
BORIS MASLARD
Libération évoquait la « mesure poilante » de Laurent Fabius. Les Inrockuptibles craignaient « une émeute de métaleux ». A Paris-Normandie, nous nous étonnions de cette « option pas vraiment rock » choisie pour la salle des musiques actuelles rouennaise : le 106 ne propose pas d'alcool au bar. Ça va changer.
A l'époque de sa décision, Laurent Fabius, président de la Crea, estimait ainsi « lutter contre les ravages de l'alcool. » De quoi titiller la verve sarcastique d'un Philippe Katerine lors de son show du 15 décembre dernier. Abritée sous le sacro-saint drap de « la santé publique », la Crea s'attendait-elle à ce déferlement de réactions négatives ? Est-ce en interdisant l'alcool au bar d'une salle de spectacles que l'on contrôle vraiment la consommation des spectateurs ?
« Rien de plus à dire »
« Expérimental », rétorquait alors Laurent Fabius, précisant à l'Express.fr : « On verra dans quelques mois ce que ça donne. » A croire que de l'eau a coulé sous les ponts en à peine plus d'un mois : en janvier, la bière, la vraie, va faire son entrée à la carte du bar. Jean-Christophe Aplincourt l'a précisé, évoquant « une évolution par rapport à ce dossier. Mais on va rester vigilant. »
Lâchée du bout des lèvres, l'information, dévoilée par Paris-Normandie dès le lundi 20 décembre sur son site Internet et le mardi 21 décembre dans son édition Grand Rouen, mérite éclaircissement.
Coup de fil à la Crea - le donneur d'ordre - pour tenter d'en savoir un peu plus. Pourquoi avoir décidé là, comme ça, maintenant, de mettre de l'eau dans son vin et d'autoriser finalement la vente de houblon ? D'ailleurs que va proposer le bar ? Une « vigilance » mais comment, par qui ? « On réfléchit à une façon de faire pour éviter les abus mais sinon nous n'avons rien de plus à dire que ce qu'a expliqué Jean-Christophe Aplincourt », résument les services de la Crea.
Reste les suppositions. Soit la pression populaire a eu raison de la mesure. Soit le bar - et au-delà, la salle - n'est pas viable économiquement sans vendre d'alcool. Qu'importent les raisons, la Crea fait machine arrière. Pour les modalités, on est prié d'attendre la prochaine tournée.

description.hltext_display: Промзона - Мотометла для роллеров
description.content:
Автор: Николай Маслухин, автор
Опубликовано 22.12.2010 в блоге автора (rss), блоге "Промзона" (rss)
Электровелосипеды выпускаются давно. Оно и понятно – двухколесный транспорт из спортивного превратился в городской и постепенно наращивает "мускулатуру" в виде электродвигателей. А как быть с теми, кто любит ролики?
Немецкий инженер Томас Ренк [Thomas Rank] предлагает всем желающим воспользоваться собственным изобретением FlyRad, позволяющим разгоняться до скорости в 40 км/ч.
FlyRad представляет собой небольшой моноцикл, работающий от аккумуляторов. Запаса хода ему хватает на 50 километров, а весит такое устройство всего лишь 24 килограмма. Для езды на FlyRad’е не обязательно садиться на него сверху - ездить с этой "метлой" можно и сидя на корточках, и стоя, и даже пуская ее вперед себя.
Базовая модель оснащается 500-ватным электродвигателем двигателем. В наличии имеются версии для взрослых и для подростков. Правда, я с трудом представляю себе родителей, позволившим своим чадам мчаться с такой скоростью на подобном агрегате.
С автором можно связаться по адресу site@computerra.ru.
Темы: FlyRad, Thomas Rank, моноцикл, ролики

description.hltext_display: Hungary's Debrecen Fines Disorderly Footballers
description.content:
"The board of Debrecen FC yesterday fined club players Péter Kabát, Zsolt Laczkó and Péter Szakály for their bad behaviour in Kharkov, Ukraine.
After the game with Metalist Kharkov in the Europa League earlier this month, the three left their hotel and Kabát broke a window of a guard's booth outside the Polish consulate. The trio were detained by local police but then released. Kabát and Laczkó smashed their hotel room, but have paid for the damage caused."
Source: Hungary Around the Clock
This news item is one of many published daily by HATC, a premier subscription news service which distributes English-language info about Hungary via email or fax. For a free trial of HATC follow this link and click on 'Free Trial Subscription'.

description.hltext_display: Mexus Education to present Iken ScientificA - Season IV
description.content:
India's largest and the only hands-on science & technology competition for school children
- Over 2 lakh students from 1000 schools from 50 cities to participate in the competition
- The grand prize winners ‘Student Icon of India’ to win a trip to NASA
- Several other prizes include Apple iPad, laptops & many more
New Delhi, November 25, 2010: Mexus Education Private Limited, an education innovations enterprise, announces the launch of ‘Iken ScientificA 2010- Season IV’. Iken ScientificA 2010 is India's India’s largest sci-tech competition that reaches over 2 lakh students across India annually and presents them opportunities to test their scientific aptitude through hands-on activities. Learning through hands-on activities enhances children’s understanding of scientific concepts. It also ingrains self confidence and problem solving attitude in them.
This unique competition is conducted for students from class 5th to 8th and comprises of three rounds namely school round, city finals and national finals where students will vie for the title of ‘Student Icon of India’. It consists of scientifically designed quizzes and activities that test the student's ability to put scientific knowledge to practice. The performance of the participants is assessed at the school level on the basis of an Enterprising Index, an innovative concept which is a combination of five parameters encompassing memory, observation, extrapolation, analytical, practicality skills. The winners at the end of 3 rounds will be crowned as ‘Student Icon of India 2010’.
Speaking on the competition, Mr. Saurabh Saxena, Director, Mexus Education, said, “Our constant endeavour has been to combine entertainment and education to enable a joyous learning experience for students. Iken ScientificA is a platform for students to explore new and interactive ways of hands-on learning. This talent hunt gives recognition and appreciation to students who have the potential to think and apply scientific theories beyond conventional methods. After receiving an overwhelming response for three consecutive years, we are glad to present Iken ScientificA 2010 which supports our vision to pioneer unconventional methods of learning.”
Talking about the competition, Sebastian Santy, Bhartiya Vidya Bhavan’s School, Vadodara (winner of Iken ScientificA 2009- standard 7) said, “The best thing about the whole experience was that it gave me practical knowledge. I won a lot of goodies and it also improved my confidence level. My favourite events were Air Zooka and Junkreate wherein we had made a periscope. I had tried for the first time in standard six but I got lucky when I participated again in standard seven. I’d like to advise all future participants to focus on practical learning to do well at the competition.”
Iken ScientificA Competition coordinators reach out to schools across India and conduct multiple-choice tests for participants. The test is a scientific aptitude and skills analysis test. Later diagnostic reports are shared with students. Shortlisted students are then offered workshops as preparatory exercises before city and national level. Workshops are open for all irrespective of their participation to Iken ScientificA competition. Top five students from the workshops get a wild card entry into Iken Scientifica city finals.
Iken ScientificA helps develop team work and interpersonal skills through ideation and brainstorming sessions. The scope of Iken Scientifica has increased significantly since last year. The number of schools participating in the competition has increased from 700 to 1000 whereas the number of cities where Iken ScientificA has made a mark has grown from 14 to 50. This considerable boost indicates a keen interest of participation in innovative activities among the young Indians.

description.hltext_display: N-Zeelanders meldden UFO's
description.content:
WELLINGTON - Het leger van Nieuw-Zeeland heeft woensdag zo'n tweeduizend pagina's aan vertrouwelijke documenten vrijgegeven over UFO-meldingen en vermeende ontmoetingen met buitenaardse wezens. De honderden meldingen van burgers, piloten en militairen dateren van 1954 tot 2009. Sommige documenten bevatten tekeningen van vliegende schotels en beschrijvingen van buitenaardse wezens met een soort farao-maskers. Sommige mensen beweerden dat ze buitenaardse geschriften hebben gevonden.
Het leger zei de meldingen niet te hebben onderzocht. De militairen hebben daarvoor niet het geld en het personeel. We zijn gewoon een verzamelpunt voor de informatie. We doen er verder niets mee, zei luchtmachtleider Kavvae Tamariki in de krant Dominion Post. De documenten zijn vrijgegeven wegens een wet op de openbaarheid.

description.content:

(三)本公司所在地：台北市內湖區港墘路 200 號 4 樓
(四)董事及監察人之人數及任期：本公司設董事7人(含獨立董事3人)，任期三年，由股東會就有行為能力之人選任之，連選得連任。
(五)原股份總額及已發行股數及金額：實收資本額為新台幣176,606,670元，分為17,660,667股，每股面額新台幣10元。
(六)本次現金增資發行新股總額及其發行條件：1.本次現?增資發?新股5,000,000股，每股面額新台幣10元整，依公司法第267條規定，保留發行新股總?之 15% 計 750,000股由本公司員工認購，如有員工認購不足或放棄認購之股份，授權董事長洽特定人認購之；其餘4,250,000股按證券交?法第二十八條之ㄧ規定排除公司法第二百?十七條第三項原股東優先認購之適用，全?委由證券承銷商對外辦?公開承銷。2.現金增資發行價格：本次現金增資採溢價方式辦理，實際發行價格依詢價圈購之結果議定。
3.現金增資股款繳納期間：
(1)員工認股繳款日期: 100年1月5日起至100年1月6日下午三時三十分止。
(2)詢價圈購繳款日期：100年1月6日。
(3)公開申購繳款截止日：100年1月4日。
(4)特定人認股繳款日期：100年1月7日中午十二時止。4.本次現?增資所發?之新股，其權?義務與原發?之股份相同。(七)增資後股份總額及每股金額：本次增資後實收資本額為新台幣226,606,670元整，分為22,660,667股，每股面額新台幣10元，均為普通股。
(八)增資計劃概要：充實營運資金。
(九)代收股款銀行：尚未確定。
(十)主辦承銷機構：台新綜合證券股份有限公司。
(十一)本次增資採無實體方式發行。
(十二) 公開說明書陳列處及索取方式：本公司公開說明書除依法分送主管機關公開陳列外，另陳列於本公司所在地，索取方式：請上網至公開資訊觀測站(http://newmops.tse.com.tw/)查詢。
二、本次現金增資預計於股款募集完成後，將先行以股款繳納憑證劃撥至認購繳款人指定之集保帳戶，增資發行新股股票俟呈奉主管機關核准變更登記後30日內以無實體發放，股款繳納憑證上市日期及股票發放日期將另行公告。
三、本公最近三年度經會計師查核簽證之資產負債表、損益表、股東權益變動表、現金流量表及盈餘分配表請至「公開資訊觀測站」查詢。
四、特此公告。

description.hltext_display: 중소기업 납품단가에 특근수당 반영 검�
description.content:
- 위기관리대책회의, 기업현장 애로해소 방안 확정
[뉴스핌=임애신기자] 대기업 주문 물량이 급작스레 늘어나 특근수당 등의 추가비용을 지불하게 된 중소기업이 그만큼을 납품단가에 반영할 수 있도록 하는 방안을 정부가 모색하기로 했다.
또한 하도급대금 지급보증 의무 불이행 단속을 강화하는 대신 의약품 품질에 영향을 끼치지 않는 첨가제의 경우 제출자료 범위와 요건을 낮춘다.
이와 함께 가연성폐기물 사용에 따른 배출량에 대해서 온실가스 배출목표 대신 '폐기물 에너지회수효율' 등의 특례를 통해 별도로 관리된다.
정부는 22일 위기관리대책회의에서 이같은 내용을 담은 '2010년 하반기 기업현장 애로해소방안'을 확정해 발표했다.
대기업의 주문량 증가로 인해 중소기업에 근로자 특근수당 부담이 추가로 발생된 경우, 이 특근수당을 납품단가에 반영하는 방안을 정부가 모색한다.
이를 위해 정부는 부당한 하도급대금 결정행위 위반 사례 단속을 강화하고, 공정거래 서면실태조사항목에 포함시킬 계획이다.
또 전자어음제도가 시행됨에 따라 중소기업의 전자 어음 취급이 급증했지만 할인에 애로가 있었던 것을 감안, 전자어음 할인 활성화를 위한 전자어음 할인중개시스템 구축 추진을 검토하기로 했다.
아울러 공동계약으로 입찰에 참여할 경우 구성원별 공사참여 지분율(시공비율)에 따라 보유실적을 평가했지만, 앞으로 기술력이 뛰어난 신규업체가 기존업체와 공동수급체를 구성해 입찰할 수 있도록 시공경험 평가제도를 개선할 계획이다.
하도급대금 지급보증 점검도 강화된다. 현재 건설위탁의 경우 원사업자는 수급사업자에게 공사대금 지급을 보증해야 하지만 이행하지 않거나, 지급보증을 하더라도 수급사업자의 보증금 청구가 곤란한 경우가 있다.
따라서 하도급대금 지급보증 의무 불이행에 대한 단속을 강화하고, 서면실태조사 등을 통해 하도급대급 지급보증의무 이행을 유도할 방침이다.
의약품의 첨가제를 변경할 때 의약품의 품질에 영향을 미치지 않은 첨가제의 경우, 그 범위 기준과 제출 자료 범위·요건 등이 완화될 예정이다.
기존 공산품과 결합된 의료기기 판매업의 신고도 면제된다. 기존 공산품과 결합된 의료기기의 경우 보통 의료기기와 동일하게 판매하기 위해서는 별도의 창고 등 품질관리 확보요건을 갖춰 의료기기 판매업을 신고하던 불편이 없어진 것이다.
배출시설을 포함하고 있는 공장의 경우 공장등록상 사업체명 변경과 배출시설허가상 명의변경 등 상호 연관성 있는 신고사항의 경우 동일한 신고기간(2개월)이 부여된다.
그 동안 동물원에서 인명 보호를 위해 마취총을 소지할 경우 소지자마다 허가를 받아야 했지만, 앞으로 동물원에서 사용할 마취총의 경우 대표자가 실사용자를 특정해 일괄 소지허가를 받을 수 있게 된다.
이와 함께 녹색성장기본법 시행에 따라 관리대상업체는 온실가스 배출량에 관한 명세서를 작성·신고해야 된다. 그러나 가연성폐기물을 많이 사용하는 산업에 같은기준을 적용할 경우 화석연료 대체효과가 반영되지 않았다.
이에 가연성폐기물 사용에 따른 배출량에 대해서는 온실가스 배출목표 대신 '폐기물 에너지회수효율' 등의 특례를 통해 별도로 관리할 예정이다.
이밖에 청년 인턴의 경우 기업당 인턴 채용한도가 20% 이내였던 규정을 기업규모 등을 감안해 청년인턴의 채용한도를 설정할 수 있게 했다. 또 원산지를 표시하지 않거나 적정하지 않게 표시한 경우 생기는 문제를 해결하기 위해 위생도기제품의 원산지 표시 명료화하기로 했다.
이같은 하반기 기업현장 애로해소방안의 건의사항 중 이미 추진되고 있는 내용에 대해서는 건의한 기업과 협회에 개별적으로 통보된다.
정부는 이번 대책의 이행실태를 반기별로 점검하고 이행 부진과제는 지속적으로 관련부처와 보완할 예정이다.
[뉴스핌 Newspim]임애신 기자 (vancouver@newspim.com)

description.hltext_display: Obama signing 'don't ask, don't tell' repeal
description.author: MARK S. SMITH
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- Fulfilling a campaign pledge, cheering his party's downcast liberals and striking a blow for what he sees as basic human rights, President Barack Obama is signing a landmark law Wednesday that tells America's armed services to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time.
So many gay rights and Democratic activists were expected at the signing ceremony that the White House booked a large auditorium at the Interior Department. "This day has come!" said an elated Mike Almy, an Air Force major discharged four years ago when his sexual orientation became known. "'Don't ask, don't tell' is over, and you no longer have to sacrifice your integrity." While the elation is real, Pentagon officials caution it could be premature, since the bill requires service chiefs to complete implementation plans before lifting the old policy - and certify to lawmakers that it won't damage combat readiness, as critics charge.
Also, guidelines must be finalized that cover a host of practical questions, from how to educate troops to how sexual orientation should be handled in making barracks assignments.
While officials have avoided timetables, the process will probably take months.
Still, for gay and lesbian Americans, Wednesday is a watershed. And for Obama, it is a day to revel in the achievement of a goal he's long championed.
It is also the second of three expected victories in what's turned out to be - for Obama - a surprisingly productive lame-duck Congress. Weeks after his self-described "shellacking" in the midterm vote, he's won lopsided approval of a tax cut compromise, and the Senate is poised to deliver his top foreign policy goal: ratification of a new nuclear arms treaty with Russia.
Many Democratic liberals were furious over the tax package, believing Obama blithely yielded to Republican demands to retain the same tax cuts for the rich he had loudly denounced on the campaign trail. That's not the case with the repeal of don't ask, don't tell. Lifting of the ban on gays serving openly was something Obama not only campaigned on in 2008 but reiterated in this year's State of the Union speech. "I will work with Congress and our military to finally repeal the law that denies gay Americans the right to serve the country they love because of who they are," he said in January to cheers in the House chamber, adding, "It's the right thing to do." Born 17 years ago as a compromise between President Bill Clinton and a resistant Pentagon, the "don't ask, don't tell" policy became for gay rights campaigners a notorious roadblock on the way to full acceptance.
Speaking in June at a Gay Pride Month observance at the White House, Obama likened the fight to end it to the struggle of American blacks for civil rights. "We have never been closer to ending this discriminatory policy," he declared. Yet he has also faced rising discontent among gay activists who believed he hadn't moved forcefully enough. He's been heckled at campaign appearances over AIDS funding and the failure to end the military service ban.
Obama countered that as commander-in-chief, he had to ensure the ban's end is carefully prepared for.
That's just what the bill from Congress mandates. "The implementation and certification process will not happen immediately; it will take time," Air Force Chief of Staff Gen. Norton Schwartz warned in an e-mail that went out right after Saturday's Senate vote. "Meanwhile, the current law remains in effect. All Air Force members should conduct themselves accordingly." Military and administration officials are wrestling with numerous legal questions raised by the end of the ban - knowing that courts are waiting in the wings. They include what to do about pending expulsion proceedings, and when those ousted under don't-ask-don't-tell might apply to rejoin the armed forces.
For Almy, who appeared at a Capitol Hill ceremony Monday, the important thing is that gay and lesbian service members are no longer singled out because of who they love. "That's all we ever wanted," he told reporters, "not special rights, just the same as our straight counterparts. " ---

event_or_fact.property: I will work with Congress and our military to finally repeal the law that denies gay Americans the right to serve the country they love because of who they are
We have never been closer to ending this discriminatory policy
The implementation and certification process will not happen immediately; it will take time; Meanwhile, the current law remains in effect. All Air Force members should conduct themselves accordingly.
to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time

description.hltext_display: 國賓大地：國賓大地環保事業股份有限公司盈餘轉增資股票發放及上市日期公告(鉅亨網)
description.content:
一、本公司於99年6月18日股東常會決議通過盈餘轉增資發放股票股利新台幣226,432,000元，發行新股22,643,200股，每股面額10元，業經行政院金融監督管理委員會中華民國99年10月15日金管證發字第0990056467號函核准，並奉經濟部中華民國99年12月8日經授商字第09901274270號函核准變更登記在案，擬洽請台灣證券交易所股份有限公司同意於99年12月29日上市買賣。
二、茲將增資新股上市有關事項公告如下：
1.原發行股份：普通股113,216,000股，每股面額新台幣10元，共計新台幣1,132,160,000元。
2.本次增資上市股票：普通股22,643,200股，每股面額新台幣10元，共計新台幣226,432,000元。
3.股票簽證機構：本次增資發行新股，一律採無實體方式發行。
4.增資新股之權利義務：與原已發行之股份完全相同。
5.股務代理機構：金鼎綜合證券股份有限公司股務代理部。（地址:台北市敦化南路二段97號地下二樓，電話：02-2705-8280）
三、本項增資股票於99年12月29日(星期三)起開始發放，並於同日上市買賣，其發放方式如下：
1.已開立集保帳戶股東，由台灣集中保管結算所股份有限公司於股票上市日將本次增資之普通股直接撥入 貴股東指定之證券商帳戶，請持證券存摺逕往該證券商處登摺即可，免再辦理任何手續。
2.尚未開立集保帳戶股東，請儘速開立集保帳戶後持本公司股務代理機構寄發之「股票發放通知書」暨「登錄專戶轉帳申請書」填妥並加蓋原留印鑑後，駕臨或郵寄本公司股務代理機構金鼎綜合證券股份有限公司股務代理部辦理劃撥配發(地址：台北市敦化南路二段97號B2，電話02-2705-8280)。參加集保之新開戶股東，尚未繳回印鑑卡及身份證影本者，務請一併繳交。
四、除分函各股東外，特此公告。

description.hltext_display: "중국 자동차시장 등 � 흥국 내수확대 큰기회"- 현대
description.content:
[뉴스핌=정희윤기자] 금리인상 돌입과 물가불안, 2010년 고성장에 대한 기저효과, 자본유출입 규제 움직임 등 신헝국경제나 증시 위협요인도 있지만 이들 경제권 내수성장가능성이 우리에겐 기회가 될 것이라는 분석이 재차 나왔다.
현대증권 자산배분팀 양창호 애널리스트는 "특히 글로벌 불균형 조정이란 관점에서 봤을 때 선진국형 추출감소와 이를 상쇄할 수 있는 신흥경제 내수성장 가능성은 우리에게 위기이자 기회"라고 주장했다.
그는 22일 '2011년 신흥경제 성장지속과 내수확대 가능성'이라는 매크로 이슈 분석을 통해 신흥경제 성장가능성에 더 후한 점수를 매겼다.
신흥경제 내수성장과 관련 중국 정부가 수출과 내수를 조화시키는 쪽으로 정책선회를 했고 중국 중산층 성장속도를 감안할 때 자동차 등 중요 내구재 시장은 여전히 이륙단계라고 그는 평가했다.
특히 그는 글로벌 금융위기 이후 중국 자동차시장 판매량이 올해 세게 1위 2연패가 확실시된다고 강조했다.
나아가 그는 2011년부터 15년까지 기간에 펼쳐질 중국의 12차 5개년 계획의 시사점을 놓고 그는 "중국이 세계의 생산기지로 글로벌 경제에 처음 편입됐을 때보다 세계 소비시장의 중심이 되는 것이 우리에게 주는 충격과 기회는 훨씬 클 것"으로 내다봤다.
아울러 남유럽 재정위기 등 선진경제권의 위기가 진화되지 않은 것 역시 긍정적 대목으로 풀이했다.
계속된 저금리로 통화팽창정책 외의 수단이 없는 상태에서 막대하게 풀린 유동성 가운데 실물경제에 쓰이고 남은 잉여유동성이 수익을 좇아 신흥경제 자산시장과 상품시장으로 넘쳐오는 상황이 지속될 것으로 봤기 때문이다.
[뉴스핌 Newspim]정희윤 기자 (simmoo@newspim.com)

description.hltext_display: 中國信用衍生性商品法規健全性問題限制交換交易之發展(鉅亨網)
description.content: 中國於今(2010)年11 月首度開放信用衍生性商品市場，根據中國央行統計顯示，至今累計有23 筆成交，總值19.9 億人民幣（約2.98 億美元）；而近來公司債發行量亦快速成長之際，市場卻擔憂中國對規範信用違約交換的法制尚不成熟，使得國內銀行業者對信用違j 交換交易仍持保守觀望態度。（資料來源: Bloomberg）

description.hltext_display: Pit bull shot after attacking horse in Old Sacramento
description.author: clocke@sacbee.com (Cathy Locke
description.content:
A Sacramento police officer shot and killed a pit bull Tuesday afternoon after it attacked a horse pulling a carriage in Old Sacramento.
Carriage driver Jim Frenken of Elverta said he did not know the extent of injuries to the horse, which was taken to a veterinarian for treatment. Neither Frenken, his passengers nor a man who restrained the dog until police arrived were injured in the incident.
Frenken said he was driving a man and two children around Old Sacramento and had noticed someone in the bushes along Second Street as he circled the block a couple of times.
The next time he came around and headed north on Second Street, he spotted the dog running down the street and a man chasing him. He said the dog attacked the horse, biting its nose and at one point putting its head inside the horse's month.
Frenken succeeded in controlling the carriage as it continued down the street with the horse under attack.
That's when John Dixon of Granite Bay, who was celebrating his 42nd birthday with his fianc�e, intervened. "I saw the horse buck up," Dixon said, "and I saw the dog hanging from the horse's face."
Dixon, who was wearing cowboy boots, said he kicked the dog several times before it let go of the horse's face. But the dog then attacked the horse's shoulder and leg.
Dixon continued to kick the dog, which finally abandoned the attack and headed down the street. Dixon pursued the animal, cornered it, put his boot on the dog's neck and held it down until police arrived.
Sacramento Police Department spokesman Norm Leong said several officers responded to the incident. Repeated efforts to control the dog failed, and fearing that the dog might break loose, officials decided to shoot it.
Dixon said he continued to hold the dog down as the officer shot it. Police had no choice, Dixon said, adding that he owns dogs himself.
The dog's owner was not located.
Frenken said he has been driving carriages for 25 years, 15 of them in Old Sacramento, and has never seen a dog attack a horse.
He said the horse, a gelding, is owned by Elverta-based Top Hand Ranch, which operates the carriage service.

he did not know the extent of injuries to the horse, which was taken to a veterinarian for treatment
he continued to hold the dog down as the officer shot it
he has been driving carriages for 25 years, 15 of them in Old Sacramento, and has never seen a dog attack a horse

I saw the horse buck up
he kicked the dog several times before it let go of the horse's face

description.hltext_display: Straf voor militairen junta
description.content:
BUENOS AIRES - Vijftien voormalige leden van de Argentijnse politie en strijdkrachten zijn dinsdag tot levenslange gevangenisstraf veroordeeld wegens hun rol bij mensenrechtenschendingen tijdens de militaire dictatuur (1976-1983). Het gaat om een voormalige chef van de politie, drie ex-legerofficieren, twee voormalige mariniers, acht ex-politieagenten en een voormalig cipier. Een rechtbank in Buenos Aires en een in Mar del Plata, achtten de voormalige militairen en politiemensen schuldig aan de ontvoering, marteling en moord. Bovendien kregen vier voormalige leden van inlichtingendiensten 25 jaar cel wegens hun rol bij de mensenrechtenschendingen.
Inmiddels zijn meer dan 130 mensen in Argentini veroordeeld wegens misdaden die tijdens de militaire dictatuur werden gepleegd. Dat gebeurde in rechtszaken die zijn gevoerd na de afschaffing van een speciale amnestieregeling in 2003. Woensdag krijgt ex-juntaleider Jorge Videla zijn straf.
Videla beschouwt zichzelf het slachtoffer van een politiek proces. Het militaire regime was in zijn ogen noodzakelijk als gevolg van de chaos in jaren zeventig tijdens de regering van president Isabel Pern. Onderdeel van de chaos was het geweld dat linkse extremisten pleegden. Videla meent de chaos en de bloedige terreur van linkse extremisten in een oorlog te hebben bedwongen. Hij zei dinsdag volledig verantwoordelijk te zijn en dat zijn ondergeschikten enkel bevelen opvolgden. Hij vindt het eervol de oorlog te hebben gewonnen. Anderen noemen het de vuile oorlog vanwege een aantal praktijken van zijn regime.

description.hltext_display: Prime Minister Uses WinkBall to Send Seasonal Goodwill to British Armed Forces
description.content:
David Cameron extends his seasonal goodwill to the troops serving abroad this Christmas, by recording a brand new video message for WinkBall's 'Faces for the Forces' campaign – just in time for Christmas.
The Prime Minister joins his Deputy Prime Minister, Nick Clegg, in supporting 'Faces for the Forces'. The fact they have each recorded a new message for it reinforces the importance our political leaders place on this campaign from WinkBall, the UK's No. 1 video website.
They have taken time out from their busy schedules to show they, and the whole country are wholeheartedly supporting the armed forces and their efforts – particularly when they are missing their families over the holidays.
Cameron thanks the troops for the “incredible job” they're doing: “I want you to know just how much we're thinking of you, and how much we all appreciate the enormous sacrifices that you are making to keep us safe. So on behalf of the whole country, have a good Christmas and a safe return next year.”
Thanks to the 'Faces for the Forces' campaign, thousands of people in the UK – including celebrities, sports stars and politicians – are able to offer their support for the British Armed Forces in the run up to Christmas in a new and innovative way, that embraces the power of the online world.
It is the first time that people in the UK have been given an opportunity to send video messages to troops that are serving abroad on active duty.
Sending video reporters across the UK, WinkBall have collected hundreds of thousands of 'vox pops', bestowing appreciation and messages of Christmas goodwill for the armed forces. These messages will be shown to our troops via the Internet and on especially created WinkBall Christmas card DVDs sent to troops by the Ministry of Defence, both in the UK and abroad.
Please show your support and record your message at http://www.winkball.com
WinkBall.com is a free, web-based, personal video messaging service, which allows anyone to record, send and share videos with friends and family - privately. Users can also create and post content to video blogs and walls for group viewing. Video messages delivered by WinkBall.com can be accessed anywhere, anytime through a web browser.
WinkBall.com is also used by brands and organisations to share video content, which users can actively choose to watch and share. All messages sent through WinkBall.com are supported by targeted five-second advertisements, which are played at the end of video messages.
WinkBall.com is safe, simple and fun and makes video the best way to communicate well online. Established in London in 2005 by Dr. James Ohene-Djan and Duncan Barclay, the WinkBall Project team has evolved to become a leading player in driving the future development of online communication.
Or our PR Company: Victoria Cameron at Max Clifford Associates victoria(at)maxclifford(dot)com 020 7408 2350
Or WinkBall’s Head of Press: jennifer(at)winkball(dot)com Direct line: 020 8962 3033 Reception: 020 8962 3030

description.hltext_display: Former banker joins team
description.author: Sion Barry
description.content:
CARMARTHEN-BASED accountancy firm Clay Shaw Butler has recruited the former head of HSBC’s commercial banking arm in West Wales, Nigel Roberts.
Mr Roberts, who has more than 34 years of banking and funding experience, has a new role in the field as finance and banking specialist.
Mr Roberts will be working with Clay Shaw Butler’s team of qualified accountants to provide business plans, cashflow forecasts and management accounts.
The firm’s managing director David Butler said: "Nigel will help the practice to continue to expand and provide specialist banking advice and support to our clients.
"Nigel is a great addition to our enthusiastic qualified team, and working with them he will enable us to further develop our reputation of proactively meeting the demanding needs of today’s businesses.”

event_or_fact.property: Nigel will help the practice to continue to expand and provide specialist banking advice and support to our clients.

description.hltext_display: L’Oréal si fa notare su Youtube per le feste
description.content:
Il gigante della cosmetica si apre al marketing digitale per le feste di Natale mettendo in risalto i suoi profumi di riferimento nella homepage di Youtube. Le fragranze Armani, Cacharel, Diesel, Lancôme, Ralph Lauren e Yves Saint Laurent saranno quindi sfoggiate per cinque giorni succedendosi sui banner dei portali britannico, italiano, tedesco, spagnolo e francese del sito di condivisione di materiali audiovisivi.
www.youtube.com
Questa campagna rappresenta il seguito logico dell’accordo intervenuto qualche mese fa tra L’Oréal e Google, e punta ad accrescere la visibilità on line dell'azienda francese. La strategia di quest'ultima campagna è stata realizzata da Zenith-Optimedia, su un'idea dell’agenzia Fred & Farid Media, che si occupa fra l'altro delle campagne dei profumi Diesel.
Di Matthieu Guinebault (Versione italiana di Gianluca Bolelli)
Di Matthieu Guinebault
Copyright © 2010 FashionMag.com Tutti i diritti riservati.
Archivi L'Oréal
Madre e figlia Bettencourt si riconciliano. Finisce la battaglia giudiziaria tra loro e François-Marie Banier scampa così al processo per circonvenzione a Liliane Bettencourt. Potrà tenere regali e donazioni ma non ne riceverà altre e perderà le assicurazioni vita.
15-12-2010
Per la Corte Europea di Giustizia, il sito internet eBay non può essere ritenuto responsabile delle infrazioni ai diritti d'immagine dei brand commesse dai suoi utilizzatori, a meno che non intervenisse una volta avvisato che uno dei suoi membri sta reiterando la vendita di prodotti falsi sulle sue pagine.
06-12-2010
L’Oréal Paris ha appena annunciato che Jennifer Lopez sarà il nuovo volto delle sue campagne pubblicitarie per i trucchi e i prodotti per la cura dei capelli.
24-10-2010
L’Oréal ha chiuso il terzo trimestre 2010 con ricavi in crescita del 14,6% a 4,85 miliardi di euro, un risultato superiore alle previsioni: gli analisti si attendevano un risultato di 4,75 miliardi di euro.
13-10-2010
L'affare Bettencourt non ha avuto conseguenze sulle vendite in Francia di L'Oréal, visto che il suo volume d'affari "continua a crescere", ha dichiarato l'AD del gruppo Jean-Paul Agon nell'edizione di sabato scorso del “Journal du Dimanche”.
13-10-2010
La bella attrice britannica Rachel Weisz si é unita al lungo elenco di volti noti appartenente alla classica scuola di attrici di Hollywood ed é pronta a prestare la sua immagine all’azienda francese.
15-07-2010
L'Oreal ha chiuso il primo semestre dell'anno con un fatturato pari a 9,67 miliardi di euro, in progressione del 10,2% rispetto allo stesso periodo dell'anno precedente.
21-06-2010
Cambiamenti a cascata nei quadri dirigenziali di L'Oréal. Alexis Perakis-Valart diventa DG Cina, Vianney Derville si occuperà dell'Europa, Hervé Navellou della divisione dei prodotti per il Grande Pubblico in Francia, e Jean-Noël Divet diviene DG della Politica Commerciale Internazionale.
03-05-2010
L´Oreal, leader mondiale della cosmetica, ha annunciato un primo semestre con risultati oltre le attese, con ricavi cresciuti circa dell'8% a 4,72 miliardi di euro rispetto ai 4,37 miliardi di euro dello stesso periodo dell'anno precedente.
26-04-2010
La filiale americana del gruppo L'Oréal ha annunciato la firma di un accordo per acquistare il brand specializzato in smalti Essie Cosmetics. Le procedure tecniche necessarie per perfezionare l'acquisizione saranno completate nei prossimi 2 o 3 mesi.
30-03-2010
La filiale americana di L'Oréal ha annunciato martedì 30 marzo che avrebbe terminato di vendere i prodotti Shu Uemura nei suoi negozi statunitensi, per concentrarsi sui marchi di lusso considerati strategici.
29-03-2010
C'è movimento in L’Oréal. Stéphanie Carson-Parker è stata nominata direttrice delle relazioni media corporate. Succede a Mike Rumsby, che raggiunge The Body Shop (gruppo L'Oréal) a Londra.
05-03-2010
Siccome anche lui vale, l’ex giocatore del Manchester United è stato scelto dal marchio per rappresentare la linea di prodotti per l’uomo "Men Expert".
23-02-2010
Il leader mondiale nei cosmetici L'Oréal, ha intenzione di "andare a cercare, sedurre e fidelizzare un miliardo di nuovi consumatori nei prossimi dieci anni", principalmente nei mercati emergenti, ha dichiarato la scorsa settimana il direttore generale del gruppo Jean-Paul Agon.

description.hltext_display: FINRA 宣告對高頻交易之警惕(鉅亨網)
description.content: 美國金融業監管機構(Financial Industry Regulatory Authority, FINRA)表示，2011 年將對高頻交易公司採取更多的監理行動。FINRA 並表示除了監管NYSE Euronext 及Nasdaq OMX 集團之交易所外，亦將Direct Edge 及BATS Global Markets 經營的新型交易所納入監管。（資料來源：The Wall Street Journal）

description.hltext_display: 해소 앞둔 위기관리대책회의, 2년 반 발자취
description.content:
[뉴스핌=임애신 기자] 고유가 문제와 글로벌 금융위기, 북한 연평도 포격등을 위해 운용된 위기관리대책회의가 2년 반만에 경제정책조정회의로 다시 바뀐다.
정부는 22일 지난 2008년 7월 10일부터 82차례 개최된 위기관리대책회의를 내년부터 경제정책조정회의로 환원한다고 밝혔다.
위기관리대책회의는 지난 2008년 7월 10일 정부가 고유가 문제에 대응하기 위해 경제정책조정회의의 명칭을 바꾼 것이다.
이후 리먼브러더스가 파산하며 글로벌 금융위기가 본격화됐으며 유럽 재정위기, 주요국의 경기둔화 가능성, 북한의 연평도 포격 등에 대해 정부는 중점을 뒀다.
또 경제 위기로 고용여건이 악화됨에 따라 부문별 일자리 창출방안과 서비스산업 선진화, 투자 활성화 등이 추진됐다.
뿐만 아니라 위기 이후의 경제 재도약을 위해 미래에 대비한 성장동력을 확충하고 경제체질을 개선하기 위한 노력도 병행됐다.
아울러 경제위기로 인해 어려움을 겪는 서민과 영세 소상공인등 취약계층을 위해 공공요금 인상을 억제하고 생필품 가격을 안정시키는 등 물가안정에 대한 정책을 강화했다.
이처럼 정부가 위기 대응체제를 갖추면서 2008년 7월을 시작으로 총 82회의 위기관리대책회의를 개최하고, 이를 통해 283건의 안건이 논의됐다. 회의마다 평균 2.9건을 상정해 논의한 셈이다.
이 같은 비상 경제 체제를 운용함에 따라 정부는 우리경제가 OECD 회원국 중 가장 빠르게 경제위기를 극복했다고 자평했다.
또 성장과 고용 회복세가 재정투입보다 민간부문 위주로 이뤄지고 있어 질적인 성장을 이뤘다고 설명했다.
실제로 성장률은 2008년 4분기 -3.3%, 2009년 3분기 1.0%, 2010년 3분기 4.4%로 회복세를 보였다. 특히 민간부문의 성장률은 2009년 3월 0.5% 이후 매분기마다 5.2%, 7.3%, 7.2%, 4.2%를 기록하고 있다.
재정부는 "아직 북한 리스크를 비롯해 경제의 불확실성이 상존하고 있다"면서 "위기가 재발하면 저기에 대응할 수 있도록 위기탐지와 신속 대응을 위한 노력을 병행할 것"이라고 밝혔다.
[뉴스핌 Newspim]임애신 기자 (vancouver@newspim.com)

description.hltext_display: İstanbul'dan Servet Uçtu
description.content: Rusya devlet televizyonu İstanbul'dan Moskova'ya inen bir uçaktaki 4 yolcudan çıkan 14.5 milyon Dolar ile 4 milyon euro'nun görüntülerini yayınladı. İstanbul'dan 14 Aralık'ta uçakla Rusya'nın Vnoukovo Havaalanına indikten sonra beraberlerinde getirdikleri parayla gümrükten geçmeye çalışan 3'ü Azeri 1'i İran'lı 4 kişi polis tarafından gözaltına alındı. Rusya'da yasalara göre ülkeye gümrük beyannamesinde belirtilmeden 10 bin dolardan fazla nakit para sokmak yasak olduğu hatırlatılırken kuryelerin isimleri ve paranın kime ait olduğu soruşturuluyor. Rus devlet televizyonu paraların 4 kilodan ağır olduğunu ekledi. (Doğan Haber Ajansı) 11 dakika önce.. [2430024]

description.hltext_display: So gefährlich ist die "Tagesschau"-App
description.content:
MEEDIA testet das vermeintliche Verleger-Gift
Auf den Tag genau ein Jahr nach der ersten Ankündigung steht nun der Albtraum der Verlage im App-Store: das Miniprogramm der "Tagesschau", auch für Blackberrys und Androids zu haben. MEEDIA hat es unter die Lupe genommen. Und siehe da: Wie versprochen bietet die "Tagesschau"-App tatsächlich nur das, was tagesschau.de auch sonst ins Netz stellt. Und dennoch zeigt sich, dass mit ihr die Bedrohung für Zeitungen und Zeitschriften größer denn je ist. Gegenmaßnahmen dringend empfohlen!
Das bisher zweifellos heftigste Säbelrasseln zwischen Verlagen und öffentlich-rechtlichen Sendern nahm seinen Ursprung am 21. Dezember 2009, vor exakt einem Jahr also. Damals lief in den Verlagen über die Agenturen ein "dpa-Gespräch" mit Kai Gniffke ein, dem Chef der Nachrichtenredaktion ARD-aktuell. Der brisante Inhalt dieser Depesche: "Auch die ARD-'Tagesschau' wird wie andere große Medien demnächst als App auf dem iPhone auftauchen", notierte die dpa. Gniffke sagte ihr damals: "Mehrere Hunderttausend iPhone-Nutzer dürfen von uns erwarten, dass wir sie auch unterwegs mit seriösen Nachrichten versorgen." Und so geschah es nun.
Wer sich die kostenfreie App etwa aus Apples App-Store herunterlädt und sie auf einem iPad oder iPhone installiert, wird wenige Überraschungen erleben. Die "Tagesschau"-App fährt ausschließlich auf, was sich sonst am PC schon seit Jahren abrufen lässt: Gut zwei Dutzend Top-Meldungen aus Politik, Wirtschaft und Kultur - in Text, Foto und vor allem Video. Dazu gesellen sich Live-Streams der Sendungen und die "Tagesschau in 100 Sekunden". Sogar die "Tagesschau 24" ist nicht neu, die von der etwa 80-köpfigen Hamburger Redaktion ständig aktualisiert wird. Besitzer sogenannter Hybrid-Fernseher, die Angebote im Internet anwählen können, werden sie kennen. Die "Tagesschau 24" steht auch auf tagesschau.de bereit. Das Format, das wie der Klassiker um 20 Uhr ungefähr 15 Minuten dauert und dem Zuschauer das Überspringen ungewünschter Meldungen ermöglicht, dürfte seine volle Kraft aber vor allem in der mobilen Nutzung entfalten. Immer dort, wo mehr Zeit als bloß für die "Tagesschau in 100 Sekunden" ist.
Verblüffend und für die auf Werbeeinnahmen oder Abogebühren angewiesene Konkurrenz ebenso gefährlich ist vielmehr die Perfektion, mit der die App der "Tagesschau" daherkommt. Da dürfen sich Kai Gniffke, dessen Online-Chef Jörg Sadrozinski und Digitalstratege Georg Grommes zurecht auf die Schulter klopfen. Die Meldungen werden nämlich nahezu durchgehend von aktuellen Videos unterbrochen. Ein umständlicher Wechsel zwischen Text und Film entfällt, wie ihn viele Apps den Nutzern noch immer abverlangen. Die "Tagesschau"-App ist in dieser Hinsicht technisch ebenso ausgereift wie die App der Bild, die ebenfalls Fotogalerien und Clips intuitiv in die Stories einklinkt.
Diese durchgehend konsequente Verknüpfung mit Filmen ist zweifellos das Killer-Asset der "Tagesschau"-App. Anders als viele Verlage kann sie hier aus dem Vollen schöpfen. Viele App-Versionen der Printwelt werden hier rasch das Nachsehen haben - am ehesten die Apps, die wie die "Tagesschau" auf seriöse denn auf boulevardeske News setzen. So bedrohlich die "Tagesschau"-App aber auch wirken mag, genauso hilfreich könnte sie mitunter sein. Chefredakteuren von Zeitungen und Zeitschriften, die bisweilen in ihren Häusern um Geld für digitale Projekte betteln müssen, spielt sie in die Hände: Die "Tagesschau"-App schreit förmlich nach Gegen-Apps der Verlage, die dabei abseits der schnellen Schlagzeile für das Digitale ausschlachten, was sie schon immer am besten konnten: die Versorgung ihrer Leser mit Hintergründen und Einordnungen. Ob lokal, regional, überregional.
Keine Frage: Gniffkes App wird den Verlagen das Leben schwer machen. Wer sich bloß schnell über das Weltgeschehen informieren will, dem wird spätestens jetzt nicht mehr einleuchten, warum er dafür noch bezahlen soll. Andererseits konnte er sich das über die reguläre mobile Version von tagesschau.de aber auch schon bisher holen - über die mobile Version der Seite und die Sonderseite "Mobilecast", auf der tagesschau.de alle Sendungen zum mobilen Stream anbietet.
Fast könnte man also sagen, die "Tagesschau"-App schließt lediglich eine Lücke in der ohnehin stets heftigen Konkurrenz zwischen Verlagen, Privatsendern und mit Gebühren finanzierten Sendern. Wegdiskutieren wird sich die neue Situation zudem auch mit aller Kampfberichterstattung ohnehin nicht mehr lassen. Die App ist durch, sie ist da und sie wird vor allem auch ihre Fans finden. Das ist für die Verlage die bittere Realität, mit der sie sich gewiss nicht anfreunden, aber zwingend arrangieren müssen.
Einen Zustrom an Nutzern dürfte auch dieser konsequente und gefährliche Schachzug der "Tagesschau"-Macher auslösen: Ihre App haben sie nicht nur für Apples Geräte gefertigt, sondern gleich auch noch für Blackberrys und Handys, die auf Googles Plattform "Android" laufen. Hier könnte sich durchaus rächen, dass sich viele Verlage bisher auf Apples Produkte beschränkt haben. Kai Gniffke hat mit seiner App eben erschreckend lange auf sich warten lassen - dann aber mit ihr richtig geklotzt.
MEEDIA RÜCKBLICK
21.12.2010 Der VDZ kritisiert die Tagesschau-App
20.12.2010 NDR startet umstrittene Tagesschau-App

description.hltext_display: Transcend launches 64 GB class10 SDXC memory cards with unprecedented storage capacity and transfer rates
description.content:
The new 64 GB class 10 SDXC memory cards from Transcend are suited for the users desirous of extending Full HD video recording time and improving the performance of their DSLR cameras and HD camcorders!
New Delhi November 25, 2010: Transcend Information, Inc. (Transcend®), a worldwide leader in memory and storage products, today announced the company’s first 64GB Class 10 SDXC memory cards. Featuring an unprecedented amount of storage capacity and ultra fast transfer rates up to 25 MB/s, Transcend’s new Ultimate SDXC cards are perfect for consumers in need of extended Full HD video recording time and improved camera performance for high-resolution digital photography.
According to Gordon Wu, Regional head, SARRC, Transcend “SDXC (Secure Digital eXtended Capacity) is the next-generation standard for SD cards established by the Secure Digital Association (SDA). With supported capacities up to 2TB, SDXC offers vastly greater storage potential compared to the SDHC standard, which only supports capacities up to 32GB. A 64GB SDXC card can store a maximum of 26208 pictures (based on 5 megapixel JPEG compression format), 352 hours of standard quality video (MPEG-4 video at 384 Kbps), or 640 minutes of 1920x1080 Full HD videos. Thanks to its use of the exFAT file system that supports files larger than 4GB, Transcend’s SDXC cards are the ideal complement to today’s high-end SDXC-compatible DSLR cameras and HD camcorders.”
Fully Class 10 compliant, Transcend Ultimate SDXC cards boast read speeds up to 25 MB/s. This exceptional data transfer performance not only prevents lag when recording 1920x1080 Full HD videos, but also enables high-speed consecutive shooting at sporting or other fast-motion events. As more and more consumer electronic products such as HDTVs, Blu-ray players and mobile phones are expected to support SDXC in the near future, widespread adoption of SDXC is just around the corner.
Transcend’s new SDXC cards are comprehensively tested for compatibility and reliability.
Price: Rs.11220
Warranty: Lifetime
Availability: Supertron: 91-33-2213-1221/23;
Mediaman: 91-22-23823100/3200

description.hltext_display: 'Wereld mag komen controleren'
description.content:
ABIDJAN - De omstreden president van het West-Afrikaanse Ivoorkust, Laurent Gbagbo, heeft dinsdag beklemtoond dat een internationaal comit van onderzoekers de totstandkoming van de verkiezingsuitslagen kan komen controleren. Gbagbo zei in een toespraak dat hij geen oorlog wil en dat er geen Ivoriaans bloed meer mag worden vergoten. Gbagbo stelt dat hij 28 november is herkozen. Zijn uitdager, Alassane Ouattara, bestrijdt dat en noemt zichzelf de rechtmatige president van het land. Hij vertoeft onder bescherming van de VN in een hotel in de economische hoofdstad, Abidjan.
Ouattara heeft overweldigende steun in het buitenland verworven, maar niet in Ivoorkust zelf. Daar wil de gevestigde orde die op het christelijke zuiden stoelt, de macht niet afstaan aan Ouattara die de kandidaat van het islamitische noorden is.

description.hltext_display: "서귀포시·군위군 '� 용� ' 최� " - 통계청
description.content:
- 시지역 고용률 군지역보다 8.6%p 낮아
- 강원 춘천시, 충북 증평군 고용률 최하위
- 진학준비 가장 높은 지역은 '구미시'
[뉴스핌=김연순기자] 우리나라에서 고용률이 가장 높은 지역은 제주도의 서귀포시와 경상북도 군위군인 것으로 나타났다.
반면 고용률이 가장 낮은 지역은 강원도 춘천시와 태백시, 충청북도 증평군과 충청남도 연기군으로 조사됐다.
22일 통계청이 발표한 '2010년 기준 지역별고용조사 잠정결과'에 따르면, 시지역에서 고용률이 높은 지역은 도농통합도시인 제주도 서귀포시(66.8%), 충남 서산시(64.2%), 경북 상주시(63.8%) 순으로 높았다.
고용률이 낮게 나타난 지역은 강원도 춘천시(49.1%), 태백시(49.9%) 순이었다. 이 지역은 여성의 고용률이 전국 최저 지역으로 나타났다.
군지역의 고용률이 높게 나타난 지역은 농림어업의 비중이 가장 높은 경북 군위군(77.6%), 전남 신안군(75.1%), 전남 해남군(74.9%) 순이었으며, 고용률이 낮은 지역은 도시적 특성을 갖는 충북 증평군(56.4%), 충남 연기군(57.5%), 전남 화순군(58.1%)등으로 낮았다.
아울러 시 지역의 고용률은 56%로 군 지역의 고용률(64.6%)에 비해 8.6%p 낮았다.
실업률은 시지역이 2.9%로 군지역의 1.8%보다 1.1%p 높게 나타났다.
통계청은 군지역이 시지역에 비해 고용률이 높은 원인은 여성과 고령층의 고용률이 도시지역에 비해 훨씬 높은 비중을 차지하기 때문이라고 설명했다.
임금근로자가 많은 도시지역의 취업자는 정년 및 조기퇴직제 고령에 따른 근무환경이 어려운 반면, 농촌의 특성이 강한 군지역은 농림어업 부문 종사자가 많아 고용률이 상대적으로 높은 비중을 차지했다는 설명이다.
또한 임근근로자의 구성비가 가장 높은 지역은 경기도 수원시로 81.3%를 기록했으며, 전남 신안군은 20.1%로 가장 낮은 것으로 조사됐다.
이와 함께 비경제활동인구 사유 중 '재학·진학준비'가 가장 높은 비중을 차지하는 지역은 구미시(34.9%), 천안시(34.5%) 등으로 청년층(15~29세)의 비경제활동인구 비율이 높은 곳이었다.
'육아'가 가장 높은 오산시와 거제시는 조출생률이 전국에서 높은 지역으로 조사됐다.
한편 근무기지준 취업자를 조사한 결과 전남 영암군의 경우 거주지기준 고용률은 65%이지만 근무지기준으로 보면 105.7%에 달했다.
통계청의 은순현 과장은 "이는 15세 이상 인구보다 일자리수가 더 많다는 것을 의미한다"고 밝혔다.
경기도 광명시는 거주지기준 고용률이 54.7%를 차지했으나 근무지 기준으로는 33.8%를 차지했다.
광명시 취업자 중 사당수가 타지역으로 통근하고 있으며 주거도시(Bed Town)의 성격이 높기 때문이라는 설명이다.
[뉴스핌 Newspim]김연순 기자 (y2kid@newspim.com)

description.hltext_display: 南韓考慮收取海外借款費用以避免資金外流(鉅亨網)
description.content: 由於南北韓局勢呈現緊張狀態，南韓政府憂慮本國資金將外移尋找避風港。南韓政府於12 月 20 日提出新措施，不但將加強處罰不當的外匯交易，對於銀行的外匯借款收取費用，甚至可能緊縮衍生性商品的交易規範。南韓財政部昨日表示正在考慮對於未滿1 年的海外借款收取20 個基本點的交易費用。(資料來源：Bloomberg）

description.hltext_display: Tina Maze tretja v Courchevelu: Hrvatovo postavitev je poznala
description.content:
Najboljša slovenska alpska smučarka Tina Maze je slalom v Courchevelu končala na tretjem mestu
Alpsko smučanje - sreda, 22.12.2010 Tekst: Andraž Rožman
Ljubljana - Tina Maze znova razveseljuje. V Courchevelu se je včeraj drugič v karieri prebila na stopničke na slalomskih tekmah za svetovni pokal. Na zahtevni progi, ki je terjala številne odstope (ob progi sta že v prvi vožnji nastopa končali tudi Maria Riesch in Lindesy Vonn, ki sta se po tekmi skupaj odpravili v Garmisch-Partenkirchen, kjer bosta skupaj preživeli božične praznike), se ni pustila zmesti in je premagala vse pasti. Dvaindvajsetič v karieri se je povzpela na zmagovalni oder. V skupnem seštevku svetovnega pokala se je povzpela na peto mesto, v slalomu pa na šesto. Pričakovanja je izpolnila tudi Maruša Ferk. Drugič v tej sezoni se je uvrstila med dobitnice točk v slalomu. Za 22. mesto jih je dobila devet. Rekonvalescentka Vanja Brodnik je bila s startno številko 68 na 35. mestu blizu finala.
Top iz rubrike
Zadnje objavljeno
Tina Maze je včeraj v Crouchevelu zaradi imenitnega spodnjega dela proge prišla v cilj silno nasmejana in je na koncu osvojila tretje mesto v slalomu. (Foto: AP)
Slovenski ljubitelji smučanja verjetno ne bi imeli nič proti, če bi bile tekme za svetovni pokal v Courchevelu, ki je bil leta 1992 tudi eno od prizorišč olimpijskih iger, bolj pogosto. Na obeh dosedanjih so se namreč slovenski smučarji veselili uvrstitve na stopničke. Leta 1979 je to v veleslalomu uspelo Bojanu Križaju, včeraj Tini Maze. Tako je 27-letna Korošica najboljšega slovenskega smučarja vseh časov ujela še po enem merilu, sicer precej manj pomembnem kot na primer število zmag v svetovnem pokalu, ki jih imata oba po devet. Uspeh Tine Maze je zagotovo razveselil tudi predsednika smučarske zveze Tomaža Lovšeta. Morda mu je celo malo omilil trpljenje, ki ga doživlja ob bolečinah, saj naj bi si na smučanju zlomil nogo.
Po tekmi je bilo največ govora o postavitvi prve proge hrvaškega trenerja Zorana Sobola, ki je smučarkam povzročala obilo težav. A ne tudi Tini Maze, ki je pojasnila: "Postavitev je bila razgibana. Vertikale so bile postavljeno bolj na kratko kot po navadi, zato so dekletom povzročale težave. Postavitve hrvaškega trenerja smo poznali, zato smo jih pred tekmo preizkusili. Postavitev mi ni povzročala težav, medtem ko so jih druge tekmovalke imele. Veliko je bilo treba razmišljati, a naloga ni bila nemogoča."
Prvo vožnjo je Mazejeva končala na četrtem mestu, v drugi pa je v cilj prismučala na trenutno prvo. Ko je za njo zaostala še Francozinja Nastasia Noens, si je zagotovila tretje mesto. Imenitno smučanje je pokazala predvsem v spodnjem delu prve proge, medtem ko je imela v zgornjem nekaj težave. "V prvi vožnji sem začela s preveč okroglo linijo, zato sem v zgornjem delu proge izgubila nekaj časa. Je bilo pa zato v spodnjem delu veliko bolje," je dodala Mazejeva, ki je imel očitno srečno roko pri izbiri kraja za trening. Minuli teden je vadila prav v Courchevelu: "Vedno pomaga, če preizkusiš teren, na katerem je kasneje tekma. S treningom v Courchevelu smo žrtvovali kakšen dan počitka. Želela sem preizkusiti smučišče, na katerem prej še nikoli nisem smučala. Odločitev je bila pravilna," je dodala.
Sedaj Črnjanko čaka nekaj dni počitka, saj bo v domačem okolju lahko preživela božične praznike, nato pa bodo na vrsti novi stresni trenutki na Semmeringu, ki bo prihodnji teden gostil slalom in veleslalom. "Končno grem domov, kjer nisem bila vse od Levija. Veselim se kakšnega dneva počitka. Verjetno bomo imeli prijetno družinsko večerjo," se je razgovorila in v svojem znanem odločnem slogu dodala: "Nato bo sledila pot na Semmering in znova napad na polno."
Medtem ko v slovenskem taboru ni manjkalo razlogov za veselje, se je 23. zmage na slalomih veselila Avstrijka Marlies Schild. Na večni slalomski lestvici po zmagah zaostaja le še za Vreni Schneider (34), na tretjem mestu je Erika Hess (21). Schildova je v drugem teku smučala sanjsko. Ko je prišla v cilj (po prvi vožnji je bila druga), je s prednostjo 1,98 prehitela Mazejevo, ki je vožnjo avstrijske tekmice označila za popolno. Schildovi se ni približala niti vodilna po prvi vožnji Tanja Poutiainen (2. mesto; +0,78). Suvereno je zmagala in si priborila nagrado v višini 40.000 evrov, čeprav je padla na ogrevanju in si poškodovala ramo. "Smučala sem na meji. Na položnejšem delu sem vseskozi pridobivala hitrost. Proga, še posebno prva, je bila zelo zahtevna, v drugi pa je bilo zabavno smučati. Upam, da z ramo ni nič hujšega. Mislim, da ni nobena kost zlomljena," je povedala Schildova.

description.hltext_display: Sidang Kasus Pembunuhan Berakhir Ricuh
description.content: Metrotvnews.com, Mataram: Sidang kasus pembunuhan di Pengadilan Negeri Mataram, NTB kembali ricuh. Sidang diwarnai aksi saling kejar-kejaran pengunjung dengan terdakwa. Sementara keluarga korban histeris dan berkali-kali pingsan. Ratusan pengunjung sidang geram setelah terdakwa Farid dihadirkan dalam sidang lanjutan kasus pembunuhan warga Sekarbela, Musleh. Selain keluarga korban warga Sekarbela yang menyaksikan jalannya sidang ikut-ikutan emosi hendak menghakimi terdakwa. Sidang ketiga yang diketuai Majelis Hakim, Bion Ginting menghadirkan saksi Hasbullah. Dalam keterangannya Hasbullah mengaku korban Musleh mengalami tiga luka bacok dua di bagian dada dan luka robek di kepala. Keterangan saksi ini membuat keluarga korban dan pengunjung sidang beringas ingin menghabisi terdakwa. Ricuh pengunjung tidak terhindar setelah Majelis Hakim menunda sidang hingga Kamis pekan depan. Warga yang marah sempat mengejar teradakwa untuk dihakimi namun berhasil diselamatkan puluhan aparat. Ratusan pengunjung bahkan mengejar terdakwa hingga mobil tahanan yang di parkir di halaman kantor pengadilan. Namun puluhan aparat bersenjata lengkap berhasil mengantisipasi dan terdakwa langsung dilarikan ke LP Mataram. Sementara anak korban Rukiah berteriak histeris karena tidak kuasa menahan rasa sakit hati atas tewasnya sang ayah. Rukiah berkali-kali pingsan tak kuasa menahan perasaannya sejak kematian ayahnya. (Lalu Hasanuddin/RIE)

description.hltext_display: 資訊電子大趨勢：低碳平板智慧(中央商情網)
description.content: （中央社記者韋樞台北2010年12月22日電）資策會產業情報研究所勾勒出明年資訊電子業將朝低碳風、智慧風、平板風等十大趨勢邁進。資策會表示，新興國家成長動能雖大，但台商應提防貨幣升值、通膨、資產泡沫化等危機。資策會產業情報研究所 (MIC)今天舉行「前瞻2011高科技產業十大趨勢記者會」，研究所所長詹文男勾勒出全球資訊電子產業的十大趨勢，包括低碳風、智慧風、平板風、平台風、APP風、3D風、體感風、雲端風、社群風、4G風等。詹文男表示，全球講究低碳風，資訊電子業應先從自身做起，採取節能對策降低對環境的危害，接著再應用資通訊的技術達到更有效率的節能減碳成效，最後才是和環境生態共存。詹文男舉例，正在發展中明顯範例就是智慧電網。2009年全球智慧電網市場規模近700億美元，預期2015年將成長至1900億美元，年複合成長率約18%。此外，從智慧手機、智慧行動平台、智慧電視到智慧城市都是未來智慧風的必走潮流。詹文男指出，全球智慧手機2010年出貨量2億8600萬支，滲透率21.6% ，2012年飛躍成長到5億800萬支，滲透率達35.1%。新一代的智慧電視盒方面，2010年台廠出貨量占全球的4成，在消費者對線上影音、網路租片等服務需求持續增加，以及Google、Apple加入市場的情況下，可望提升台廠出貨比重，預估2011年全球市場規模達2000萬台。平板風更是在蘋果的iPad問市後，各家對平板裝置趨之若鶩，而伴隨Android新平台的推出，兩者結合後更加大成長動能。詹文男說，明年全球平板裝置出貨3831萬台，年增率高達212%，2012年更達5232萬台，年增率達36.6%，但到了2015年出貨量達7116萬台，但年增率趨緩至7.8%。3D顯示技術方面，未來將由電視朝向可攜式產品延伸。他強調，包括3D電視、監視器、筆記型電腦等，到2014年均處於高成長階段，其中3D電視2014年市占達21%。

description.hltext_display: Sony estimates 50% jump in camera sales
description.content:
CHANDIGARH: Consumer electronics maker Sony today said it hopes a 50 per cent jump in revenue from camera sales to Rs 900 crore with market share of 40 per cent this fiscal on the back of new launches.
"Our sales from cameras in India is estimated to go up from Rs 600 crore in last fiscal to Rs 900 crore in 2010-11," Sony India General Manager Tadato Kimura told reporters here today.
Sony currently has 35 per cent market share in the country's total camera market of 2.2 million units. "We are aiming to capture 40 per cent share of total camera market," he said.
Growing by 35 per cent annually, the country's total camera market is pegged at Rs 1,750 crore in 2009-10 and is expected to reach Rs 2,250 crore in current fiscal.
Sony today unveiled new range of digital cameras , priced at Rs 29,990 and Rs 34,990 here and expects new models to contribute 15 per cent to the company's total sales.
"We expect to sell 40,000 units of new range of cameras which will contribute 15 per cent to Sony's camera business," he said.
"We believe that these cameras would surely create excitement among Indian consumers who are dynamic and receptive to new products," he said.

event_or_fact.property: We expect to sell 40,000 units of new range of cameras which will contribute 15 per cent to Sony's camera business
Our sales from cameras in India is estimated to go up from Rs 600 crore in last fiscal to Rs 900 crore in 2010-11
We believe that these cameras would surely create excitement among Indian consumers who are dynamic and receptive to new products
We are aiming to capture 40 per cent share of total camera market

description.hltext_display: Luka Elsner predstavil knjigo Železna volja: Navdih je črpal iz izkušenj
description.content:
Ljubljana - Nogometaš Luka Elsner je sinoči predstavil svojo knjigo Železna volja. Knjiga za razliko od mnogih drugih, ki so jo napisali številni nogometaši, ni avtobiografska, temveč je namenjena vsem mladim nogometašem, ki se podajajo na pot profesionalizma. "Knjiga je prvotno namenjena predvsem nogometašem, a ko enkrat knjigo prebereš, ugotoviš, da je stvar uporabna tudi na mnogo drugih področjih. Sicer pa bo tu mladi nogometaš našel neko usmeritev, kako doseči želene cilje," je prepričan Elsner, ki je navdih za knjigo črpal predvsem iz svojih igralskih izkušenj in informacij, ki jih je pridobil skozi kariero.
Top iz rubrike
Zadnje objavljeno
Luka Elsner je svojo knjigo najprej izdal v francoskem jeziku, zdaj pa še v maternem. (Foto: Luka Cjuha)
"Spoznal sem, da so pravila za dosego uspeha v športu povsod dokaj enaka, to me je na koncu pripeljalo do trenutka, ko sem se odločil, da napišem knjigo," je povedal nogometaš, ki je v mladosti odraščal v Nici in tudi tekoče govori francosko. Prav zato je njegova knjiga sprva izšla v francoskem jeziku, sedaj pa je prevedena tudi v slovenščino. Elsnerjev debitantski izdelek na področju pisateljstva vključuje tudi pogovore z nekaterimi slovenskimi reprezentanti in tujimi nogometnimi zvezdniki.
"Predgovor in uvodno besedo sta napisala vratar francoske izbrane vrste Hugo Lloris in izkušeni nogometaš Jocelyn Blanchard, knjiga pa vključuje tudi štiri intervjuje z Andražem Kirmom, Valterjem Birso, Brankom Iličem in Samirjem Handanovičem, poleg tega pa sem dodal tudi pogovor s Slavišo Stojanovičem," je na predstavitvi svoje knjige, ki sta se je udeležila tudi njegov oče Marko Elsner in najboljši slovenski nogometaš zadnjih petdesetih let Branko Oblak, povedal 28-letnik.

description.hltext_display: 재� �의 57.4%, 내년 상반기에 조기집행
description.content:
[뉴스핌=임애신기자] 정부가 내년 상반기에 전체 사업비의 57.4%에 해당하는 156조원을 조기 집행한다.
단 내년 상반기 경기흐름에 따라 필요하면 상반기 집행률 상향 등을 통해 실제 경기상황에 탄력적으로 대응한다는 계획이다.
기획재정부는 22일 윤증현 장관 주재로 열린 제36차 위기관리대책회의에서 이같은 내년 재정집행 방향을 확정하고, 조기집행 추진방향에 대해 논의했다고 밝혔다.
윤 장관은 "각 부처는 내년 예산이 정기국회 회기 중에 확정된 점을 감안해 연초부터 즉시 자금집행이 가능하도록 사전에 철저히 준비하라"고 말했다.
그는 또 "특히 동절기인 1분기 중에 일자리와 서민생활 안정을 위한 예산의 집행에 역량을 집중해야 한다"고 당부했다.
이에 따라 정부는 내년에도 재정 조기집행의 원활한 추진을 위해 예산집행 특별점검체계를 지속적으로 운영하기로 했다.
매월 1~2회 예산집행특별점검단회의를 개최하고 부처합동 현장점검을 추진해 부처, 공공기관의 집행실적을 점검할 방침이다.
또 재정집행 효과가 조기에 가시화 되도록 일자리, 서민생활 안정, SOC사업 등에 대해 상반기에 전체 집행률 57.4%보다 높은 수준으로 집행을 추진하기로 했다.
[뉴스핌 Newspim]임애신 기자 (vancouver@newspim.com)

description.hltext_display: 聯電投資美智慧電網大廠(中央社)
description.content: （中央社台北22日電）聯華電子公司透過旗下的聯電創投公司投資美國的智慧電網公司Trilliant Inc. 。總部位於加州的Trilliant昨天在公司網站上發布這項聲明。 聯電的投資人關係經理于恆

description.hltext_display: La clef Duchamp
description.author: admin
description.content:
Devant le musée des Beaux-Arts de Rouen, Marcel Duchamp, un artiste aux mille facettes, reste le seul à être cité par quatre plaques de rue aux textes différents. Né à Blainville-Crevon le 28 juillet 1887, ce fils de notaire manifestait une extrême retenue. Cet « ingénieur du temps perdu » revendiquait le droit à la paresse. Il était aussi « anartiste », superbe néologisme pour qualifier une personnalité hors du commun, « marchand de sel » et « joueur d'échecs » avec son ami photographe Man Ray.
en lire plus

description.hltext_display: Travel Info From Budapest Airport, Wednesday, 22 December
description.content:
"Though weather and flight conditions in Budapest would permit normal winter operations, due to the traffic disruptions in a number of European airports and hence the increased demand for flight information we switched our webpage to easy mode to guarantee quick access to it. Severe snowfalls have paralyzed air traffic in parts of Western Europe or have caused long delays. According to the forecasts the weather will keep airports under pressure.
Passengers are kindly requested to contact their airline about departures before starting out to Budapest Airport.
Airlines' contacts."
Source: Budapest Airport

description.hltext_display: Korsel Ingin Damai Saja
description.author: Baskoro Pramadani
description.content: SEOUL - Korea Selatan (Korsel) tengah berusaha menyelesaikan masalah diplomatik dengan China akibat tenggelamnya sebuah kapal China yang diduga tengah menangkap ikan secara ilegal. Korsel tampaknya ingin menyelesaikan masalah ini lewat jalan damai.Seorang awak kapal asal China meninggal, sementara seorang lainnya masih menghilang setelah kapal yang mereka tumpangi bertabrakan dengan kapal petugas penjaga pantai milik Korsel di wilayah Laut Kuning."Kedua negara berpendapat mereka harus mengadakan dialog untuk menyelesaikan masalah ini tanpa ada pihak yang dirugikan," ujar pejabat Kementerian Luar Negeri Korsel yang tidak menyebutkan namanya. Demikian dilansir AFP pada Rabu (21/12/2010). "Saat ini, proses penyelidikan tengah berlangsung untuk menemukan fakta-fakta yang objektif (terkait dengan kapal yang tenggelam)," ujar seorang pejabat lainnya. Seoul dikabarkan akan melakukan proses penyelidikan bersama dengan Beijing atas insiden ini."Kami tidak bermaksud menjadikan kasus ini sebagai sebuah isu diplomatik. Kamu ingin mengatasinya melalui proses konsultasi dengan pemerintah China," ujar pejabat yang tidak ingin disebutkan namanya tersebut.China sebelumnya telah meminta Korsel membayar kompensasi atas karamnya kapal nelayan seberat 63 ton itu. Mereka juga ingin Korsel menghukum awak kapal yang terlibat dalam insiden tersebut. "Korsel harus membawa para pelaku (penabrakan) ini ke pengadilan, membayar kompensasi atas kerusakan properti kami dan mengambil langkah-langkah konkret untuk mencegah hal-hal semacam ini terjadi lagi," ujar Juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri China Jiang Yu.(fmh)

description.hltext_display: START-verdrag op koers
description.content:
WASHINGTON - De Amerikaanse Senaat debatteert niet langer over de ratificatie van het nieuwe Verdrag voor Vermindering van Strategische Wapens (START). Dinsdag besloten in een stemming 67 senatoren er een punt achter te zetten. Dat aantal is ook nodig voor de ratificatie in de stemming van woensdag, indien dan alle honderd senatoren aanwezig zijn. Zo lijkt zich dus een meerderheid voor ratificatie te hebben afgetekend. Het zou een overwinning zijn voor de Democratische president Barack Obama. Hij heeft aangedrongen op de acceptatie van dit verdrag, waarmee Rusland en de VS de beperking van hun nucleaire wapenarsenalen verder regelen.
Senator John Kerry waarschuwde dat de race nog niet voorbij is. Toch hebben al twaalf senatoren van de Republikeinse oppositie gezegd met de Democraten mee, voor ratificatie te stemmen, ondanks oproepen van vooraanstaande Republikeinen het verdrag af te wijzen.

description.hltext_display: Polom Olimpije v Linzu, Jeseničani priznali premoč madžarski Sapi Fehervar
description.content:
Linz - V 28. krogu lige Ebel sta slovenska predstavnika doživela grenka poraza. Hokejisti Tilie Olimpije so v Linzu izgubili kar z 0:7, Jeseničani pa so gostovali pri Sapi Fehervar in izgubili 3:5.
Top iz rubrike
Zadnje objavljeno
Preberite tudi
(slika je simbolična) (Foto: Bojan Velikonja / dokumentacija Dnevnika)
Black Wings Linz - Tilia Olimpija 7:0 (4:0, 2:0, 1:0)
Po reprezentančnem premoru, ko je Slovenija igrala na turnirju na Jesenicah, se je nadaljevala liga Ebel. Z 28. krogom se je prevesila v drugo polovico, moštva so se med seboj pomerila četrtič. Olimpija je odšla na gostovanje v Linz, pred katerim je imela po polovici prvenstva tri točke naskoka.
Pred premorom so imeli v taboru zeleno-belih pravo bolnišnico, zdaj sta se v ekipo vrnila Matt Higgins in Jure Kralj, še vedno pa so manjkali branilci Burke Henry, Kevin Kantee, Damjan Dervarič in Igor Cvetek.
Po treh letošnjih zaporednih zmagah proti Linzu nihče ni pričakoval pravega potopa, do katerega pa je prišlo izključno zaradi popolnega mrka ljubljanske ekipe v zadnjih štirih minutah prve tretjine. Do 16. minute je bila igra izenačena. V osmi minuti je imel celo veliko priložnost Aleš Mušič, a je bil Alex Westlund na mestu, v 12. minuti pa je ob igralcu več imel priložnost še Petr Šachl, Westlund pa je spet branil. Morda so zaradi te obrambe in še 33 drugih nekdanjega Olimpijinega vratarja tudi izbrali za igralca tekme.
Prav neverjetno je, kaj se je dogajalo z Ljubljančani v teh štirih minutah. Domači so takrat kot po tekočem traku zadevali po grobih napakah gostov. V zadnjih 16 sekundah so dosegli kar dva gola in ob koncu tretjine je bil izid 4:0.
Po prvi tretjini je vratar gostov Matija Pintarič prepustil mesto Janu Chaberi, ki pa tudi ni mogel preprečiti še treh zadetkov domačih. V zadnji tretjini so imeli gostje tudi precej dela ob številčni prednosti domačih, ki so imeli petkrat razmerje 5-4, dvakrat so bili zeleno-beli pri branjenju neuspešni.
Že v četrtek se bodo morali zmaji pripraviti na nov obračun, v Tivoli prihaja Salzburg.
Sapa Fehervar - Acroni Jesenice 5:3 (1:0, 2:0, 2:3)
Jeseniški hokejisti so po daljši rezultatski krizi padli na zadnje mesto lige, ki so si ga delili prav z današnjimi tekmeci. Gostovanje v Szekesfehervarju je bilo za slovenske prvake zato še posebej pomembno, saj se je prvenstvo z današnjim 28. krogom prevesilo v drugo polovico, boj za vstopnice za končnico pa bo z vsakim krogom postajal vse ostrejši.
Uvodne minute so po pričakovanju minile v naletu domačih, ki so dodobra ogreli Mitcha O'Keefa, ki je do desete minute nanizal nekaj lepih obramb, pri vodilnem zadetku gostiteljev pa je bil brez moči, potem ko so Jeseničani naredili napako v obrambi in zadetek domačim praktično podarili. Sledilo je nekaj minut gostov, toda pravega orožja za domačega vratarja Zoltana Hetenyja niso našli.
Žal pa trud iz uvodne tretjine v nadaljevanju ni bil poplačan, železarjem se je godilo precej slabo, kar so hokejisti Sape s pridom izkoristili in po dveh tretjinah ušli na tri varne zadetke naskoka. V uvodu drugega dela je varovancem Heikkija Mälkiäja kazalo zelo dobro, kajti Madžari so morali trikrat zapored na kazensko klop, česar železarjem ni uspelo unovčiti in so za nameček prejeli še zadetek z igralcem več, kar jim je spodrezalo krila, gostiteljem pa je podvojeno vodstvo dalo novega zagona, ki so ga izkoristili dobre tri minute pred piskom sirene po drugih dvajsetih minutah in jeseniško moštvo postavili pred sila zahtevno nalogo.
Ta je bila še težja po vsega 56 sekundah zadnjega dela, ko so gostitelji zadeli še četrtič, kar je pomenilo popoln napad gostov. In tako je tudi bilo. Napadi Jeseničanov so se vrstili eden za drugim, streljali so z vseh mogočih položajev, priložnosti ni bilo malo, toda Hetenyi je še enkrat dokazal, da gre za izredno nadarjenega vratarja, ki pa je bil na sredini zadnjega dela brez moči, ko so železarji prvič zadeli v polno. Ob silovitem pritisku gostov so imeli domači precej priložnosti v protinapadih, toda Mitch O'Keefe je svoje delo opravljal zelo dobro, brez moči pa je bil ob petem zadetku domačih. Še prej so gostje rezultat znižali, se po vodstvu Sape še enkrat približali na -2, a popolnega zasuka ni bilo.
V naslednjem krogu bodo Jeseničani v četrtek doma igrali z Beljakom.

description.hltext_display: Boustead ventures into air charter business
description.content: BOUSTEAD Holdings Bhd, in a move to further strengthen its portfolio in the oil and gas industry, is venturing into air charter business via a special purpose vehicle (SPV) that will acquire all the helicopters and aircrafts owned by the subsidiaries of DRIR Equities Sdn Bhd. The total purchase, it said, would not cost more than RM100 million. For the purpose, Boustead has entered into a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with DRIR and Tulus Sejagat Sdn Bhd with the intention to acquire 10.2 million ordinary shares, of RM1 each in MHS Aviation Bhd, representing 51 per cent equity interest therein and another 51 per cent equity interest in a SPV that shall purchase all the helicopters and aircrafts owned by the subsidiaries of DRIR. In a filing to Bursa Malaysia, Boustead said on Aug 20, 2010, Petronas Carigali Sdn Bhd awarded a contract to MHS to provide rotary wing aircraft, equipment and services (for heavy type aircraft - EC225) for a period of ten years with an option to extend for another five years commencing April 1, 2011 to March 31, 2021. "The board believes the new contract secured by MHS from Petronas Carigali and other firm contracts, amounting to approximately RM3.1 billion which will span over 10 years, will further ensure the continued revenue from air charter business and utilisation of the aircraft for the benefit of Boustead Group," it said. Hence, the venture into the air charter business will be undertaken together with the existing shareholder of MHS who will still hold 49 per cent interest in MHS in order to secure and retain the required experience and expertise in the air chartering business. If the proposed acquisition materialised, it is expected to contribute positively to the future earnings of the Boustead Group. - BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Attorney Craig H. Blinderman Joins Hollywood Florida Personal Injury Law Firm of Rosenberg & Rosenberg, P.A.
description.content:
Craig H. Blinderman, Personal Injury Attorney with As a testament to its deep commitment to helping victims of personal injury throughout Florida, the Hollywood law firm of Rosenberg & Rosenberg welcomes the addition of experienced Craig H. Blinderman as an Associate Attorney.
“We’re excited to have Craig join our firm,” says Attorney Paul Rosenberg. “His experience with personal injury protection in particular will be an asset to our clients and the firm as a whole.”
Mr. Blinderman brings 19 years of experience as a trial attorney, including more than 15 years of experience in personal injury protection (PIP) litigation representing both plaintiffs and insurance carriers during his career. He has also been plaintiffs’ co-counsel on several high-profile class action lawsuits against large corporations such as Wal-Mart, Netflix, Shell Oil and Celebrity Cruises.
Graduating in 1991, Craig T. Blinderman holds a Juris Doctorate from Thomas M. Cooley Law School in Lansing, Michigan. That same year Mr. Blinderman was admitted to the Florida Bar and gained valuable litigation and trial experience during the next three years while employed at the Broward County State Attorney’s Office as an Assistant State Attorney and a lead prosecutor of a felony trial division.
Subsequently, he served as legal counsel to the Broward Sheriff’s Office where he proudly assisted with the development of the Florida Law Enforcement’s LEECH (Law Enforcement to End Child Harm) Program, which is designed to teach school teachers and administrators how to protect students from sexual predators.
From 1996 until his recent move to , Mr. Blinderman handled high-level cases involving both the prosecution and insurance defense of bodily injury claims, personal injury protection (PIP) claims, personal injury pre-litigation, and workers’ compensation litigation. Mr. Blinderman is also a renowned expert on attorney’s fees relating to PIP litigation and regularly testifies before the courts in South Florida on these matters.
Florida is one of several states with mandatory Personal Injury Protection (PIP), or “no fault” coverage, an extension of car insurance that covers any medical or funeral expenses accrued as a result of the car accident or injury. PIP can sometimes cover lost wages, as well. About the firm: is a well-established, full-service, personal injury and in Hollywood, Florida, serving the Ft. Lauderdale and Miami area. Our skilled lawyers have the knowledge and experience needed to get the best outcome for Florida injury and accident victims. Contact us toll-free at 1 (888) 748-1715 for a free consultation.

description.hltext_display: Gift of life forges a special bond
description.content:
Orlynda "Lindy" Pickens, 57, above right, of Vallejo, and James Claflin of Chico, who donated a kidney to her, make their way out of a UC Davis Medical Center exam room after meeting for the first time Tuesday.
The two were on their way to a news conference down the hall.
Second photo, Pickens begins to cry as she looks over at Claflin, 57, a CSU Chico geography instructor who decided to become a donor without knowing who the recipient would be.
Before the surgery earlier this month, medical center officials said, Pickens was suffering from renal failure as a result of polycystic kidney disease.

description.hltext_display: 新闻评论:消费人应发挥力量
description.content:
普通咖啡店卖一杯咖啡块八钱，贸消部叫消费人抵制。名牌咖啡店卖一杯咖啡四块八钱，没有人会反对。除了装修装潢的差别，咖啡，还是咖啡。
曾经有报道指消费者投诉在高级餐厅加点了一粒十令吉的荷包蛋，店家解释那是因为装潢、食油、鸡蛋、厨师都是高级的，所以十令吉一粒蛋不过分。
附加理由推高价格
上述问题出在哪里？鸡蛋、咖啡的本质原料都是一样的，只不过是其他附加理由，导致价格暴涨。所以，很有理由相信，咖啡店业者只要将店面装修以及自称厨师是老头手，无论咖啡价格涨到怎么离谱，贸消部都不会管。
雪隆咖啡茶餐商公会宣布基于原料、店租、水电费、员工薪金等之上涨，从明年元旦起建议调整所有冲泡饮料价格涨20仙。
这意味普遍卖1令吉60仙的咖啡，将调至1令吉80仙，像美禄这类“无可替代”的饮料，可能就要卖2令吉20仙了。
在大家还在苦思今年该是什么字能成为年度汉字之际，“涨”应该会成为人们重新考虑的汉字。没有人会愿意见到物价高涨的。
但扪心自问，有什么东西的价格在这三两年内没有调涨过？政府又能做些什么？政府要国家成为高收入国，就是要让人有得赚，赚到钱才有高收入，赚不到钱，养不起工人，哪来高收入？
贸消部对咖啡店要涨价就扬言要对付商家，是只见树木不见森林之举。政府允许白糖一再起价，而不管制名牌咖啡店的售价，也不理会名牌咖啡粉、可可粉节节攀升的售价，却要制止传统咖啡店起价，有值得商榷必要。
传统咖啡店面对的问题，往往在名牌咖啡店就不是问题。无论是走廊摆放桌椅、食物饮料售价、聘用外劳等等方面，都是“同是餐馆不同命”。
消费人拥有决定权
其实，最后决定权是消费人，如果不愿意，就可以如贸消部高官所说：“自己冲泡饮料饮用”。反之，如果继续光顾已涨价的咖啡痁，那就是默许商家涨价的做法。
目前是消费人发挥及行使权利的时候了，通过集体的力量，呼朋唤友让商家认识消费人意识的力量。若商家继续以各种似是而非的理由不合理涨价，就拒绝光顾好了，让商家吃西北风，看他们下次还敢任意涨价吗？

description.hltext_display: EANS-News: Intercell starts a Phase I clinical trial for a new vaccine to prevent Clostridium difficile infections
description.content:
- » After successful pre-clinical trials, Intercell is progressing its vaccine candidate against Clostridium difficile, the major cause of nosocomial diarrhea, into the clinical development stage » Initiation of a first-in-man Phase I clinical trial in healthy subjects » Study aims to obtain safety and immunogenicity data - initial results expected in Q3 2011 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Corporate news transmitted by euro adhoc. The issuer/originator is solely responsible for the content of this announcement. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Research & Development Subtitle: - » After successful pre-clinical trials, Intercell is progressing its vaccine candidate against Clostridium difficile, the major cause of nosocomial diarrhea, into the clinical development stage » Initiation of a first-in-man Phase I clinical trial in healthy subjects » Study aims to obtain safety and immunogenicity data - initial results expected in Q3 2011 Vienna (Austria), December 22, 2010 - (euro adhoc) - Intercell AG (VSE: ICLL) today announced that a Phase I clinical trial with the company's vaccine candidate IC84 to prevent disease caused by the bacterium Clostridium difficile (C. difficile) has started. The pathogen is one of the main causes of nosocomial diarrhea. Intercell's vaccine candidate is a recombinant protein vaccine consisting of two truncated toxins A and B from Clostridium difficile. The toxins are known to be disease-causing and anti-toxin immunity can be protective. The vaccine candidate will be tested with or without the adjuvant aluminum hydroxide. This Phase I trial is a first-in-man study to obtain safety and immunogenicity data in a small population of healthy adults aged 18-65 years in the first part of the study as well as from healthy elderly subjects above 65 years of age in a second part of the study, the latter age group representing the main target population for a Clostridium difficile vaccine. 60 healthy adults and up to 100 elderly subjects will be enrolled in this open-label study. Three different alum-adjuvanted vaccine concentrations will be tested; two of the three vaccine concentrations will also be tested without adjuvant. "The initiation of this clinical Phase I trial is an important step to further strengthen Intercell's leading position in the development of vaccines against hospital-acquired infections", commented Intercell's COO, Thomas Lingelbach. There is no vaccine available against Clostridium difficile, which represents the leading cause of nosocomial diarrhea in the U.S. and EU and is an increasing burden to the health care system. The disease affects in particular elderly patients with prolonged antibiotic treatment and patients with underlying co-morbidities or immunocompromising conditions. Antibiotic treatment is the current standard of care of Clostridium difficile-associated disease but has its limitations due to increasing treatment failures attributable to antibiotic resistance and disease relapse in up to 30% of patients after discontinuation of the treatment. Potential indications for a Clostridium difficile vaccine include community prophylaxis for the elderly, prophylaxis in hospitalized patients with particular risk factors for Clostridium difficile-associated disease and the prevention of relapsing disease. end of announcement euro adhoc -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ots Originaltext: Intercell AG Im Internet recherchierbar: http://www.presseportal.de Further inquiry note: Intercell AG Corporate Communications Tel. +43 1 20620-1222/-1116 communications@intercell.com Branche: Biotechnology ISIN: AT0000612601 WKN: A0D8HW Index: ATX Prime, ATX Börsen: Wien / official market
