description.content:
Club Fedelissimi: Francioso e De Solda alla Festa di Natale
Come ormai consuetudine anche quest'anno, il Club Sportivo FEDELISSIMI BRINDISI presso la sede stessa del club al rione Casale, in data 22/12/10 alle ore 19.00, ricorrerrà lo scambio di Auguri tra tutti soci e con l'occasione parteciperanno alla serata due ospiti d'eccezione, due bandiere del Brindisi Calcio, Mino Francioso e Alessandro De Solda.
Inoltre il Presidente Giuseppe Spagnolo, il Consiglio Direttivo e tutti i soci, Augurano di cuore Buone Feste a tutti gli sportivi brindisini che amano dei colori biancazzurri e la maglia con la V!
COMUNICATO STAMPA - FEDELISSIMI BRINDISI

description.hltext_display: شمعون: السعودية وسوريا خائفتان من برج أبي حيدر ثانية تمتد الى كلّ البلدان المجاورة
description.content: الطقس قليل الغيوم من دون تعديل في درجات الحرارة"الراي" الكويتية: طهران تزجّ المحكمة في الملفات الكبرى وبينها ملفها النووي عرس عوني: رفاق بلا حزب مصادر عسكرية إسرائيلية: صاروخ الكورنيت الحديث المضاد للدروع وصل إلى قطاع غزة من إيران قوى الامن اوقفت 13 شخصا بجرائم مختلفة مجلس الشيوخ يصادق على إنهاء النقاش حول ستارت والتصويت النهائي اليوم الهند تجري تجربة ناجحة لإطلاق صاروخي 'بريثفي 2' الباليستيين هوندا تختبر بنجاح أول طائرة خفيفة لرجال الأعمال ارتفاع سعر البنزين والمازوت وانخفاض سعر الغاز حزب الله.. الشقيقة سبقت الصديقة! جنبلاط: تذاكي جعجع يجعله أشبه بشاهد زور إضافي "حزب الله" قرر المواجهة فترة انتظار... إملأوها بالحوار خامنئي يحدد (التسوية): إبطال المحكمة... وإلا ألسنة السوء البطريرك صفير يكشف معسكر "الحيرة الانقلابية" رسالة مفتوحة إلى "حزب الله" عن المحكمة والنزاهة إيران وسوريا و"خطأ شائع"! توافق سوريا وإيران ضرورة "للتغيير الداخلي" "الشرق": المحكمة الدولية سارية في عملها ولن يوقفها أي تصريح "المصري اليوم": طارق عبد الرازق حسين اعترف بتكليفه من ضباط "الموساد" الاتصال برئيس تحرير واحدة من كبرى الصحف اللبنانية المقربة من سوريا و"حزب الله" إليو ماري للسفراء العرب: فرنسا تدعم استقلال المحكمة الدولية في لبنان "القوات": معلومات "الأخبار" مُضخّمة و"مُبهّرة" وتفتقر للموضوعية وردة: جعجع لم يقل أن التصويت على "شهود الزور" حصل في الحكومة بل لفت إلى أن ما حصل أظهر أن الاكثرية لا تريد إحالة الملف إلى المجلس العدلي لا جديد في موقف خامنئي عن المحكمة... صقر: الحفاظ على العدالة هو المدخل السليم لمنع الفتنة البحرية الكورية الجنوبية تجري مناورات قبالة الساحل الشرقي إسرائيل تتهم إيران و"حزب الله" بمواصلة تعزيز قدرات "حماس" العسكرية الأمم المتحدة تتبنى قراراً حول حقوق الإنسان ينتقد إيران صفير: التهديد لا يجوز إن في الأعياد أو في غير أوقات.. وليكُن أبناء الوطن يداً واحدة

description.hltext_display: CEOs of Cisco, Ericsson and Telefonica to keynote at GSMA Mobile World Congress 2011
description.content:
2010-12-21 COMUNIC@ŢII Mobile Zoom in
GSMA Announces Five New ADCs as Part of App Planet at Mobile World Congress
The GSMA today announced that the CEOs of Cisco, Ericsson and Telefónica are scheduled to deliver keynote presentations at the 2011 GSMA Mobile World Congress, which will be held 14-17 February, 2011 in Barcelona. The GSMA also announced five new application developer conferences (ADCs) as part of its App Planet event at Mobile World Congress.
"The 2011 Mobile World Congress will showcase the breadth of companies who are placing mobile at the heart of their business strategies," said Michael O’Hara, chief marketing officer, GSMA. "From our thought-leading conference programme to the exhibition showcasing the latest technologies, Mobile World Congress will offer attendees a view into the future of mobile and how mobile is transforming the way the world lives and works."
Recently confirmed Mobile World Congress keynote speakers are:
· John Chambers, Chairman and CEO, Cisco Systems
· Hans Vestberg, President and CEO, Ericsson
· César Alierta, Executive Chairman and CEO, Telefónica
Previously announced speakers include:
· Daniel Hajj, CEO, América Móvil and Telcel
· Randall Stephenson, Chairman, CEO and President, AT&T
· Eric Schmidt, Chairman and CEO, Google
· Peter Chou, CEO, HTC
· Paul Otellini, President and CEO, Intel
· Steve Ballmer, CEO, Microsoft
· Stephen Elop, President and CEO, Nokia
· Ryuji Yamada, President and CEO, NTT DoCoMo
· Paul Jacobs, Chairman and CEO, Qualcomm
· Jim Balsillie, Co-CEO, Research In Motion
· Masayoshi Son, Chairman and CEO, SoftBank
· Jack Dorsey, CEO, Square
· Dick Costolo, CEO, Twitter
· Vittorio Colao, Chief Executive, Vodafone
· Sir Martin Sorrell, Chief Executive, WPP
· Carol Bartz, CEO, Yahoo!
Keynote sessions at Mobile World Congress focus on the following topics: "The View from the Top", "The Power of Applications", "The Evolution of the Mobile Internet", and "Connecting the Dots: A 360° View on Consumer Electronics".
In addition to the keynote programme, the Mobile World Congress conference will feature the Mobile Ad Forum, which addresses the unique requirements of brand and services marketers, advertising agencies, mobile operators and others in the mobile advertising value chain, as well as the App Planet Forum, which explores opportunities and issues in the mobile applications space. The conference programme also includes dedicated conference tracks focusing on areas such as Embedded Mobile, mHealth, Mobile Money, Next-Generation Network Technologies and OSS/BSS, as well as additional sessions covering a range of topics such as augmented reality, business strategy, cloud computing, enterprise mobility, media and entertainment, the mobile Internet and network capacity, among others.
New ADCs at App Planet Forum
The GSMA today announced that Microsoft, Nokia, the Wholesale Applications Community (WAC) and Wireless Industry Partnership (WIP) will be holding ADCs as part of App Planet. App Planet will also include an LTE forum, with a variety of partner-led sessions.
The current schedule at App Planet is:
Monday, 14 February – WAC App Developer Conference
Monday, 14 February – Nokia App Developer Conference
Tuesday, 15 February – BlackBerry Developer Day by RIM
Tuesday, 15 February – Samsung App Developer Conference
Tuesday, 15 February – HP webOS App Developer Conference
Wednesday, 16 February – Mobile Sync
Wednesday, 16 February –Windows Phone App Developer Conference
Wednesday, 16 February – LTE forum
Thursday, 17 February – Macworld Mobile
Thursday, 17 February –WIPJam
Thursday, 17 February – Mobile Cloud Forum with Cisco, HP, Huawei and NEC
Thursday, 17 February – IMGA ADC and Awards Programme
The App Planet Sponsor for Mobile World Congress is ACC1Ó, the agency set up by the Catalan government to make Catalan enterprises more competitive throughout the world. For more information on App Planet at Mobile World Congress, please visit http://www.mobileworldcongress.com/app_planet.

description.hltext_display: 하종� 현대그룹 � �략기획본부 사장은 22일 그동안 논란을 불러일으킨 프랑스 나티시스은행 대출금 1조2천억원에 대해 "일종의 브릿지� (Bridge loan)"이라� 밝혔다. 현대건설 인수합병(M&A)을
description.content:
하종선 현대그룹 전략기획본부 사장은 22일 그동안 논란을 불러일으킨 프랑스 나티시스은행 대출금 1조2천억원에 대해 "일종의 브릿지론(Bridge loan)"이라고 밝혔다.
현대건설 인수합병(M&A)을 주도해온 하 사장은 현대건설 매각과 관련해 서울중앙지법에서 열린 '양해각서(MOU) 해지 금지 가처분 신청' 첫 심리에 참석했다가 기자들과 만나 이같이 밝혔다.
채권단이 요구한 나티시스은행 대출계약서 제출을 거부했다가 최근 현대건설 인수 우선협상대상자 지위를 박탈당한 현대그룹이 대출경위를 공개적으로 밝힌 것은 이번이 처음이다.
다음은 하 사장과의 문답.
--현대차 측에서 드러나지 않는 대출형태('스리쿠션'으로 표현) 의혹을 제기했는데.
▲스리쿠션 한 적 없다. 자산을 담보로 하거나 자산을 활용한 파생상품을 만들거나 한 적 없다는 점을 분명히 밝힌다.
--채권단으로부터 현대건설 주식매각 양해각서(MOU)를 해지 당한 소감은.
▲슈퍼스타 K2의 '허각'이 음대를 나오지 않았다고 자격을 박탈당했을 때 어떤 심정이겠느냐? 그와 같은 심정이다. 현정은 회장이 그간 숱한 고난과 역경을 겪어왔다. 이번 어려움도 법원의 공정한 판단으로 극복하고 정주영 회장, 정몽헌 회장께서 생전에 가졌던 유지, 북방사업, 대북사업을 위해 현대건설을 크게 쓰실 그런 날이 올 것이라고 믿는다.
--법원 심리에서 '짜인 각본'이라고 했는데 그게 무엇인지.
▲오늘 자 모 신문에 보도된 유재한 정책금융공사 사장 인터뷰 내용에 계획과 의도가 나타나 있다고 생각한다. 우리 나름대로 법과 입찰규정에 따라 나티시스은행 자금 의혹을 해명하기 위해 노력했다. 세 차례에 걸친 확인서를 통해 적법한 자금임을 해명했고 의혹을 확실히 해소했다고 생각한다. 법원의 공정한 판단이 있을 것으로 믿는다.
--법정 분위기는 어땠나.
▲변호인이 그간 비공개의무조항 때문에 하지 못했던 말을 속 시원히 얘기했다고 생각한다.
--대출 경위를 밝힐 의향이 있나.
▲이미 일찍이 채권단에 공문으로 설명했다. 애초 넥스젠이 투자에 참여하려다가 입찰규정상 다른 컨소시엄 멤버가 인수대금을 못 낼 경우에 대한 연대책임을 부담해야 하는 문제로 넥스젠 투자위원회가 투자를 잠정 보류하게 됐다. 이때 넥스젠이 자신의 100% 모회사인 나티시스은행에 상황을 잘 설명해 대출이 이뤄지게 된 것이다. 언론에 보도됐고 증권가에서도 말하는 브릿지론과 유사한 대출이 이뤄졌던 것이다. 대형 글로벌 M&A 경우에 일단 브릿지론을 얻은 후 재무적투자자(FI)나 전략적투자자(SI)의 협의가 완결되면 대출 대신 투자의 형태로 대체하는 것이 널리 행해지는 방법의 하나다. '승자의 저주'는 누구보다도 우리가 제일 우려한다. 차입금을 인수대금으로 쓰는 걸 줄이려고 지난 11월18일 창우동 선영에서 현 회장이 투자자 접촉을 계속하고 있다고 말했다. 한두 달이면 대금을 완납하는 스케줄인데 그걸 못 기다리고 채권단이 MOU를 해지했다. 채권단이 제시한 주식매매계약(SPA)에서 현대건설의 주식 등을 담보로 안 쓴다는 조항의 위배에 대비해 거액의 현금보증금을 내도록 하게 돼 있다. 이렇듯 안전장치들이 많은데도 채권단이 한두 달을 못 기다리고 MOU를 해지한 것은 참으로 부당하다.
--제3의 자금이 있는지.
▲넥스젠 등 7개 정도의 투자자가 있다.
--대출과 유상증자는 별개인가.
▲대출을 받아 놓았지만 FI, SI를 유치해 대체함으로써 대출금을 인수대금에 사용하는 규모를 줄이려는 것이다. 이번 M&A의 특이점은 컨소시엄 멤버 변경에 대해 채권단의 사전 동의가 필요하다는 것이었다.다른 M&A에서는 우선협상대상자 선정 이후 FI나 SI를 유치해도 그 추가가 자유로운데 이번 입찰에는 채권단이 현대그룹이 FI나 SI를 추가하려고 해도 동의를 안 해주겠다고 사이드로 말하는 상황이었다. 그래서 현대상선 프랑스법인을 컨소시엄 멤버로 넣은 것도 향후 유치되는 FI, SI가 현대상선 프랑스법인의 유상증자를 통해 인수전에 채권단 동의 없이도 참여하는 방안이었다. 현대상선 프랑스법인을 사실상 특수목적법인(SPC)으로 활용하는 방안을 처음부터 추진 중이었다. 예전 창우동 선영에서도 말했듯이 하고 싶은 말이 많았지만 비공개의무 입찰규정 때문에 이런 내용은 SPA 체결 이후 밝히려 했다.
--추가 소송 계획은.
▲24일 가처분 신청 심리를 보고 나서 결정하겠다.
--채권단 중재안에 대한 생각은.
▲현대건설 이사회, 소액주주, 주요주주를 무시하는 법 위에 있는 것과 같은 제안이라고 생각한다. 현대그룹은 그런 위법한 방안에 공범이 될 수 없다.
--이런 소송 진행은 현 회장의 뜻인가.

description.hltext_display: คริสต์มาสสุขใจ ในห้องอาหารชั้นนำ
description.content: ใกล้เข้ามาทุกทีกับเทศกาลแห่งความสุขวันคริสต์มาส ปีนี้ใครที่ยังคิดไม่ออกว่าจะไปฉลองเทศกาลแสนสุขนี้ที่ไหนดี วันนี้ เดลินิวส์ออนไลน์ มีโปรโมชั่นดีๆจากหลากโรงแรมชั้นนำ ต้อนรับเทศกาลคริสต์มาสมาแนะนำกันอีกรอบ เริ่มด้วย โรงแรมอิมพีเรียลควีนส์ปาร์ค สุขุมวิท 22 เชิญชวนท่านและสมาชิกในครอบครัวมาร่วมฉลองเทศกาลคริสต์มาสกับทางโรงแรมฯ พร้อมอิ่มอร่อยกับบุฟเฟ่ต์อาหารนานาชาติสุดพิเศษประจำเทศกาล ที่รังสรรค์โดย มร. วิตโตริโอ เบอร์ตินี เชฟใหญ่ชาวอิตาเลียน อาทิ ไก่งวงยัดไส้เกาลัด แคนเบอรี่ซอส สวีทโปเตโตส์ คริสต์มาส พุดดิ่ง ฯลฯ รวมทั้งอาหารจานเด็ดจากทั่วทุกมุมโลก ส่วนคุณหนู ๆ จะได้พบและสัมผัสกับลุงซานตาครอสใจดี ที่จะคอยมอบขนมและของขวัญที่ถูกใจ พร้อมทั้งร่วมถ่าย� าพเป็นที่ระลึกกับคุณหนู ๆ และครอบครัว นอกจากนี้ ทุก ๆ ท่านจะได้เพลิดเพลินและร่วมขับขานกับบทเพลงคริสต์มาสจากแครอลซิงเกอร์วงดัง ตั้งแต่วันที่ 24 -25 ธันวาคม 2553 สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมโทร 0 2261 9000 ต่อ 5004 โรงแรมดุสิตธานี กรุงเทพฯ ขอมอบความสุขให้กับทุกท่านด้วยอาหารเลิศรสอีกทั้งเพลิดเพลินกับกิจกรรมต่างๆ พร้อมนักร้องประสานเสียงที่จะขับกล่อมบทเพลงรับเทศกาลสุขสันต์ที่จะมาถึงนี้ ในห้องอาหารที่จัดเตรียมความพิเศษไว้มากมายทั้ง แฮมิลตันส์ สเต็กเฮ้าส์ ห้องอาหารอิตาเลี่ยน อิล ชิเญโล ห้องอาหาร เดอะ พาวิลเลี่ยน ห้องอาหารเวียดนาม เธียนดอง ห้องอาหารไทย เบญจรงค์ และห้องอาหารจีน เมย์ฟลาวเวอร์ ในคืนวันคิรสต์มาสอีฟ ต่อเนื่องด้วยความพิเศษในวันคริสต์มาสที่ห้องอาหารฝรั่งเศส เดซองส์ แฮมิลตันส์ สเต็กเฮ้าส์ ห้องอาหารอิตาเลี่ยน อิล ชิเญโล ห้องอาหาร เดอะ พาวิลเลี่ยน และ ล็อบบี้เล้าจน์ ตั้งแต่วันที่ 24 -25 ธันวาคม 2553 สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมโทร 0 2200 9000 ต่อ 2166 ถ้ายังไม่จุใจต่อกันด้วย โรงแรมสวิสโฮเต็ลปาร์คนายเลิศ ชวนทุกคนมาฉลองคืนคริสต์มาสอีฟที่ห้องอาหารไอโซ่ ให้ท่านได้เพลิดเพลินกับอาหารค่ำในเทศกาลแห่งการเฉลิมฉลองได้อย่างหาที่ใดเหมือน และที่ห้องอาหาร มาเมซอง เอาใจคู่รักด้วยดินเนอร์ใต้แสงเทียนในวันคริสมาร์ตอีฟ ด้วยอาหารรสชาติเลิศมากมายรวมทั้งไวน์ชั้นเยี่ยมพร้อมด้วยบริการที่มีคุณ� าพ� ายใต้บรรยากาศที่น่าประทับใจ� ายในบริเวณสวนที่เขียวชอุ่มของโรงแรม สำหรับในวันคริสต์มาส อร่อยไปกับบุฟเฟต์นานาชนิดละลานตาที่จัดเตรียม โดยทีมงานปรุงอาหารของสวิสโฮเต็ล ปาร์คนายเลิศ เพลิดเพลินกับเมนูพิเศษฉลองเทศกาลคริสต์มาสที่มี ให้เลือกสรรมากมายด้วยรสชาติอันโอชะที่ทำอย่างสุด ฝีมือพร้อมกับจิบเบียร์ ไวน์ กาแฟ ชาและซอฟท์ดริงก์ ตั้งแต่วันที่ 24 25 ธันวาคม 2553 สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมโทร 0 2253 0123 ต่อ 8055 ถ้าอยากสัมผัสคืนพิเศษบนชายหาดแห่งความทรงจำ โรงแรม แมริออท รีสอร์ท แอนด์ สปา หัวหิน เชิญทุกคนร่วมเฉลิมฉลองเทศกาลคริสต์มาสตามสไตล์ที่คุณโปรดปราน ในค่ำคืนวันคริสต์มาสอีฟ ดื่มด่ำกับบรรยากาศที่เตรียมไว้ให้คุณได้เลือกฉลองกับคนที่คุณรักในแบบที่คุณชอบ ทั้งสนุกสนานกับครอบครัวรับลมหนาวริมชายทะเลสไตล์บีชแซน พร้อมเติมเต็มความสุขของทุกคนด้วยบุฟเฟ่ต์บาร์บีคิวร้อนๆจากเตา แต่หากต้องการความโรแมนติกเพื่อฉลองกับคนพิเศษ ห้องอาหารเชาพร้อมบริการอาหารอิตาเลี่ยน 7 คอร์สที่ปรุงด้วยวัตถุดิบคุณ� าพในทุกๆจานอันแสนวิเศษของคุณ และยังมีโปรโมชั่นไวน์สุดคุ้มที่เตรียมไว้สำหรับค่ำคืนอันแสนพิเศษนี้ให้คุณได้เลือกอีกมากมาย ในคืนวันที่ 24 ธันวาคม 2553 สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมโทร 0 3251 1811 ต่อ 1804 ปิดท้ายด้วย โรงแรม เชอราตัน พัทยา รีสอร์ท ขอเชิญทุกท่านร่วมเฉลิมฉลอง เทศกาลแห่งความสุขกับครอบครัวและเพื่อนฝูง พบกับอาหารเลิศรส ซึ่งมาพร้อมกับความบันเทิงหลากหลายที่ตระเตรียมไว้ให้ท่านได้ร่วมฉลองความสุขอย่างเต็มอิ่ม ให้ทางโรงแรมเป็นส่วนหนึ่งในการสร้างความประทับใจของทุกคนที่นี่ กับหลากห้องอาหารในคืนวันคริสต์มาสอีฟ และวันคริสต์มาส ทั้ง ห้องอาหารอีลิเมนท์ ห้องอาหารอินฟินิติ พร้อมพบโปรโมชั่นพิเศษมากมาย ตั้งแต่วันที่ 24 25 ธันวาคม 2553 สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมโทร 0 3825 9888 ปลายฟ้า Deflying2@gmail.com

description.hltext_display: Cuota diaria de llegadas de turistas chinos a Taiwan aumentarÃ¡ a 4 mil
description.content:
Cuota diaria de llegadas de turistas chinos a Taiwan aumentará a 4 mil
Taipei, dic. 21 (CNA) La cuota diaria para las llegadas de los turistas chinos a Taiwan será aumentada de los presentes 3 mil personas a las 4 mil personas para dar un mayor impulso a los intercambios turísticos entre los dos lados del Estrecho de Taiwan, a partir del primero de enero del próximo año, reveló el principal negociador de Taiwan con China el martes 21.
Chiang Pin-kung, presidente de la Fundación para los Intercambios del Estrecho (SEF, siglas en inglés), dió a conocer esta noticia en el curso de una rueda de prensa convocada tras su sexta reunión con Chen Yunlin, presidente de la Asociación para las Relaciones a Través del Estrecho de Taiwan (ARATS, siglas en inglés), con sede en Beijing, la cual se clausuró al mediodía de ese mismo día en Taipei.
"Las dos organizaciones intermediarias de los dos lados del Estrecho alcanzaron en la presente reunión el consenso respecto al aumento de la cuota diaria para las llegadas de los turistas chinos a Taiwan para aumentar los beneficios turísticos", puntualizó Chiang, añadiendo que tal decisión quedaría oficializada después del respectivo intercambio de notas entre la SEF y la ARATS.
Refiriéndose a la medida de abrir, sobre una base de prueba, las puertas de Taiwan a los visitantes chinos que quieran venir por su cuenta, Chiang dijo que la misma podría probablemente ser llevada a la práctica en junio del próximo año.
"La nueva medida fue originalmente programada para coincidir con el Festival de los Faroles del próximo año; sin embargo, la fecha para su implementación se ha visto aplazada porque todavía quedan algunos detalles técnicos que finiquitar", explicó el jefe de la SEF.
El Gobierno de Taiwan ha decidido en principio abrir las puertas de Taiwan a tres categorías de visitantes chinos -- los turistas, los visitantes comerciales y los visitantes a las remotas islas -- pero que los detalles técnicos de tal política de apertura se encuentran todavía en el proceso de elaboración.
En la actualidad, a los viajeros chinos sólo les permite venir a visitar Taiwan en grupos organizados.(Por Chen Ching-fang y Luis Huang)Enditem

description.hltext_display: Fun for Free: Young Hispanic Adults Seeking Lower-Cost Alternatives to Pricey Leisure Activities, Reports Mintel
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Mintel
CHICAGO, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- The shaky economy has resulted in a tightening of purse strings in households nationwide, and the Hispanic population is no exception. Recent research from industry leader Mintel found that in the past year, the leisure preferences of young Hispanic adults have changed from activities that cost money to lower-cost alternatives to save cash.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20100413/MINTELLOGO-a)
Leylha Ahuile, senior multicultural analyst at Mintel observes the following:
"Among Hispanic respondents under 35, the largest net increases in participation in the past year are seen in surfing the Internet, watching movies at home, spending time with family and listening to music. Increases are also seen in cooking for fun and exercising. Each of these activities might be considered a lower-cost alternative to other leisure options.
"More expensive options, like going to the movie theater and attending live concerts, have seen net decreases in participation. In fact, nearly all activities that require admission fees or other discretionary spending, such as traveling, leisure shopping, cultural events and museums have seen lower levels of participation this year compared to last," Leylha Ahuile continues.
One free or low-cost leisure activity enjoyed by young Hispanic adults is spending time at home. Sixty-seven percent of respondents say they like spending most of their free time at home with members of their family. Meanwhile, 60% take pleasure in entertaining people at home and 33% enjoy cooking dinner at home with friends.
According to Mintel research, many young Hispanic adults also turn to the Internet for entertainment. Twenty-eight percent of those surveyed say the Internet is a way to socialize and meet others, while 34% say that the Internet is their prime source of entertainment.
About Mintel
Mintel is a leading global supplier of consumer, product and media intelligence. For more than 38 years, Mintel has provided insight into key worldwide trends, offering exclusive data and analysis that directly impacts client success. With offices in Chicago, New York, London, Sydney, Shanghai and Tokyo, Mintel has forged a unique reputation as a world-renowned business brand. For more information on Mintel, please visit www.mintel.com. Follow Mintel on Twitter: http://twitter.com/mintelnews
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Календари с историческа тематика за врачани
description.content:
1 000 календара за 2011 година ще подари днес Младежката организация на ВМРО на гражданите на Враца. Пунктът ще бъде разположен на бул. „Никола Войводов" срещу киното.
Календарите са с историческа тематика и отразяват границите на обединена България през 1941 г. Чрез илюстрации са показани и великите личности от националния ни пантеон, както и тържественото посрещане на българските войски в Македония.
С подаръка младите войводи искат да напомнят, че славните страници от родната история не бива да се забравят, за да имаме отново единна, силна и просперираща България.

description.hltext_display: Altri - Cimento di natale: bambini in regata sul lung »
description.content:
Cimento di natale: bambini in regata sul lungomare di Brindisi
Si è chiusa con il Cimento di Natale organizzato dal Circolo della Vela Brindisi lattività 2010 della Scuola Vela dei Circoli velici brindisini. Bella cornice quella delle banchine antistanti la Capitaneria di Porto sulle quali parenti, amici e curiosi si sono affollati ad osservare le regate dei giovanissimi allievi (classi 1999 2003) con i loro Optimist e di quelli meno giovani sui loro Laser. Un tocco aggiuntivo lo ha voluto dare il sole che finalmente ha fatto la sua apparizione illuminando laffollato specchio di mare davanti al lungomare Regina Margherita.
La scuola del Circolo della vela Brindisi fa parte del Progetto VelAscuola* ideato dalla Federazione Italiana Vela e sponsorizzato dalla Banca Popolare Pugliese che da lunghi anni sostiene le attività di avanguardia portate avanti dal Circolo brindisino come, ad esempio, la Regata Internazionale Brindisi - Corfù della quale listituto di credito è lo storico sponsor. Il progetto, in collaborazione con le Istituzioni scolastiche del territorio, è specialmente mirato per gli studenti e docenti di scuole elementari e medie inferiori.
Successivamente potranno essere estesi ad altre istituti ed organizzazioni.
Al termine delle regate si è proceduto ad una allegra premiazione dove oltre ai vincitori sono stati sorteggiati dei premi speciali fra tutti i partecipanti. La scuola vela del CV Brindisi, dopo la pausa per le festività natalizie, riprenderà lattività il 10 gennaio.
Per informazioni: www.circolovelabrindisi.it Tel. 329 6256611- 0831 411479
Il progetto, studiato per stimolare i giovani a fare la conoscenza del pianeta mare attraverso la costituzione di un Centro di Avviamento Giovanile alla vela, si prefigge di aumentare il numero delle persone che seguono lo sport velico, sia come praticanti sia come futuri sostenitori capaci di capire, seguire ed apprezzare la vela.
Il progetto prevede uno sviluppo progressivo nellarco di tre anni durante i quali da un lato farà conoscere ad un numero di persone sempre più numeroso lo sport della vela e dallaltro procederà allistruzione a vari livelli di coloro che avranno dimostrato un interesse per questo sport.
I corsi, in collaborazione con le Istituzioni scolastiche del territorio, saranno specialmente mirati per gli studenti e docenti di scuole elementari, medie inferiori e superiori, ed universitari. Successivamente potranno essere estesi ad altre istituzioni ed organizzazioni.
C.S. CIRCOLO DELLA VELA BRINDISI

2010-12-21 COMUNIC@ŢII Mobile Telecoms watch
COSMOTE Romania presents a new promotional portfolio that includes voice and data services in the tariff plans dedicated for SmartPhone handsets. The new tariff plans complete „Perfect for You" portfolio, covering thus all communication needs of the customers.
Thus, the new tariff plans include, along with hundreds of on-net minutes and SMS-es and up to 280 national minutes, 500 MB data traffic which the customers can use for checking their e-mails, talk to their friends through instant messaging or social media and many other applications.
Moreover, the data traffic included in any of the subscriptions can be used for navigating the internet, from the mobile phone as well as the PC (desktop or laptop, using the phone as a modem).

description.hltext_display: 'Hayat Okulunda Başarılı ve Mutlu Öğrenciler Yetiştirme ...
description.content: Bayburt Polis Meslek Yüksek Okulu Müdürü Abdullah Şahin, hayat okulunda başarılı ve mutlu öğrenciler yetiştirme vizyonu ile yola çıktıklarını söyledi. Şahin, Bayburt Polis Meslek Yüksek Okulu'nun yeni binasının basına tanıtılması amacıyla düzenlenen toplantıda yaptığı konuşmada, yeni binaya geçilmesiyle polis adaylarının eğitiminde teorikten pratiğe de geçildiğini söyledi. Polis adaylarının eğitiminde, sınırlı imkanlarla polis eğitiminde Bayburt vizyonunu da oluşturduklarını ifade eden Şahin, şöyle devam etti: 'Ankara'da 29 Aralık'ta yapılacak Polis Okulları Müdürleri Toplantısında bu kapsamda bir sunum yapacağım. Hayat okulunda başarılı ve mutlu öğrenciler yetiştirmek vizyonu ile yola çıktık. Bu kapsamda her gün biraz daha iyiye sloganı ile başlattığımız okumak başarmaktır. Beraber Okuyalım Kitap Okuma Kampanyası ile her gün öğrencilerle birlikte kitap okuyoruz. Sağlıklı Bir Hayat için Sigarayı Çöpe A Kampanyasında 25 öğrencimiz sigara içme alışkanlığını terk etti. Boş Durmak Yok Her Gün Biraz Daha İyiye Kampanyasıyla ebru ve tiyatro çalışması gibi 26 değişik branşta kulüp çalışmaları yapıyoruz.' Şahin, Karşılık Beklemeden Başkasının Gönlüne Dokun Projesi ile yaşlı ve hastaları ziyaret edip, çeşitli ihtiyaçlarını karşıladıklarını vurgulayarak, şunları söyledi: 'Yine polis adaylarımızın meslek hayatlarına ve kişisel hayatlarına yönelik değişik alanlarda panel ve seminerler düzenleyerek onların hayatları boyunca daha donanımlı bireyler olmasını sağlıyoruz. Sonuç olarak eğer bizler vizyonumuza, misyonumuza, hedeflerimize ve değerlerimize bir şevkle sarılır gibi sevgiyle sımsıkı sarılırsak, yeteri kadar sabırla adanarak çalışırsak inanıyorum ki Zigana ve Kop dağlarındaki kış ve borana rağmen geçitler bize yol verecek, sahil ve denize ulaştıracaktır.' (AN-TY-MHD) - BAYBURT (Anadolu Ajansı) 21.12.2010 17:31[2429271]

description.hltext_display: Falcons' linebackers key to success on defense
description.content:
FLOWERY BRANCH - The Atlanta Falcons seem to have found a perfect formula at linebacker.
Curtis Lofton takes every snap. Mike Peterson takes less snaps. Rookie Sean Weatherspoon and No. 4 linebacker Stephen Nicholas fit in as necessary.
"Everybody's got a role, and we're winning," Peterson said. "You can't argue with the results."
As Atlanta (12-2) prepares to face New Orleans (10-4) with a chance to win the NFC South and a No. 1 playoff seed, Peterson believes much of Falcons' defensive success is a credit to coach Mike Smith.
Peterson has played seven of his 12 NFL seasons under Smith, who uses a rotation in every game of eight linemen, four linebackers and between five and six defensive backs to keep personnel fresh.
"No question I feel pretty good considering it's late in December," Peterson said. "I can't say I was excited about getting less playing time when we talked about it before the season, but you can see the benefits across the board. We're a better team."
The personnel makeup of Atlanta's linebackers is still a work in progress, mostly because Smith and general manager Thomas Dimitroff faced a big rebuilding project when they were hired in 2008.
Wholesale changes began after Smith's and Dimitroff's first season together. Longtime star Keith Brooking wasn't offered a new contract, and Peterson later arrived to fill the veteran void and to help Lofton, a second-round draft pick two years ago, mature as the starting middle linebacker.
This season, Dimitroff sought to complement Lofton by drafting Weatherspoon with the 19th overall pick, but Weatherspoon's arrival also meant less snaps for Peterson.
Lofton, as the man in charge, sees benefits for everyone.
"We've got a lot of talented guys, so everyone deserves to be on the field and everyone does a good job," Lofton said. "We'll just keep it going because it's been working for us."
The Falcons have expanded Lofton's responsibilities in coverage this season. Beginning with a Week 12 victory over Green Bay, Lofton lined up opposite receivers sometimes, but some of the change resulted in a few problems defending the run.
Atlanta won at Tampa Bay and Carolina despite giving up five total runs of 15 yards or more, the same number the Falcons allowed through their first 12 games.
Before beating the Buccaneers, Atlanta ranked a pedestrian 19th in yards allowed per carry, but that number dropped to 27th after Jonathan Stewart broke off one run for 48 yards and another for 42.
In a lopsided victory last week at Seattle, however, the Falcons recovered from a sloppy opening drive to hold the Seahawks to a 3.2 average over their last 14 carries.
But Smith is hardly satisfied all the problems are fixed. There's no chance he will forget the 50-yard touchdown run that Rashard Mendenhall scored in a season-opening loss at Pittsburgh.
"I think our guys each and every week have a better understanding of about our run fits," Smith said Tuesday. "It's been an issue - explosive runs - all season, and when you have a misfit in a gap, there's a chance the ball is going to go for some yardage."
Smith does think the Falcons are improving their tackling, however, in the second and third levels of the defense.
Weatherspoon's development was put on hold earlier this season as he missed five of six games with knee and ankle injuries, but Nicholas, in his fourth season, played well enough to keep part of his role after his teammate returned.
It was no surprise to Weatherspoon that his own snap count dropped from an average of 60 to 40 because of Nicholas' performance.
"Stephen is doing a great job out there," Weatherspoon said. "He earned it, and that's something we all have to do. We've all got to push each other and keep competing that way."
Peterson, though, is the man with experience, and he still holds sway as the locker room disc jockey.
But as much as Peterson likes to show the young players how to appreciate tunes, Weatherspoon knows the veteran loves nothing more than making a big play. Peterson couldn't stop smiling after his fourth-quarter interception and 17-yard return at Carolina essentially ended the suspense of another Atlanta victory.
"You can see that he's got a little bounce in his step now," Weatherspoon said. "He feels fresh out there. We keep each other fresh, and that's something we have to do."

description.hltext_display: “ลุงจิ้น”ยันซื้อผ้าห่มแจกต้องตามสเปคปภ.
Aktien Zürich etwas leichter erwartet - Transocean schwach - AWP
description.content:
DJ ZÜRICH (Dow Jones)--Die vorbörslichen Notierungen der meisten Titel an der Börse in Zürich deuten laut der Nachrichtenagentur AWP auf eine knapp gehaltene Eröffnung hin. Der von Clariden Leu berechnete SMI gibt um 0,4% auf 6.533 Punkte nach. Mit Ausnahme von Transocean (-1,2% auf 66,75 CHF) notieren alle SMI-Titel wenig verändert. In der vorletzten Börsenwoche des Jahres hätten sich zahlreiche Anleger bereits für 2010 verabschiedet, heißt es im Handel.
Die Vorgaben aus den USA seien positiv, aus dem ostasiatischen Raum eher etwas gemischt. Es bleibe abzuwarten, inwieweit in Europa vom Jahreshöchstniveau aus weitere Avancen realisiert werden könnten, so Marktbeobachter.
In Europa schlossen am Dienstag der FTSE und der DAX auf bzw. um neue Jahreshochs. Hingegen dürften die anhaltenden Spannungen zwischen Nord- und Südkorea wiederum für Aufmerksamkeit sorgen. So habe Südkorea für Donnerstag neuerliche Schießübungen nahe der Grenze zum nördlichen Nachbarn angekündigt.
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
December 22, 2010 02:46 ET (07:46 GMT)
Copyright (c) 2010 Dow Jones&Company, Inc.

description.hltext_display: Rugby - Serie C: Nafta Brindisi-Santerano=90-0
description.content:
Serie C: Nafta Brindisi-Santerano=90-0
Pronto riscatto della Nafta Rugby Brindisi, che sconfigge Santeramo con un risultato rotondo.
Neanche il tempo di sedersi sugli spalti del campo di SantElia che il mediano di mischia Brasino si invola sullout di sinistra insinuandosi nella difesa degli uomini in verde, andando a depositare in mezzo ai pali. Facile la trasformazione dellapertura Cristofaro.
Il gioco di Brindisi continua ad essere tambureggiante: dopo unazione dai 10 metri di Santeramo si apre al lato chiuso per lestremo Pinca che riesce ad evitare i giocatori avversari depositando anche lui tra i pali. È ancora una volta dentro la trasformazione di Cristofaro.
I biancazzurri non si concedono tregua: è ancora Brasino che, dopo diverse fasi di gioco insistite della Nafta, prende palla dopo un raggruppamento e trova spazio nel lato chiuso depositando la palla ancora oltre la linea di marcatura. Stavolta non cè trasformazione.
Il ritmo della partita è tambureggiante ed un calcio brindisino mette in difficoltà lestremo in verde: ne approfitta lala Bello che gli ruba il pallone e deposita tra i pali la meta del bonus offensivo, senza trovare opposizione. Questa volta è Pinca a trasformare.
Brindisi inizia a provare anche le soluzioni alla mano: da una di queste azioni si innesca ancora una volta Bello che si incunea nella difesa di Santeramo e realizza ancora una volta. La trasformazione è nuovamente di Cristofaro.
Non cè tregua per gli ospiti: Brindisi, una volta usciti da un raggruppamento, gioca ancora alla mano in campo aperto presso la linea di meta con Semeraro che elude la guardia avversaria e realizza. Purtroppo mancano i due punti della trasformazione.
In chiusura di primo tempo, dopo una touche si sviluppa unazione alla mano che porta a diverse fasi di gioco nei dintorni della linea di meta di Santeramo: alla fine ne approfitta il tallonatore Rubino che realizza. Anche stavolta non cè trasformazione.
Primo tempo che si chiude con leloquente punteggio di 43-0.
Il secondo tempo si conferma come il primo: anche qui dopo pochissimi secondi Cristofaro prende un calcio avversario, si invola sullout evitando i placcaggi avversari e depositando in mezzo ai pali. Lo stesso Cristofaro aggiunge due punti allo score brindisino.
A stretto giro di posta, dopo alcune fasi di gioco la terza linea Cacciatore riesce a depositare oltre la linea di meta sullout di sinistra. Cristofaro piazza tra i pali. Brindisi inizia a tentare anche qualche giocata spettacolare, ma è un disimpegno errato di Santeramo che favorisce Brindisi con il seconda linea Maglio, che deposita oltre la linea di meta allaltezza dellout di sinistra. Non cè la trasformazione.
Un calcio degli uomini in verde è intercettato da Rubino, che si invola al centro dei pali di Santeramo. Cristofaro mette altri due punti nello score di Brindisi.
La Nafta continua lassedio: dopo alcune fasi di gioco confuse sviluppatesi nelle vicinanze dellarea di meta avversaria arriva la meta della seconda linea La Guercia, trasformata ancora da Cristofaro.
Brindisi continua larrembaggio e dopo unazione insistita Rubino innesca Bello che va a depositare tra i pali. Ci sono ancora i due punti di Cristofaro.
Ancora una volta dopo un calcio di Santeramo è Bello che prende palla e fugge lungo lout di destra e dopo aver evitato i placcaggi avversari segna la meta numero quattro della sua partita.
Match che si chiude poco dopo con il risultato di 90-0.
Brindisi si è dimostrata solida in tutti i reparti, con spiccate individualità capaci di interagire come squadra.
Molto bene la mischia e la touche, solito apporto importante dei trequarti, mantenendo la seconda posizione in classifica.
La Serie C affronterà ora una lunga pausa di circa un mese, dopo la quale Brindisi farà visita in casa del Vituli Rugby Club a Lamezia Terme.
COMUNICATO STAMPA NAFTA BRINDISI

description.hltext_display: El frío bloquea Europa
description.content:
El temporal que azota gran parte del continente obliga a cancelar cientos de vuelos y complica el transporte por carretera y ferrocarril
efe / madrid
El temporal de frío que afecta a gran parte de Europa mantenía ayer bloqueados en los aeropuertos a miles de viajeros, mientras la nieve y el hielo seguían complicando también el transporte por carretera y ferrocarril.
Las dificultades en el aeródromo londinense de Heathrow y en el alemán de Fráncfort alteraron el tráfico de aviones en todo el continente. En Heathrow, el de más tráfico de Europa, miles de viajeros pasaron la noche como pudieron en sus distintas terminales y estaba previsto que solo salieran cuatro vuelos de corta distancia y tres de larga distancia.
Algunas personas criticaron que el Reino Unido se paralice en cuanto cae una nevada y el director de la compañía de vuelos baratos Monarch Airlines, Tim Jeans, declaró que hay que reconsiderar el conjunto de la infraestructura de transportes de este país, que una vez más no ha estado a la altura de las circunstancias.
Varias compañías ferroviarias británicas informaron de retrasos y cancelaciones, mientras que los responsables de la red de carreteras volvieron a advertir a los automovilistas de que viajen solo si es absolutamente necesario después de que muchos de ellos desoyesen anteriores advertencias y se viesen atrapados en las carreteras.
En Alemania volvió a recrudecerse el caos en los transportes al registrarse grandes retrasos y centenares de cancelaciones en los principales aeropuertos del país.
El aeródromo de Fráncfort seguía al cierre de esta edición con graves problemas y a primera hora de la mañana Fraport, la empresa gestora, calculó que al menos 302 vuelos de los 1.317 programados serían cancelados, frente a los 272 y 560 anulados el sábado y el viernes, respectivamente.
Los retrasos fueron también habituales en los ferrocarriles alemanes, donde la compañía estatal Deutsche Bahn (DB) impuso un límite máximo de velocidad de 200 kilómetros por hora para evitar siniestros y daños en la maquinaria.
En Francia se mantiene la alerta en 37 departamentos del norte y oeste del país a causa de la previsión de nevadas. En el parisiense aeropuerto de Roissy-Charles de Gaulle, los vuelos acumulaban retrasos de hasta una hora y también varios miles de pasajeros se vieron obligados a pasar la noche en sus instalaciones.
Las autoridades informaron de las dificultades de circulación por las carreteras del norte y oeste del país y se registraron problemas en los trenes, donde los de alta velocidad no pudieron alcanzar su máximo rendimiento por la nieve.
También en Bélgica. En Bruselas, más de 1.500 personas se vieron obligadas a pasar la noche en el aeropuerto internacional de Zaventem, la mayoría por los cierres en otros aeródromos europeos, sobre todo en el Reino Unido y Alemania.
El Gobierno recomendó evitar los transportes por carretera, mientras que los trenes operaron con ciertos problemas.
En Holanda, el aeropuerto internacional de Schiphol advirtió de que continuarán las cancelaciones de decenas de vuelos, y el tráfico por carretera y tren estuvo perturbado por la nieve acumulada en algunas zonas del país.
Por su parte, Italia intentaba volver a la normalidad en sus transportes tras el temporal, con la reapertura del aeropuerto de la localidad de Pisa (centro), el último que quedaba cerrado a causa de la nieve caída desde el viernes. No obstante, se dieron algunos retrasos en los vuelos.

description.hltext_display: Surgery an option for incontinence sufferers
description.author: Body and Mind staff
description.content:
Wherever she went, Barbara Fernsler, 64, of Palmyra, would have to find a bathroom.
Fernsler struggled for almost 10 years with stress incontinence, a condition in which she would leak urine every time she laughed, coughed, exercised or sneezed. If she faced an all-day excursion, she would have no choice but to wear a bulky pad.
According to American Medical Systems, the pioneer of an internal “pelvic sling” used to treat this condition, stress incontinence affects about 17 million American women, or an estimated 23 percent to 30 percent. Many more suffer from “urge incontinence,” which is the need to go to the bathroom all the time.
In stress incontinence, the leakage is caused when the urethra — the tube which carries urine from the bladder to the outside of the body — does not close tightly enough to hold the urine in the bladder. The severity of this leakage tends to increase as women age, particularly after menopause.
Fernsler attributes her condition to her two pregnancies. She mentioned her symptoms to the doctor every time she went for her annual Pap smear, but he dismissed them as too mild to warrant surgery. Finally fed up and at the point where she had to wear a pad almost every day, Fernsler received a referral to gynecologist Dr. David P. Clark of Women’s Health Center in Lebanon.
Clark operated on Fernsler on Aug. 2 at Good Samaritan Hospital in Lebanon, using a transvaginal tape procedure, or TVT. The tape creates a hammock under the urethra to support it against pressure.
As an outpatient, Fernsler was in the hospital for fewer than eight hours and had a quick recovery. After surgery, she could pick up her 1-year-old granddaughter almost immediately and return to normal activity. She had a prescription for Percocet, but never filled it because her pain was tolerable.
Although her condition is not cured, it is much improved, Fernsler said. “I got excellent results. I would do it all again,” she said.
Fernsler realizes many women with incontinence avoid long car rides, social situations and talks with their doctors, but she encourages them to talk with their doctor and consider the procedure.
Clark reassures women that they don’t have to suffer in silence. Technologies, surgical techniques and curative devices have evolved over time, to allow for minimally invasive procedures with little down time and a permanent solution.
Urinary leakage with any kind of increased pressure on the abdomen is caused by the “wearing down” or “laxity of tissues” in that area, often following multiple pregnancies and worsening with age, Clark said. With the urinary tract, reproductive tract and intestinal tract all converging in one small area, a change in one tract can affect the other two.
Surgery may be a last resort — after exercise, dietary changes, bathroom habit modifications and medication have failed.
“It’s all relative,” Clark said. Some severe cases may not bother one woman, while another woman with a very mild case may be extremely bothered.
The urethra, which is usually about four centimeters in length, “should be snug against the pubic bone,” Clark said. When the urethra begins to drop, urine can leak.
The pelvic sling does not necessarily move the urethra up, but it supports it. He estimates that he has inserted between 50 and 100 slings in recent years.
Harrisburg-based gynecologist Dr. Jose M. Manjon at PinnacleHealth was one of the pioneers in using the sling. Other local specialists in this surgery are Drs. Dina Schweitzer and David Williams at Women’s Health Specialists of Carlisle, R. Scott Owens of Urology of Central Pennsylvania, and Kenneth Oken of Women First Obstetrics and Gynecology in Harrisburg.
The procedure is fairly simple and can be done in 15 to 45 minutes, Clark said. The surgeon makes a small incision in the vagina, near where the urethra opens, and inserts a nylon, or fishnet-type of strap, into the incision snug against the undersurface of the urethra.
The mesh material will not dissolve over time, Clark said. It is permanent.
The recovery time depends on your occupation, Clark said. Over time, the connective tissue of the abdominal muscle will grow around the sling to anchor it. The patient should be protective for about a month, avoiding sexual intercourse, heavy lifting and moderate activity.
Complications are rare, but include the erosion or exposure of the material. Infection, bleeding or a perforated bladder can also occur, but all are rare and fixable.
Clark considers the biggest danger to be that the surgery will not solve the problem. He said his pelvic sling procedure has an 85 percent to 90 percent success rate.
Insurance policies vary, but most of these procedures are covered by insurance.
“It is quite satisfying when things go well and the patient is dry,” Clark said. One patient of Clark’s had leakage for 40 years, since the birth of her last child.
“When you have a patient like that who you can help, they will hug and kiss you when they return,” Clark said. “It is such a relief to be normal again.”

Urinary leakage with any kind of increased pressure on the abdomen is caused by the ?wearing down? or ?laxity of tissues? in that area, often following multiple pregnancies and worsening with age

The recovery time depends on your occupation

her symptoms to the doctor every time she went for her annual Pap smear, but he dismissed them as too mild to warrant surgery

description.hltext_display: Unterwegs zur Technik von morgen / Auf der LivingKitchen unterstreicht Siemens seine Rolle als Kompetenzführer der Einba ...
description.content:
09:15 Uhr
Dieser Artikel wurde bisher 1xangesehen Artikel drucken
Unterwegs zur Technik von morgen / Auf der LivingKitchen unterstreicht Siemens seine Rolle als Kompetenzführer der Einbaugeräte-Industrie
München (ots) - Siemens ist startklar für die LivingKitchen vom 18. bis 23. Januar 2011 in Köln. Auf der neugeschaffenen Messeplattform für Küchenmöbelindustrie und Hausgeräte-Technik wird sich die Marke mit einem 500 Quadratmeter großen Stand in Halle 5.2. präsentieren. Unter dem Motto "Unterwegs zur Technik von morgen" erwartet Fach- und Privatbesucher eine Tour zu den Trends der Zukunft. Dazu zählen Einbaulösungen für visionäre Küchenarchitekturen ebenso wie Design- und Technikkonzepte, die das Kochen auf hohem Niveau deutlich vereinfachen. Und auch bei Strom- und Wassersparkonzepten zeigt Siemens schon heute, was erst in fünf oder zehn Jahren Standard sein dürfte. Ausgangspunkt der Reise durch die Welt der Technik-Trends bildet das Zentrum der Küche: der Herd mit den flexiblen varioInduktions-Kochfeldern von Siemens. Damit steht ambitionierten Köchen jetzt eine deutlich größere und flexiblere Fläche für ihre Kreationen zur Verfügung. Wie praktisch das ist, demonstrieren hochkarätige Küchenchefs mehrmals täglich in Live-Kochshows. Rund um dieses "Kocherleben" gruppieren sich weitere Stationen zu den Kernthemen Ressourcen-Schonung, Einbau-Präzision und Planungsvielfalt sowie zu preisgekröntem Siemens Design. "Endlich haben wir wieder Gelegenheit, unsere Einbau-Kompetenz in Deutschland im Umfeld der Küchenmöbelindustrie zu zeigen", begrüßt Siemens Geschäftsführer Roland Hagenbucher die Messe-Premiere. "Wir setzen große Erwartungen in die LivingKitchen. Neben dem zu erwartenden hohen Zuspruch aus dem Inland erhoffen wir uns, dass die Messe auch international den erhofften Stellenwert erhält und zu einer neuen Leitmesse in Europa avanciert." Einen ersten Ausblick auf die LivingKitchen gewährt Siemens Medienvertretern bei der Pressekonferenz am 17. Januar 2011 von 13.00 Uhr bis 13.45 Uhr, Halle 5.2, Stand A 50, auf dem Messegelände Köln. Anmeldungen bitte über die Siemens Pressestelle, Telefon +49 89 4590-2697 oder per E-mail: presse.siemens@bshg.com. Weitere Informationen zu Siemens Hausgeräten finden Sie unter www.siemens-home.de Originaltext: Siemens-Electrogeräte GmbH Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/56140 Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_56140.rss2 Pressekontakt: Jana Haubold Siemens-Electrogeräte GmbH Carl-Wery-Straße 34 D-81739 München Telefon +49 89 4590-2697 Telefax +49 89 4590-2957 presse.siemens@bshg.com

description.hltext_display: 하종� 현대그룹 사장 문답
description.content:
하종선 현대그룹 전략기획본부 사장은 22일 그동안 논란을 불러일으킨 프랑스 나티시스은행 대출금 1조2천억원에 대해 "일종의 브릿지론(Bridge loan)"이라고 밝혔다.
현대건설 인수합병(M&A)을 주도해온 하 사장은 현대건설 매각과 관련해 서울중앙지법에서 열린 '양해각서(MOU) 해지 금지 가처분 신청' 첫 심리에 참석했다가 기자들과 만나 이같이 밝혔다.
채권단이 요구한 나티시스은행 대출계약서 제출을 거부했다가 최근 현대건설 인수 우선협상대상자 지위를 박탈당한 현대그룹이 대출경위를 공개적으로 밝힌 것은 이번이 처음이다.
다음은 하 사장과의 문답.
--현대차 측에서 드러나지 않는 대출형태('스리쿠션'으로 표현) 의혹을 제기했는데.
▲스리쿠션 한 적 없다. 자산을 담보로 하거나 자산을 활용한 파생상품을 만들거나 한 적 없다는 점을 분명히 밝힌다.
--채권단으로부터 현대건설 주식매각 양해각서(MOU)를 해지 당한 소감은.
▲슈퍼스타 K2의 '허각'이 음대를 나오지 않았다고 자격을 박탈당했을 때 어떤 심정이겠느냐? 그와 같은 심정이다. 현정은 회장이 그간 숱한 고난과 역경을 겪어왔다. 이번 어려움도 법원의 공정한 판단으로 극복하고 정주영 회장, 정몽헌 회장께서 생전에 가졌던 유지, 북방사업, 대북사업을 위해 현대건설을 크게 쓰실 그런 날이 올 것이라고 믿는다.
--법원 심리에서 '짜인 각본'이라고 했는데 그게 무엇인지.
▲오늘 자 모 신문에 보도된 유재한 정책금융공사 사장 인터뷰 내용에 계획과 의도가 나타나 있다고 생각한다. 우리 나름대로 법과 입찰규정에 따라 나티시스은행 자금 의혹을 해명하기 위해 노력했다. 세 차례에 걸친 확인서를 통해 적법한 자금임을 해명했고 의혹을 확실히 해소했다고 생각한다. 법원의 공정한 판단이 있을 것으로 믿는다.
--법정 분위기는 어땠나.
▲변호인이 그간 비공개의무조항 때문에 하지 못했던 말을 속 시원히 얘기했다고 생각한다.
--대출 경위를 밝힐 의향이 있나.
▲이미 일찍이 채권단에 공문으로 설명했다. 애초 넥스젠이 투자에 참여하려다가 입찰규정상 다른 컨소시엄 멤버가 인수대금을 못 낼 경우에 대한 연대책임을 부담해야 하는 문제로 넥스젠 투자위원회가 투자를 잠정 보류하게 됐다. 이때 넥스젠이 자신의 100% 모회사인 나티시스은행에 상황을 잘 설명해 대출이 이뤄지게 된 것이다. 언론에 보도됐고 증권가에서도 말하는 브릿지론과 유사한 대출이 이뤄졌던 것이다. 대형 글로벌 M&A 경우에 일단 브릿지론을 얻은 후 재무적투자자(FI)나 전략적투자자(SI)의 협의가 완결되면 대출 대신 투자의 형태로 대체하는 것이 널리 행해지는 방법의 하나다. '승자의 저주'는 누구보다도 우리가 제일 우려한다. 차입금을 인수대금으로 쓰는 걸 줄이려고 지난 11월18일 창우동 선영에서 현 회장이 투자자 접촉을 계속하고 있다고 말했다. 한두 달이면 대금을 완납하는 스케줄인데 그걸 못 기다리고 채권단이 MOU를 해지했다. 채권단이 제시한 주식매매계약(SPA)에서 현대건설의 주식 등을 담보로 안 쓴다는 조항의 위배에 대비해 거액의 현금보증금을 내도록 하게 돼 있다. 이렇듯 안전장치들이 많은데도 채권단이 한두 달을 못 기다리고 MOU를 해지한 것은 참으로 부당하다.
--제3의 자금이 있는지.
▲넥스젠 등 7개 정도의 투자자가 있다.
--대출과 유상증자는 별개인가.
▲대출을 받아 놓았지만 FI, SI를 유치해 대체함으로써 대출금을 인수대금에 사용하는 규모를 줄이려는 것이다. 이번 M&A의 특이점은 컨소시엄 멤버 변경에 대해 채권단의 사전 동의가 필요하다는 것이었다.다른 M&A에서는 우선협상대상자 선정 이후 FI나 SI를 유치해도 그 추가가 자유로운데 이번 입찰에는 채권단이 현대그룹이 FI나 SI를 추가하려고 해도 동의를 안 해주겠다고 사이드로 말하는 상황이었다. 그래서 현대상선 프랑스법인을 컨소시엄 멤버로 넣은 것도 향후 유치되는 FI, SI가 현대상선 프랑스법인의 유상증자를 통해 인수전에 채권단 동의 없이도 참여하는 방안이었다. 현대상선 프랑스법인을 사실상 특수목적법인(SPC)으로 활용하는 방안을 처음부터 추진 중이었다. 예전 창우동 선영에서도 말했듯이 하고 싶은 말이 많았지만 비공개의무 입찰규정 때문에 이런 내용은 SPA 체결 이후 밝히려 했다.
--추가 소송 계획은.
▲24일 가처분 신청 심리를 보고 나서 결정하겠다.
--채권단 중재안에 대한 생각은.
▲현대건설 이사회, 소액주주, 주요주주를 무시하는 법 위에 있는 것과 같은 제안이라고 생각한다. 현대그룹은 그런 위법한 방안에 공범이 될 수 없다.
--이런 소송 진행은 현 회장의 뜻인가.

description.hltext_display: Taiwan y China firman acuerdo de cooperaciÃ³n mÃ©dica
description.content:
Taiwan y China firman acuerdo de cooperación médica
Taipei, dic. 21 (CNA) Taiwan y China firmaron un acuerdo tendiente a promover la cooperación bilateral en los campos médico y sanitario en su sexta ronda de diálogos institucionalizados y regulares que se clausuró en Taipei el martes 21.
El mencionado acuerdo fue sellado por Chiang Pin-kung, presidente de la Fundación para los Intercambios del Estrecho (SEF, siglas en inglés), con sede en Taipei, y Chen Yunlin, presidente de la Asociación para las Relaciones a Través del Estrecho de Taiwan (ARATS, siglas en inglés), con sede en Beijing, en representación de sus respectivos Gobiernos.
Éste es el 15º acuerdo que ha sido concertado entre los dos lados del Estrecho desde la reanudación de sus diálogos regulares en Beijing el 12 de junio del año 2008. Los 14 acuerdos previamente firmados han allanado ya el terreno para el lanzamiento de los transportes aéreos y marítimos directos y para el reforzamiento de los intercambios comerciales, turísticos y financieros bilaterales.
En base al acuerdo de cooperación médica y sanitaria, las autoridades competentes de Taiwan y China establecerán un mecanismo institucionalizado de cooperación para controlar de manera efectiva los riesgos médicos y sanitarios que puedan derivarse de los cada vez más profundizados intercambios entre los dos lados.
Según el mismo acuerdo, las dos partes del Estrecho reforzarán de manera conjunta la prevención de las diferentes enfermedades contagiosas, así como el manejo de la calidad y seguridad de los diversos aparatos médicos, productos cosméticos, alimentos saludables y medicinas herbarias.
Momentos después de firmar tal convenio con su homólogo de Taiwan, el principal negociador de China fue recibido en audiencia en un hotel local por Lai Shin-yuan, presidenta del Consejo para los Asuntos de China Continental, el máximo organismo encargado de elaborar y coordinar las políticas de Taiwan hacia China.
En dicha ocasión, Lai tuvo elocuentes frases de elogio hacia con tanto Chiang como Chen por sus esfuerzos desplegados para firmar el acuerdo de cooperación médica y sanitaria, afirmando que el mismo ayudará a garantizar la salud y los intereses de todos los pueblos de los dos lados del Estrecho de Taiwan.
En el curso de la sexta reunión Chiang-Chen que tuvo lugar en el Grand Hotel de Taipei, ambas partes convinieron asimismo en que la firma de un acuerdo para la protección de las inversiones bilaterales sería incluida en la agenda de la próxima séptima ronda de diálogos regulares, programada para tener lugar en China en el primer semestre del próximo año.
El mencionado acuerdo de inversiones estaba originalmente programado para ser firmado también en la actual sexta reunión entre los dos máximos negociadores de Taiwan y China, pero tuvo que ser postergado debido a algunos detalles técnicos que deberán todavía ser discutidos y solucionados por las dos partes, según un funcionario de la SEF.
La SEF y la ARATS son dos organizaciones cuasi-oficiales creadas por sus respectivos Gobiernos a principios de la década de los 90 para manejar todos los asuntos concernientes a los intercambios entre los dos lados del Estrecho a falta de relaciones oficiales.
Taiwan y China han estado gobernados separadamente desde el término del conflicto civil en 1949; sin embargo, las autoridades de Beijing todavía consideran a Taiwan como parte de su territorio y amenazan aún con usar la fuerza militar contra la isla, en caso de declarar ésta última su independencia formal.
No obstante, las relaciones bilaterales han mejorado evidentemente desde que el presidente Ma Ying-jeou tomó posesión de su cargo en mayo del año 2008, comprometiéndose a dar un mayor impulso a los intercambios comerciales y turísticos entre los dos lados del Estrecho de Taiwan.(Por Kang Shih-jen y Luis Huang)Enditem

description.hltext_display: «Манежной площади» в � язани не будет
description.content:
«Манежной площади» в Рязани не будет
материал размещен 22 декабря 2010 в 00:05
Акции протеста футбольных фанатов с разной интенсивностью не прекращаются уже вторую неделю.
Москва в последние дни живет как на вулкане.
В прошедшую субботу очередная попытка провести несанкционированный пикет произошла возле телецентра «Останкино». Ее итогом стало задержание сотрудниками ОМОНа порядка около сотни воинственно настроенных молодых людей.
Но беспокойно не только в столице. На прошлой неделе подобнее акции прошли практически во всех городах России, в том числе и в Рязани.
Чтобы понять, какие настроения преобладают в среде фанатов в нашем городе, корреспондент «МК в Рязани» попытался встретиться с одним из них и получить информацию «из первых уст». Организация подобной встречи, к нашему удивлению, оказалась весьма нелегким делом: фанаты наотрез отказывались комментировать ситуацию, встречи несколько раз переносились.
Но вот, наконец, в пятницу долгожданная встреча с рязанским фанатом одного из футбольных клубов, произошла на условиях строжайшей анонимности. Не все высказывания нашего гостя по причинам соблюдения законодательства могут быть воспроизведены в СМИ, поэтому интервью приводится в сильно сокращенном виде.
– Что сейчас происходит в фанатском движении, какие настроения преобладают?
– Преобладают очень негативные настроения. Мы испытываем недоверие по отношению и к власти и к нашим правоохранительным органам. В первую очередь из-за того, что сейчас происходит на улицах Москвы. Там регулярно происходят различные инциденты… Преступников задерживают правоохранительные органы, но их тут же выпускают на улицу. Представь ситуацию: ты кого-то убил, тебя забирают, а потом либо под каким-то давлением, либо за деньги отпускают. Преступники остаются безнаказанными.
В Москве убит болельщик, журналист Юрий Волков, он гулял с друзьями. По нашему мнению, они случайно задели кавказцев, которые развернулись и с оскорбительными криками зарезали парня. Трое задержанных подозреваемых, уроженцы Чечни - на свободе, отпущены. Убит Свиридов. Убийцы были задержаны, потом отпущены. В связи с этим у народа возникает недоверие к милиции и власти. Возникает множество вопросов, главный из которых: сможет ли наша власть защитить население? И насколько она может это делать? Могут ли правоохранительные органы выполнять свою работу на 100%?
(Прим. редакции: интервьюируемый привел также и рязанские примеры нераскрытых преступлений подобного рода. Данные имеются в редакции, но нуждаются в дополнительной проверке)
– Если бы правоохранительные органы выполняли свою работу, как полагается, ничего этого не было. Беспорядки на Манежной площади произошли после похорон Егора. Там были настоящие болельщики различных клубов и все они люди очень адекватные, большинство из тех, кто был на похоронах, потом разъехались по домам. Но были и такие, кто хотел высказать свое возмущение происходящим, они-то и отправились на Манежку. Уже там к ним присоединилось пьяное быдло не имеющее никакого отношения к футбольным фанатам и сработал эффект толпы. И все это переросло в массовые беспорядки.
– Нет, я был в другом городе. Акция памяти проходила в 22 городах и в большинстве мест она сопровождалась беспорядками. В Рязани же все прошло мирно и спокойно.
Некоторые из кавказцев же, несмотря на запрет старших, которых они очень уважают, все-таки пытаются предпринимать ответные действия. Собираются у Киевского вокзала, для того чтобы отомстить. Милиция их задерживает. Они разбредаются мелкими группами по всей Москве и … совершают противоправные действия (ред.). По данным, которыми я обладаю, информация о большом числе подобных инцидентов замалчивается.
– Да скрывают… Сейчас в Москве ситуация накалена до предела.
– Я думаю, что он еще может быть впереди. Потому, что из общения со своими друзьями я узнал, что наши противники планируют еще не одну акцию, и чем все это закончится, не знает никто.
– Принимайте во внимание, что все это в основном делает агрессивная приезжая молодежь, выросшая во время конфликтов на Северном Кавказе, которая ничего кроме войны не видела. Они ненавидят за это... Эти люди не способны жить в нашей стране по нашим законам. Они привыкли жить только по своим обычаям и традициям. Наша культура для них чужда, и приезжая сюда они продолжают вести себя как дома. Для них гораздо важнее традиции, а не то – примем мы их или нет.
– Какой выход ты видишь из этой ситуации?
– Выход только один: наша власть должна работать нормально. Выполнять свои функции,.. А приезжие должны начать жить по нашим законам, а не в соответствии со своими традициями. Большинство людей пугаются, когда видят, как кто-то танцуют лезгинку на Красной площади и режет баранов прямо на улицах…
– Не боишься, что если начнется что-то более серьезное, под горячую руку могут попасть все кавказцы, а ведь среди них немало очень талантливых и образованных людей?
- В Рязани возможны беспорядки подобные московским?
- Какие-то беспорядки, наверное, возможны, но конечно, такого масштаба, как в Москве они, скорее всего не приобретут. Все-таки город у нас не настолько большой, футбольных фанатов здесь не так много и проблема приезжих стоит не настолько остро. Но абсолютно исключать такую возможность я бы не стал.
Вот такую оценку ситуации мы получили от одной, если так можно выразиться, из враждующих сторон. Все попытки связаться с представителями диаспор в Рязани, чтобы узнать их позицию, оказались, увы, безрезультатными.
Как же оценивать вышеприведенное? Безусловно, далеко не со всеми высказываниями нашего гостя можно согласиться. Также, безусловно, и то, что никакое насилие, погромы и беспорядки неприемлемы и никак не способствуют нормализации ситуации. Но, с другой стороны, становится, очевидно, что именно бездействие и возможная коррумпированность правоохранительных органов стали тем самым детонатором, который и послужил поводом (но не причиной, причина – глубже) для последних событий. И уголовное дело, с явным опозданием заведенное СКП в отношении тех, кто отпустил подозреваемых в убийстве болельщика Свиридова, не может в данной ситуации служить утешением. Система дала сбой, и он, увы, далеко не первый. Предохранительным клапаном могла бы послужить быстрая и показательная отставка милицейского начальства, чьи подчиненные оказались в этом замешены – но не случилось… «Умная власть отбрасывает хвост, как ящерица. Глупая власть отбрасывает копыта» - так выразился насчет своевременной отставки скомпрометировавших себя начальников Евгений Додолев в своей статье, которую можно прочитать на нашем сайте mk.ru*.
Радует в этой ситуации только одно: вероятность повторения подобных событий в Рязани кажется крайне малой, и даже не столько по тем причинам, которые привел в разговоре наш фанат. Все-таки в нашем регионе имидж и авторитет местной власти и правоохранительных органов значительно выше, чем в столице, несмотря на все имеющиеся недостатки. Чего стоит хотя бы то, что милиционеры, избившие летом журналистов, были гласно и оперативно (и объективно!) осуждены, а практически все мирные демонстрации всяческих «несогласных» в Рязани разрешались властями, и спокойно проходили с массовостью, не превышающей несколько десятков человек, вызывая скорее иронию, чем агрессию. Вот он – предохранительный клапан в действии!
В этот день, во второй половине дня, из Твиттера и других интернет-источников стало известно о некой готовящейся в Рязани акции «против беспредела». Какого именно в сообщениях не уточнялось.
К сожалению, стоит отметить, что милиционеры безосновательно препятствовали работе журналистов, мотивируя запрет на фотосъемку неким режимом «спецоперации», и в свойственной им форме настоятельно рекомендовали стереть все фотографии с карты памяти и покинуть территорию. Но, собственно, никаких столкновений или беспорядков зафиксировано так и не было, и к 19 часам немногочисленные протестующие спокойно разошлись по домам. А несколько заботливо сохраненных фото мы предоставляем вашему вниманию.
Фото: Антон Минаков, Илья Лицентов.

description.hltext_display: Peszko już jedną nogą w Kolonii
Basket - B Femm.: San Pietro-Galaxi Brindisi=67-73
description.content:
B Femm.: San Pietro-Galaxi Brindisi=67-73
Dopo sei giornate di campionato della serie B regionale femminile, che con la riforma dei campionati prevista per la prossima stagione sportiva sarà propedeutico alla nuova serie B unica nazionale, la matricola Processi Speciali Galaxy Brindisi Basket occupa il primo posto in classifica con 10 punti, in coabitazione con Taranto e Lecce, anche se questultima deve recuperare una partita.
Nellultima giornata la Processi Speciali ha superato in trasferta il San Pietro, squadra giovane e grintosa che sicuramente meriterebbe una posizione migliore rispetto allattuale classifica. Le padroni di casa hanno seriamente impegnato le atlete brindisine, che partite alla grande, grazie ad una difesa efficace si sono addirittura portate sul +27 (40-13), prima di subire un inevitabile quanto clamoroso calo di concentrazione, nonostante i ripetuti richiami del coach Pasquale Palmiero e del dirigente Antonio Manfreda, che ha portato le brindisine al -3 (50-53), complice anche una dura zone-press applicata dalle locali.
Dopo questo momento negativo la Processi Speciali, brava a non demoralizzarsi, ha riordinato le idee riprendendo a giocare con padronanza e consapevolezza dei propri mezzi ed è riuscita ad reinvertire il trend della gara e a vincere per 73-67, portando a casa altri due punti che valgono il primato del girone.
MVP della gara ancora il capitano Ferrara, ma si conferma di rilievo assoluto anche la prova di Mariutti. Notevole il lavoro difensivo che tutte le ragazze hanno svolto, ben 32 rimbalzi conquistati, dei quali oltre la metà da Greco e DElia.
Ora per la Galaxy cè la consueta pausa natalizia di due settimane prima di tornare in campo l8 gennaio 2011 al tensostatico Marra di Brindisi dove attenderà la De Florio Taranto, altra capolista del campionato.
San Pietro-Processi Speciali Galaxy Brindisi 67-73
(11-15; 9-25; 32-13; 15-20)
Galaxy: Ferrara 24, Sciscio, Semeraro 8, Mancino 8, Greco 8, Mariutti 21, DElia 2, Panarese 2, De Punzio, Cavaliere. Coach: Palmiero
San Pietro: Furone 23, Pesimena 12, Giangrande 11, Ciurlo 10, De Stradis 8, De Matteis 2, Cuomo M. 1. Coach: Cuomo C..
CLASSIFICA
Processi Speciali Galaxy Brindisi, Digital Copy Lecce*, De Florio Taranto 10; Bk Tre Erre Brindisi, Lara Basket Grottaglie*, Monella Vagabonda Trani, Pink Basket Bernalda 6; Gruppootto Mesagne, U.S. San Pietro 2; Euroriparatori Santeramo 0.
*Una partita da recuperare.
COMUNICATO STAMPA GALAXY BRINDISI

description.hltext_display: White House reportedly will order indefinite detention for some at Gitmo
description.content:
WASHINGTON The Obama administration is preparing an executive order that would formalize indefinite detention without trial for some detainees at the U.S. military prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, but allow those detainees and their lawyers to challenge the basis for continued incarceration, U.S. officials said.
The administration has long signaled that the use of prolonged detention, preferably at a facility in the United States, was one element of its plan to close Guantanamo. An inter-agency task force found that 48 of the 174 detainees remaining at the facility would have to be held in what the administration calls prolonged detention.
"We have a plan to close Guantanamo, and this detainee review process is one element," said an administration official who discussed the order on condition of anonymity because it has yet to reach the president.
However, almost every part of the administration's plan to close Guantanamo is on hold, and it could be crippled this week if Congress bans the transfer of detainees to the United States for trial and sets up steep hurdles to the repatriation or resettlement in third countries of other detainees.
Officials worked intensively on the executive order over the past several weeks, but a senior White House official said it had been in the works for more than a year. If Congress blocks the administration's ability to put detainees on trial or transfer them out of Guantanamo, the official said, the executive order could still be implemented.
"I would argue that you still have to go ahead because you can't simply have people confined to a life sentence without any review and then fight another day with Congress," the administration official said. "One of things we're mindful of is (that) you can't have a review conducted by the same people, in the same process, who made the original decision to detain. You have to have something that is different and is more adversarial, which the Bush administration never had."
Under the system established by the Bush administration, Guantanamo detainees could go before military review panels with "personal representatives," also military officers, who explained the process but could not act as lawyers. The system envisioned under the executive order would be more adversarial and would allow detainees to challenge their incarceration periodically, possibly every year.
"There isn't a single serious commentator on the subject who hasn't thought something like this wasn't necessary as part of a rule-of-law approach," said the senior White House official, who also spoke on condition of anonymity.
Provisions in the defense authorization bill, which has passed the House and is before the Senate, would effectively ban the transfer of any detainee to the United States for any purpose. That rules out civilian trials for all Guantanamo detainees, including Khalid Sheik Mohammed, the self-proclaimed mastermind of the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks. His potential prosecution had remained possible even though the administration had balked in the face of political opposition to a trial in New York.

description.hltext_display: ภูมิใจไทยไม่หวั่นกกต.แขวน“บุญจง”
description.content:
ลุงจิ้น ชี้พรรค� ูมิใจไทยไม่วิตกหลัง กกต.ยังไม่รับรอง บุญจง นั่งเก้าอี้ ส.ส.โคราช ชี้ยังไม่ถึง 30 วัน
วันนี้ (22 ธ.ค.) นายชวรัตน์ ชาญวีรกูล รมว.มหาดไทย ในฐานะหัวหน้าพรรค� ูมิใจไทย กล่าวถึงกรณีที่คณะกรรมการการเลือกตั้ง (กกต.) ยังไม่รับรองนายบุญจง วงศ์ไตรรัตน์ เป็น ส.ส.นครราชสีมา เนื่องจากมีเรื่องร้องเรียนว่า ยังไม่เป็นเรื่องน่าวิตกกังวลใด ๆ เนื่องจาก กกต.จะต้องรับรอง� ายใน 30 วัน แต่ขณะนี้ยังไม่ถึง 30 วัน หากเลย 30 วันไปแล้ว ถึงจะเป็นเรื่องที่น่ากังวล อย่างไรก็ตามมั่นใจว่า นายบุญจง จะสามารถชี้แจงต่อ กกต.ตามที่ถูกร้องเรียนได้ เพราะเชื่อว่า นายบุญจง ไม่ได้กระทำความผิด.

description.hltext_display: Sfârşitul de an aparţine reglementatorului pieţei telecom, ANCOM
description.content:
2010-12-21 Ion VACIU Blog-editorial
Este evident că fiecare sfârşit de an aparţine reglementatorilor pieţelor telecom din Europa, pe alte continente nu ştim cum se întâmplă, dar pe la noi cam asta e. Se trage linia, se publică studiile, sintezele şi rapoartele, se fac clasamentele pe anul trecut, dar se şi emit primele previziuni despre anul 2011. Cum acest protocol se respectă de ani de zile, nici ANCOM, autoritatea românească de profil nu se dezminte. Astfel, astăzi, au fost trimise către piaţă câteva direcţii care vizează acţiunile pentru anul viitor, ce vor influenţa activitatea industriei de comunicaţii, în bine, desigur, asta ne şi dorim. Un feedback util asupra proiectelor aflate în consultaţie publică este, de asemenea, aşteptat de către decidenţii ANCOM. Sunteţi invitaţi să profitaţi de această ocazie!
Licitaţia pentru comparatorul de tarife telecom lansată în 2011
Licitaţia pentru realizarea aplicaţiei web destinată comparării ofertelor din domeniul telecom va fi lansată în 2011 şi va fi disponibilă consumatorilor spre finele anului viitor sau în 2012, susţine, preşedintele ANCOM, Cătălin Marinescu, conform Mediafax. Acest proiect a mai stat şi în atenţia fostului conducător al autorităţii româneşti, Liviu Nistoran, însă iată că se împlinesc doi ani şi fostul proiect „Costel" (costuri telefonice comparative) a fost îngheţat de către schimbările politice şi guvernamentale, în detrimentul utilizatorilor pieţei noastre.
„Aplicaţia web va fi realizată din fonduri europene. Cererea de finanţare a fost aprobată, iar contractul va fi semnat în ianuarie 2011. După semnarea acestuia, caietul de sarcini va fi prezentat spre consultare publică. Ulterior, va fi lansată o licitaţie publică internaţională pentru stabilirea furnizorului. Cu un buget de peste 200.000 de euro, aplicaţia va fi disponibilă consumatorilor, cel mai probabil, spre finele anului viitor sau începutul anului 2012", anticipează Marinescu. Dezvoltarea aplicaţiei este una din priorităţile planului de acţiuni al ANCOM pentru 2011. Într-o primă fază, consumatorii vor putea compara ofertele furnizorilor de servicii de comunicaţii pe segmentul de voce (fixă şi mobilă), urmând ca ulterior să fie extinsă şi pe partea de Internet. „Fiecare operator va fi obligat, într-un anumit termen, să transmită informaţii relevante despre fiecare ofertă pe care a lansat-o", a spus Marinescu.
Proiecte privind utilizarea numerelor naţionale scurte şi numerotaţie
ANCOM a mai prezentat, astăzi, 22 decembrie, spre dezbatere publică, două proiecte de decizie privind alocarea şi utilizarea numerelor naţionale scurte pentru servicii cu valoare adăugată, precum şi unele măsuri în domeniul resurselor de numerotaţie şi resurselor tehnice. Astfel, Autoritatea Naţională pentru Administrare şi Reglementare în Comunicaţii (ANCOM) propune completarea Planului Naţional de Numerotaţie prin deschiderea unui nou subdomeniu de numere naţionale scurte, de forma 14vxy, destinate serviciilor cu valoare adăugată de interes general şi supune consultării publice proiectul de decizie privind alocarea şi utilizarea acestora. Potrivit proiectului de decizie privind alocarea şi utilizarea numerelor naţionale scurte pentru servicii cu valoare adăugată de interes general, acestea se vor aloca furnizorilor de servicii de comunicaţii destinate publicului, putând fi utilizate de către respectivii furnizori de servicii de comunicaţii, pentru furnizarea propriilor servicii, sau asignate altor furnizori de servicii cu valoare adăugată de interes general. Tipurile de servicii care vor putea fi furnizate prin intermediul acestor numere constituie o extindere şi o completare la tipurile de servicii care pot fi furnizate prin intermediul numerelor naţionale scurte pentru servicii de interes public la nivel naţional.
Astfel, alături de accesul la serviciile de informare din diverse domenii de activitate vor putea fi furnizate şi servicii de consultanţă cu caracter tehnico-profesional, respectiv servicii care facilitează exprimarea unor opţiuni, opinii ori efectuarea unor donaţii sau plata anumitor servicii etc. Utilizarea acestor numere nu va fi permisă pentru furnizarea serviciilor de divertisment adulţi sau a serviciilor pentru care se pot utiliza, în prezent, alte tipuri de numere scurte (de exemplu, servicii de informaţii privind abonaţii, servicii armonizate cu caracter social sau servicii de interes public la nivel naţional). Numerele naţionale scurte pentru servicii cu valoare adăugată de interes general se alocă prin licenţa de utilizare a resurselor de numerotaţie, în mod individual, numai furnizorilor de servicii de comunicaţii electronice destinate publicului. În scopul protejării intereselor utilizatorilor finali, ANCOM propune limitarea tarifului cu amănuntul aplicat pentru apelurile sau SMS/MMS-urile către numerele naţionale scurte pentru servicii cu valoare adăugată de interes general.
ANCOM propune, totodată, o serie de modificări şi completări ale procedurii de emitere a licenţelor de utilizare a resurselor de numerotaţie şi de obţinere a acordului prealabil în cazul cedării licenţelor de utilizare a resurselor de numerotaţie, având ca scop creşterea gradului de eficienţă a realizării acestor procese. Noul proiect vizează, de asemenea, actualizarea prevederilor referitoare la numerele de rutare, ca urmare a modificării procedurilor tehnice utilizate de către furnizori pentru rutarea apelurilor în urma implementării portabilităţii numerelor. În plus, autoritatea de reglementare propune reducerea termenului maxim în care trebuie realizată portarea numerelor de la 10 la 3 zile lucrătoare. Prin reducerea termenului maxim de realizare a portării numerelor, România se va înscrie printre statele Uniunii Europene în care termenul de portare este cel mai scăzut, media la nivel european fiind, în anul 2009, de 6,5 zile pentru telefonia fixă şi de 4,1 pentru telefonia mobilă. Proiectele de decizie pot fi consultate pe pagina web a ANCOM, persoanele interesate fiind invitate să formuleze şi să transmită observaţii şi propuneri până la 24 ianuarie.

description.hltext_display: Corea del Norte se deja querer
description.content:
EL MAR AMARILLO SE EMPIEZA A APACIGUAR
Pese a las amenazas ‘mortales’, Pyongyang opta por el silencio tras las maniobras de Seúl en el Mar Amarillo, y autoriza la entrada de observadores de la ONU a sus instalaciones nucleares
Corea del Sur llevó a cabo ayer nuevas maniobras con fuego real en el Mar Amarillo, cerca de la tensa frontera con el Norte, desoyendo las amenazas del régimen comunista y las críticas de Rusia y China. No obstante, la pasividad de su vecino -se mostró sorprendentemente mudo tras las amenazas mortales del domingo-, así como el anuncio de éste de que da el visto bueno al retorno de los inspectores de la ONU a sus instalaciones nucleares hacen presagiar un final feliz de la crisis.
Con el mundo en alerta, los ejercicios se desarrollaron sin incidentes durante una escasa hora y media ante la isla de Yeonpyeong, alcanzada el mes pasado por el régimen de Kim Jong Il con rondas de artillería que mataron a cuatro personas, entre ellas, dos civiles.
Según la agencia Yonhap, un portavoz de la Junta de Jefes del Estado Mayor del país capitalista sostuvo que no hubo ninguna provocación norteña durante los simulacros, en los que participaron 10 barcos de guerra, cazas de combate F-15 y cañones autopropulsados K-9.
Asimismo, los 280 residentes en este peligroso enclave fueron evacuados a primera hora a refugios antiaéreos ante las amenazas de la nación hermana, que había advertido de un «ataque más letal» si esas operaciones tenían lugar en aguas que considera de su territorio. Yes que Pyongyang no reconoce la línea fronteriza marítima trazada en 1953 al término de la inconclusa Guerra de Corea -acabó con un armisticio y no con un tratado de paz- y el Mar Amarillo ha sido escenario de frecuentes enfrentamientos entre ambos países vecinos.
Las de ayer fueron las cuartas maniobras que desarrolla Seúl desde el intercambio de disparos de artillería del 23 de noviembre, que tuvo lugar precisamente cuando en la zona estaban en marcha ejercicios con miles de tropas del Sur.
Mientras China y Rusia creen que esta exhibición militar aumenta el riesgo de un enfrentamiento armado en la península coreana, hoy en día un «polvorín» en palabras de Bill Richardson, gobernador de Nuevo México (EEUU), que llegó el jueves en visita privada a la capital norteña.
De este encuentro se han logrado importantes avances, ya que el dictador Kim Jong Il permitió el regreso de los inspectores del Organismo Internacional de la Energía Atómica (OIEA) a sus instalaciones nucleares.
En abril de 2009, Corea del Norte expulsó por última vez a los expertos que supervisaban sus fábricas, una medida que ya tomó en 2003, cuando decidió abandonar el Tratado de No Proliferación de armas nucleares (TNP).
Además de permitir el acceso, Pyongyang acordó negociar la venta de 12.000 barras de combustible nuclear y enviarlas a otro país, posiblemente Corea del Sur, según indicó la cadena de televisión CNN, que acompaña en su viaje al ex embajador de EEUU ante la ONU. Ese combustible bastaría para fabricar entre seis y ocho armas de destrucción masiva. Posiblemente, se hayan prometido una serie de incentivos económicos -como se pedían desde hace tiempo- para este cambio de actitud.
esperanzas. Más allá de la frontera, Seúl aseguró que desconoce cualquier tipo de pacto, si bien todo indica que sobre las espaldas del negociador norteamericano se concentran las esperanzas del planeta para que las aguas vuelvan a su cauce, y no se desencadene un conflicto bélico.
El Gobierno de EEUU acusa a Pyongyang de desarrollar un programa nuclear secreto, y busca que ese régimen renuncie a sus actividades atómicas a través de las conversaciones a seis bandas en las que participan las dos Coreas, EEUU, Rusia, Japón y China.
Por otra parte, el presidente surcoreano, Lee Myung Bak, calificó de «natural» que un Estado soberano lleve a cabo maniobras defensivas, «sobre todo si es una nación dividida en confrontación militar», y sostuvo que ningún otro país puede intervenir.

description.hltext_display: England 'ready' for Aussie swing
description.content: Batsman Kevin Pietersen says England will be better prepared for Australia's swing bowling in the fourth Ashes Test after struggling last week.

description.hltext_display: Six Flags Names Richard Roedel to its Board of Directors
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Six Flags Entertainment Corporation
DALLAS, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- Six Flags Entertainment Corporation (NYSE: SIX) announced today that Richard Roedel has been elected to the Board of Directors for the company effective immediately. Mr. Roedel has previously served as the Chairman and CEO of BDO Seidman LLP and currently serves on the boards of several public companies including Brightpoint, Inc., IHS, Inc., Lorillard, Inc., Luna Innovations Incorporated and Sealy Corporation.
About Six Flags Entertainment Corporation
Six Flags Entertainment Corporation is a leading operator of regional theme parks with 19 parks across the United States, Mexico and Canada. Six Flags Over Texas, the company's flagship location, was founded in 1961 and will mark its 50th anniversary season in 2011.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.
